44b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa myed pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas/
44b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mngon tu phyogs te 'dug nas/ sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyend cing thams cad gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
44b8(mdo): kyis ji'i slad du myi bshad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHlad pa// rigs kyi bu gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyoms su
44b9(mdo): bzhugs so// 'jam dpal gyis gso sad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'dir btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa sa pa// rigs kyi
45a1(mdo): bu nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor ba ma yin te// rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad myed cing / bstan pa bsam gyis myi khyab bo//
45a2(mdo): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nurd gyurd pas// yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'dra
45a3(mdo): bka' saHlad pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs la
45a4(mdo): gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal kyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na/ bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di la 'dri bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHlad pa// 'ja
45a5(mdo): dpal khyod ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed thob pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab ci dgos// rig/ sa kyi bu khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal ba dang ldan
45a6(mdo): ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsold pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag tu bstend pa da ra/ bsgoms pa dang / mang du bgyis pa de dag thams cad ni
45a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par spras te/ 'on kyang 'jam dpa
45a8(mdo): nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis/ khyod byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dris shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
45a9(mdo): 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo stond pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang chos
45b1(mdo): thams cad kyi dbang phyugi rgyal po yin gis bdag la ma spu shig/ yang rigs kyi bu khyed ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzind bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon/
45b2(mdo): nur gyu rad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis
45b3(mdo): bdag la skabs phye na/ khyod la bdag yi ge 'bru gnyis shig 'dri'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na dris shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gan
45b4(mdo): nur gyur da pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba pa'i sras sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don bya
45b5(mdo): ba gang yin// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa// kye rgyal po'i sras sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi myed pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos/
45b6(mdo): po myed pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni sros pa myed pa'i
45b7(mdo): don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni ma sros pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba myed pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba myed pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni
45b8(mdo): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du myed pa'i don te// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/
45b9(mdo): kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad khros pa myed pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos spras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa
46a1(mdo): 'di ni/ bstan du myed pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan du myed na ji zhig bstan// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bstan du
46a2(mdo): byed pa'i ni btags te bstan to// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras btags pas ci zhig 'dogs par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal btags pas
46a3(mdo): ni dngos po yang myi 'dogs/ dngos po myed pa yang myi 'dogs so// 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gas te btags pas/ dngos po yang myi 'dogs/ dngos po myed pa yang myi 'dogs na/ theg
46a4(mdo): pa gsum po dag ji ltar bsta dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chagangs pa myed par ma byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
46a5(mdo): gshegs pas chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'o zhes pa/ stan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po myed pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po// lnga dmyigs pa myed pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
46a6(mdo): byang chub smos pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te spros pa myed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ spros pa myed pa'i
46a7(mdo): yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub dang smos pa dang bcas pa dang / sros pa myed pa dang bcas pa de ni gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
46a8(mdo): dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu bsam gyis myi khyab pa bstand pa 'di legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin no gtam 'di brjod pas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur/
46a9(mdo): ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa 'tshal bar myi rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa/
46b1(mdo): bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/ bcom ldan
46b2(mdo): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam
46b3(mdo): par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dang /
46b4(mdo): blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstand pa 'di legs par spras pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
46b5(mdo): saya pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni chos thams cad rgyu mthu na ba yin no// 'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no// de nas shi
46b6(mdo): sa la chen po lta bu bram ze mnyam pa nyid gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsomad to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa lags te/
46b7(mdo): de la yi ge myi dmyigs/ tshig 'bru myi dmyigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHsa pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ tshig kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru gyi sdang / don kyang kyi sdang ngo // de nas bcom
46b8(mdo): ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gang lags/ rnam pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags/ mtshan ma gang /
46b9(mdo): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ya lad pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du byed pa bsnyad du myed pa ste/ brjod du myed pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o//
47a1(mdo): zang pa nyid rten pa'i byed pa ze/ de'i phyir thod pa nyid ces bya'o// spang ba nyid de ni bsad du byed pa skye/ de'i phyir stong ba nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi ba nyid kyis sbyor /
47a2(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das sa che dang ldan ba ka ra dwa ti'i bus 'di ska ces gas sod do// bcom ldan 'das kyang chum sems dpa' bsam gyis kyi khyab pa chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul ba la gzig
47a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yaHsad pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
47a4(mdo): dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'a gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub
47a5(mdo): sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom lda/ 'das kyi gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal pa ltar na/ nyan
47a6(mdo): thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thob kyi chos rnams/ sa sem pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang
47a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa 'am/ pyod pa byin kyis zab par bya ba'i nus pa dang / mthu ga la yod// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas 'di/
47a8(mdo): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/ bcom
47a9(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal ngas kar bstand pa 'di ni/ bstan pa myed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas/ gnas brtan sha ra dA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces spras so
47b1(mdo): gnas brtan gis nyan thob kyi chos rnams tho za 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ 'o na ji khyod so so'i skye bo 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na/
47b2(mdo): khyod ci slob pa 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ 'od khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam// smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te btsun bsha rA rA
47b3(mdo): ti'i zhum pa sa'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa sa ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang sa yin na// de nyid khyod dmyigs pa can du 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho ba ni sbyis
47b4(mdo): dam pa rgya mtsho star gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par myi byed do// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs thu bo mchog yin gis/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad /
47b5(mdo): zer cig/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i da / sa pos ni ci yang thob par myi 'gyur ro// mngon par rtogs par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i
47b6(mdo): phyir khyod la dpe' bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ngan ron kyis kyang ri rab chen po rnam par 'jig go// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi su'i khung bu gcig na// shes
47b7(mdo): rab 'dug pa ka nga yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab gi rdul snyed rnams la byed do// rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe' bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na//
47b8(mdo): bal grang mang pa rtse shis su kyi bzad pa chen pa de yang / myi gribs dang ldan pas sngags kyu mA rgyas sad// rigs kyi bu de bzhin tu khyod ni thoza sa dang ldan pa/ DoM ba ni \u0f7fsa chung ba ste/ grang pa che chen po 'di
47b9(mdo): lA bu dang / lol 'gyed ka la nus/ de nam bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dis ste/ myi sus long gis shul tu mchi ba 'am/
48a1(mdo): khyer mthong bar yang rdo myi thog na/ khyim nas khyim du mchi ba'i rdo lta ga la thog ste/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de bzhin du glang po che chen po lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs
48a2(mdo): bar mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur da te/ da ci bgyir yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sacald pa/
48a3(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis sems can ci snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no// sha ra
48a4(mdo): dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzind mtha' yas shing bsam gyis myi khyab pa thob yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grang 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang myi'i skye dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong
48a5(mdo): gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur da to// de nas byang chub/ sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge/ 'dzi nad dkon mchog ta la la spyod pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya
48a6(mdo): ba de la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thazag tu phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu
48a7(mdo): 'i rdul phra rab gi rdul snyed gi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed gyis zhal mngon par bstand te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
48a8(mdo): thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag go// phyogs cig ci lta bar phyogs bcu rnams kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka'
48a9(mdo): saHlad to// chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de
48b1(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sngar mdzad 'di nyid sngon gi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyis rlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i tshabs nye bar brtan pas 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs/
48b2(mdo): rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyar ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par grol ba dang / chags pa myed pa'i
48b3(mdo): ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad brjod par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyend bI ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed
48b4(mdo): par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i sa bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas de bzhi na gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab
48b5(mdo): kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis rlob gis/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las choms
48b6(mdo): te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ chos bstand pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo
48b7(mdo): gros la thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes kyi sdar ba dang / sgrib pa myed pa dang / chod pa myed pa dang / brjod pa myed pa'i chos nyid dang / tha dad pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang / zil kyis myi gnon pa dang /
48b8(mdo): zhum pa myed pa dang / 'phrogs pa myed pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom
48b9(mdo): ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la nyug mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/ de na
49a1(mdo): ting nge 'dzin de las sangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam ma'i
49a2(mdo): khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i
49a3(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros
49a4(mdo): la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches
49a5(mdo): po de dag ni gang yin/ gang las bsams te de skad spa/ kye rgyal pa'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig/ de sa
49a6(mdo): ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye brgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems
49a7(mdo): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byor pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/
49a8(mdo): 'di lta ste/ sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor da pyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa dang / sbyor ba phun gsum tshogs pa dang bsam pa phun sum chog
49a9(mdo): pa dang / phyir myi ldog pa dang / gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / rgyal tshab dang / dbang skur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
49b1(mdo): sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i
49b2(mdo): sras dag de la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma
49b3(mdo): zag tu gzugs bzar ba 'am/ mdzes pa 'am/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ gzi' brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba mthong
49b4(mdo): ram/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/ de bzhin ga n+te/ gas pa'i sngags pa rgya cher zos na 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa'i ye shes 'dod cing thog ma nyid du/ bla na myed pa yang dag
49b5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems bskyed/ ma thag pa de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas
49b6(mdo): dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna
49b7(mdo): sna tshogs shes pa dang / mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug
49b8(mdo): pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad shes pa dang / sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i myig gi shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dka' bI/
49b9(mdo): gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub
53a1(mdo): bya ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhes 'am/ myed do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhes 'am/ myed do zhe 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i spyod
53a2(mdo): pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe 'am/ nges par myi 'byung ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe 'am/ ma 'ongs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag ma byon to zhe 'am/ ma byon pa
53a3(mdo): ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'o zhe 'am/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe 'am/ ma zad do zhes bya ba dang / dus sum po dag mtshan
53a4(mdo): nyid gcig ce 'am/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir myi ldog pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// // kye rgyal
53a5(mdo): pa'i sras dag phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la tshe// sa kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe/ na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad
53a6(mdo): pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// mang ba nyid dang ga cig pa nyid dang / yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang / don la yi ge slo btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po myed pa sgo btag
53a7(mdo): pa dang / dngos po myed pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma myed pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma myed pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid myed pa sgro btags pa dang /
53a8(mdo): mtshan nyid myed pas mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su sbyin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhing / gong du
53a9(mdo): gnas pa gang dag thos gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gi/ gzhan gi dring la myi 'jog pa thob par phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/
53b1(mdo): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la gzhon nur gyurd pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la gzhon nu rad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin
53b2(mdo): te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba
53b3(mdo): mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pashes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams pa
53b4(mdo): dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad par rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yi na/ nus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa rgyu rang
53b5(mdo): pa yin te/ kye rgyal gyis dgra 'di ni gzhon nur gyurd pa'i sem/ sa dpa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhon nur gyur/ da pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par grub pa bcu
53b6(mdo): yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sang sa rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis rlabs pa dang /
53b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs myed dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par grub pa dang / sgra skad
53b8(mdo): la sbyor ba tshad byed pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas
53b9(mdo): pa la sbyor zhing / gang du gnas gang dag thob pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dri la gyi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub
54a1(mdo): sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la rgyal 'chab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rgyal 'tshab kyi byang chub
54a2(mdo): sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa
54a3(mdo): bag chags gi 'tshams sbyor ba la rtogs pa la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos nyid rtog par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la
54a4(mdo): mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gi khams rnam par 'byed pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/
54a5(mdo): kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtog pa bya ba la mkhas pa/ yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub
54a6(mdo): sems dpa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la/ gnas bcu yang dag par brjo da par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang
54a7(mdo): 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kun tu spyod pa dang / rgyal po'i pha brang 'khor du gnas pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du na
54a8(mdo): par bapyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bsku rad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin kyi rlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rold gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chob kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de
54a9(mdo): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa myed par sgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sgrub gi/ gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog
54b1(mdo): pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la dbang skur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag
54b2(mdo): pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i srad dag 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu dang ldan te// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed dpag tu
54b3(mdo): g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa byin gyis rlob pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed pa dag sems can gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten
54b4(mdo): gi khams grangs myed pa yongs su sbyar ba myed pa mang ba yin/ sems can grangs myed pa'i sems sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa la
54b5(mdo): rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs myed pa'i spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par khyad pa la mkhas pa yi na/ sems can grangs myed pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis
54b6(mdo): rtogs par byed pa la ya'as pa yin/ sems cadan grangs kyid ba 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs byed pan ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la 'dud pa lasan
54b7(mdo): xxx
54b8(mdo): xxx
54b9(mdo): shes par gyi tshus/ sems kyis yul zhes par gyings/ senas kyi chos du lags par gyi nus me/ ze rgyas pa'i mes dag 'di ni dbang 'phru batham pa'i phyo dum sem pa sem
55a1(mdo): sras dag dbang skur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rus gsum
55a2(mdo): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dper myed pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung myed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba dang / 'jig
55a3(mdo): rten gi khams thams cad snang bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gi thams cad byin kyis brlabs pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas
55a4(mdo): kyi ye shre mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la sems 'ja ga pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni dbang bskur ba
55a5(mdo): thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub se// mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems
55a6(mdo): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig
55a7(mdo): rten gi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul da rab tu 'guld/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur
55a8(mdo): bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem tsham/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / chos nyid thob pa/
55a9(mdo): lha'i me ton ljin ni char yang mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i spos kyi srin gyi char yang mngon par 'bab bo// lha'i phye ma'i srin gi char yang lha'i
55b1(mdo): 'phreng ba'i srin gi char yang / lha'i gos gi srin gi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i srin gi char dang / D+halha'i pad ma'i srin gi char dang / lha'i rgyan gi phreng gi srin gi char dang / lha'i rgyan gi srin gi char yang mngon pa/
55b2(mdo): 'bab po// lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar smra byung ngo // lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo // lha'i nga ro yang grag go// gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rje mor lha'i dbang po'i khar par ji lta ba
55b3(mdo): de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du yang chos bstand pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste/ lhag chad myed do// tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid stonang to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus
55b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab gi rdul snyed gyijig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab sted lhags te/
55b5(mdo): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkar nas 'di skad ces 'dze rad to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid// 'di stond pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
55b6(mdo): bdag cag kyang mying chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya dag nas/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi za
55b7(mdo): nas 'dir phyi nad to// sangs rgyas byin kyi rlabs kyis de dag thams cad du yang chos bstand pa 'di 'byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid stond te/ lhag chad myed do// kye
55b8(mdo): rgyal ba'i sras dag pad/ ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi nang to// bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gi khams 'dir phyi nad pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams zas
55b9(mdo): cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lnga'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyind par gyur to// / de nas sangs rgyas kyi/
56a1(mdo): mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
56a2(mdo): smras so// / rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa// bsnyen bka' mtshan gyis brgya nad pa mthor 'gyur nas/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed//
56a3(mdo): do zla myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun rjod bzang dang rjes su bstand pa dang // sdug bsngal bzad pa rlag 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// yon tan
56a4(mdo): kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas// nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba myed pa'i// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// gnas rnams ji snyed
56a5(mdo): gang dag yod gyur dang // rang gzhan gnas pa'i gnas rnam// sa gzhan dag kyang / gzhan myin dngos por rnam par rtog bya phyi dar// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ 'das
56a6(mdo): dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na/ dge dang myi dge las rnams gang yod pa/ de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtags sems 'jog byed pa// ting 'dzin
56a7(mdo): bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang / de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag par thugs pa// de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog// 'jig rten
56a8(mdo): brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams// ci 'dra ci 'dra re'i de dang der// rim pa de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa
56a9(mdo): 'dra dang // lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dad rnam sum nas// bstan bcos tu ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa tu ma'i 'am
56b1(mdo): gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yong kun gyi// khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// chos 'dir kun tu 'gro bar gar gyur da cing / dge ba'i/
56b2(mdo): 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa// yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang // sems can ji ltar sa la
56b3(mdo): 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags myed myig ni rab tu dbyed pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na// sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang /
56b4(mdo): sngon gi gnas rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don/ tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa// kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa/
56b5(mdo): nyon moras zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du/ brtan pa sems 'di 'jog// 'jig rten gsum na tha snyad// gang btags dang // ngag lam sngangs tshul spyod pa gar
56b6(mdo): yod pa// brda'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ chos rnams thams cad brjod du myed pa ste// stong pa myi g.yo rang bzhin ngo bo nyid/
56b7(mdo): don dam bden pa brtag par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams dag tu sa yo bstand pa dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs
56b8(mdo): pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstand pa'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'od zer che mo re las 'od gzer rnams// de bzhin phyogs bcur kun tu rab tu 'gyed// de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya
56b9(mdo): ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing mang bsam kyis kyi khyab gang yod pa// de dag rang gi lag tu mngon 'phrul te// sgyu ma'i tshul de rtog par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub den
57a1(mdo): tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun// gnod pa myed par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas// chos rnams srog myed rtogs par bya ba'i phyir//
57a2(mdo): byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa// skra'i tshe'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jog par byed// ma lus mngar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brta/
57a3(mdo): ba'i sems 'di 'jog/ zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul kyi bkra// gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing // phra rab rtul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed
57a4(mdo): 'jig rten 'di ni 'das dang de bzhin du// ma 'ongs sregs pa'i bskal pas 'jig pa rnams// bskal pa zad pa'i rtogs bar bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jo
57a5(mdo): dus gsum da// de bzhi gshegs rnams dang // stond pa rang // rgyal thos las byung rnams dang // chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs / par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di
57a6(mdo): 'jog/ brjod du myed pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// sgra'i sa bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan
57a7(mdo): pa sems 'di 'jog// 'khor yukra ri bo bsam gyis myi khyab pa// sgra'i sa bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// rags dang phra ba rtog par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di
57a8(mdo): 'jog/ lus pa myed pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// skad cig gcig la dbyangs gis go bar byed// dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa stand pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu brta/ 'di 'jug
57a9(mdo): 'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba// skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing // zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog// 'jig rten gsum/
57b1(mdo): po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun gyi rab tu rnam par shes// lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang
57b2(mdo): 'dra bar yang // skad cig gcig la lta gyu rang seld par byed// rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus
57b3(mdo): par// de bzhin gshegs pas kang zhing rang 'byung zhing // chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams
57b4(mdo): rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul byed cing // yid las byung ba'i de dag rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jo ga byed// 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/
57b5(mdo): ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog/ sems kyiskad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brta/ na pa sems 'jog byed// tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam
57b6(mdo): gyis myi khyab pa'i// bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa myed// tshig rab dbye bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'dzi/
57b7(mdo): rten thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba// sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis
57b8(mdo): sam// rag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa myed// dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtog bya'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa'i bzhin/
57b9(mdo): gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su rgyu byed cing // sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes// 'di ni myi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten tha dad par// 'jig rten bdag
58a1(mdo): bor rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur ba// gang yang rung ba dam pa'i sgrogs par byed// 'di ni myi ldog rnams kyi bstand pa yin// byang chub don tu srid par gyad gyod che// byang chub sems dpa'i bde
58a2(mdo): sbyar gang yin pa// de'i bsngags pa rtags tu brjod par byed// 'di ni myi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul du phyin pa dang // khyad par 'phags chos zla byed gang yod pa/
58a3(mdo): de dag byang chub sems dpal rnaMs la ston// 'di ni gyi ldog nas kyi bstan pa yin// yon tan kun ldan sa gshegs pa'i// tshe nyid 'di na yod kyi gzhan myed pa// de la byang chub ses dpa' sbyor bar byed// 'di ni gyi ldog rnams kyi bstand pa yin// tshad byed gzhal yas las kyis kyi byar ba// sangs rgyas ni sa dang da gyur ci la nga
58a4(mdo): dpa' de la ston par byed// 'din gyi ldog rnams kyi bstan/ ba yin// ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang // de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams// de dag bde gshegs
58a5(mdo): sras brjod par byed/ 'di ni myi stog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// 'jig rten kun
58a6(mdo): kyis rtag tu ma bskor ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de stand bya// shi nad tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang // ngan song sa rnams dag tu gnod gyur da pI// gnas dang skyab
58a7(mdo): dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sand par bya// gang zhig byang chub don du sems 'jog pa// de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpar stan// bslab pa'i gdams
58a8(mdo): ngag ji bzhin nges byas pa// ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'dri de'i yin// nad bral rnams kyi bstanang pa ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i bya ba'i phyir// de ltar thog sa su zhig sems bskyed
58a9(mdo): pa 'di ni gnyis de dang po'i las can no// phan pazo pa byed sems dpa rab btang bde// mnyen dang sug dang de bzhin srung sems dang // kun tu srung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems
58b1(mdo): slob dpon sems dang snyoms par stond pa'i sems// de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyu rad pa de// lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya// mang du zos nas dkon par gnas su gzhag// dben par gyurapa/
58b2(mdo): nas dge bshes bstend tu gzhug/ dge bshes rnams la bka' zo bde bar bya// dus chod shes la zhes bzhin ldan par bya// dus shes gyu rang nas shi na tu 'jigs byed bya// 'jigs pa myed nas don
58b3(mdo): la batshon par bya// don shes gyu ra nas de bzhin chos brjod bya// chos rnams kun la chongs kyur da byed par bya/ rmongs pa myed par gyur pa nas rgyal ba'i sras// legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas/
58b4(mdo): par bya// 'di ni dang po'i las can brjod pa ste// byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin// 'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste// 'di la su slo ba de ni sangs rgyas sras//
58b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa// chos kyi rgyal/ po'i bstan dpa la rab tu sbyor// myi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal/ stong nyid dang // bdag myed pa dang g.yo ba myed pa dang // de
58b6(mdo): bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag myin dang // mngon par 'du byed myed dang dben pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rtog pa myed ma na par// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar rtog par byed//
58b7(mdo): sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang // brtag par bya phyir de ni gzen bstond// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas mu myed ces// de ltar de ni gyod du gzhug par bya// 'di na sa dang chu dang de
58b8(mdo): bzhin mye// rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang // phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs myed pa// de dag rnams la de ni snod du gzhug// rgya chen chos rnam kun tang khams rnams kyi// rang
58b9(mdo): bzhin ma lus mthar zug brtag par bya// de ni sangs rgyas sras zo sbyor byed la// phan par bya phyir rjes su bstand pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gang skyes pa// bstand pa skyes shing rab tu 'a
59a1(mdo): bar byed// blo ldan de ni dngos myed dngos po rtogs// dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyesate// de ni rang gi sa las yod myi ldog// sangs rgyas mthar zug yin par 'dzind pa ste/
59a2(mdo): brtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan// sems can rang bzhin ji 'drar rnam par dpyod las dang 'jig rten dang zhing rnams dang // rnam par sbyin dang 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rnam par dbyed/
59a3(mdo): pa rnal ba'i sras kyis shes// de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brjod// thams cad mkhyend dang 'das dang byung rnams dang // ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam pyad nas/ grub dang kang sa
59a4(mdo): legs skyes mthar zug dang // rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ji 'dra ba// sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni// dus sum mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes// nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag
59a5(mdo): 'byed myi byed// de ni dus gsum tha dad myed par 'jug// / gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba// de ni byang chub sem sa dpa' bzhi pa ste// 'di dag rang bsgrubs byang chub ses
59a6(mdo): dpa' de// byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin// thabs la mkhas pa rjes su
59a7(mdo): zhugs pa ste// bsod nams las dag pa tshams pas mthar phyind byed// de ltar bsod nams las dag ci byed kyang // 'jig rten kun gyi rten du gyur da pa dang // phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob/
59a8(mdo): byed dang // snying che ba dang skye dgu dgrol 'gyur byed// 'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren par byed cing rab tu dang bar byed// sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang /
59a9(mdo): mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che// 'jig rten thams cad mtha' ma myed pa dang / de bzhin dpag tu myed cing grangs myed dang // 'amatshungs myed masas las mnyam myed gzhal ba dang //
59b1(mdo): stong pa myi g.yo myed pa'i rang bzhin shes// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ sbyor ba phun tshogs pan dang snying bache ldan// de la rjes su bstand pa 'di 'dra ste// don dam kun dang ldan pa'i//
59b2(mdo): rnams kyis bstand// de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang // chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa myed/ shi nad tu blo ldan rtogs bral rnam rtog myed// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer myi phyedar//
59b3(mdo): sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / myod pa'i sngags dang sngags pa ma yin dang // sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes// thos par gyur da kyang bsam las nur ba myed// sems can
59b4(mdo): nyon mongs can nam rnam dag gam// gdul sla zhe 'am gdus bar dka' zhe 'am// chos dbyings chung zhe 'am yang na rgya che ma// 'jigs par 'gyur zhe 'am chags par 'gyur zhe 'am/
59b5(mdo): chos dbyings yod ce'am myed ce mo 'gyur kyang // dus gsu// ma rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// nges par sem sa shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos 'dir
59b6(mdo): bsam pa shind tu nges// mtshan ma myed dang mtshan nyid myed pa dang // dngos myed rang bzhin brdzun zhing dben pa dang // sgyu ma rang bzhin myig g.yor 'dra ba yin// chos mchog
59b7(mdo): ba 'di 'dra nyan par byed// de ltar myi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // gyod pa yod dam myed ces nges par gyod// 'byung ram myi 'byung zhe na 'am phyis
59b8(mdo): myi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe 'am ma 'das zhe 'am/ ma byon zhe 'am/ ma byon pa ma yin zhe'am 'byung ngam ma byung zad dam myi zad dam// de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid myed/
59b9(mdo): gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang po dang // don dam tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos myed pa// thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du/ myi ldog byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed// mtshan ma myed dang mtshan
60a1(mdo): ma yod pa dang / mtshan nyid myed dang mtshan nyid kyis mtshond dang // rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar pa rnams// thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed// gzhon nur gyur pa'i
60a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ni// lus dang rag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // 'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba stond// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa
60a3(mdo): rtogs byed cing // de dag rnams kyi mos pa dpyod par byed// sems can khyod dang rjes su mthun chos dang // zhing rnams 'jigs dang chags pa rnams kyang shes// ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon
60a4(mdo): shes thob// phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed// bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams zos nas kyang // de la de ni nur bar 'gyur ba myed// yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo
60a5(mdo): byed pa dang // de bzhin byin kyis brlabs dang rnam spyod dang // ji ltar skad cig grangs myed 'gro 'gyur ba// zhing du 'gro bar/ bya ba brjod par bya// de ni dri ba grangs myed 'dri bar byed//
60a6(mdo): lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi las kyang ston // de la sgra skad sbyor pa 'byam klas dang // sems gcig la yang sangs rgyas grangs mye da brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gar yin pa
60a7(mdo): sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes// de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang / spyod yul kar yin sbyor ba gang yin dang // tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang // 'jig rten rnam par
60a8(mdo): be dang sngon mtha' dang / brda' yi bden dang don dam bden pa dang // ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa yin// pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshar 'byind te// der yang ji ltar kun tu spyod pa dang // gan
60a9(mdo): dang de bzhin 'jug par bya ba dang // pho brang 'khor ni ji ltar dpyad pa dang // dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur da ci 'dra dang // byin gyis rlabs dang gzhan gnon ci 'dra dang // chos la 'jug dang bkra
60b1(mdo): lung brjod bya ste// 'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gis na de'i mthar thug ste// ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan du gyur pa myed// tshe'i 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na// tshul ldan rgyal tshab//
60b2(mdo): rgyal bar mngon du phyogs// dbang bskur gar yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste// thu bo khyad 'phags mthar phyi nad bdag nyid can// skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung // 'dir ni bsam bkra
60b3(mdo): bas rtogs ma yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste// 'di ni sems can la las zhing rnams kun// phra rab rdul tu grags nas ma lus bgrang // grangs myed 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed
60b4(mdo): pa// de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes// 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi// sa bon/
60b5(mdo): gyurd pa byang chub sems dpa' de skye/ thog mar byang chub sems shes gang brjod pa// de ni ji ltar tshul tu 'ang grangs myed de// / 'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab par gyu dang // de las
60b6(mdo): kong du brjod pa ji zhig yod// / de nas byang chub se mas dpa' kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa' chosakyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
60b7(mdo): dkon mchogatal la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par spras so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i myir thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang
60b8(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na// gang dag chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid bsgrub par byed pa lnga spos kyang ci/
60b9(mdo): dgos ste/ de dag ni nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// chos kyi blo gros kyis sbas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin no// shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin
61a1(mdo): gshegs pas dbang skur ba yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di
61a2(mdo): dag grags par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/
61a3(mdo): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol// bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma
61a4(mdo): 'tshal pas/ bdag ni dmus lor dang 'dra ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur bar yang ma bas kyi// bcom ldan 'das sems can gar dag gis chos kyi rnam
61a5(mdo): grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlar pa// gnas brtan de de bzhin te// ji skad smras
61a6(mdo): pa bzhin no// sha ra rA ti'i bus gsold pa// bcom lnga na 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid bshar du gsol// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa// sha ra rA ti'i bu sor la
61a7(mdo): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig ceran skyor ba thams cad bskul cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di la
61a8(mdo): der spogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bos nas// dkon mchog tA la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang /
61a9(mdo): 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di'i skabs brjod de// chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid kyang
61b1(mdo): stond par 'gyur gyis// 'du bar gyis shig// khyed phyis 'gyod pa gyur da ta re// kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o// de nas skad cig de nyid
61b2(mdo): la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyor ba thams cad 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas// thal mo sbyar te bcom
61b3(mdo): ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad du gsolang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cad myi gsung bar gyurd pas gnang ba mdzad do// rgya byin dang /
61b4(mdo): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na yang // bcom ldan 'das camyi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
61b5(mdo): pa sha ra dA ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la 'i zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bsha/ da tu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol//
61b6(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe// zhal nas ljags kyi dpa po phyung ste/ rigs kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzung sa 'di'i don kyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'deb
61b7(mdo): pa de dag thams cad ni za ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do// de nas
61b8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' saHsa to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la chos bshad par gsol ba thob cig/
61b9(mdo): de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa shing p+lag sha dang sa la'i rlung gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas shing lus myi g.yo bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po
62a1(mdo): dang ldan pa'i khang pa tshegs pa na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas nas/ 'dug par gyur te/ gser gi kha dog lta bu'i/
62a2(mdo): lus dang dpal gyis lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge 'jug go// de nas che dang ldan pa sha ra dra ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der sor ste/ phyin nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'didri
62a3(mdo): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu da bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
62a4(mdo): smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gar yin/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rig sa kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ kho bo ni khyod dang 'gyes
62a5(mdo): myi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chung ngur 'dug shig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du stan par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
62a6(mdo): kho bo nyan kyis khyod shod cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// ting nge 'dzind de las langs te/ stong gsum gi stong che na po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so//
62a7(mdo): de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas/ nan byin gi bar gyi lta bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po
62a8(mdo): chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyurd to// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur te// lha'i bu mo
62a9(mdo): mang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dge slong kyi 'khor dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang / dge snyen gyi 'khor dang / dge snyen ma'i 'khor dang / de bzhin dus sum rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor dang / 'thab bral gi
62b1(mdo): 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dpar byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og myin gi bar gi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur da to//
62b2(mdo): de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur da te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang
62b3(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa ka ta'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran bstan dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang /
62b4(mdo): ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang
62b5(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa de dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / grags 'dzin las mtshogs pa dge slo dam lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyurd to// khams kyi rgyal po//
62b6(mdo): dang / stobs kyi 'khor lo sbyar ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur du to// rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi 'khor da/ kyang 'dus par gyurd to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus
62b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum sbyor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags// de ji ltar 'tshal par bgyi/ bcom ldan
62b8(mdo): 'das kyis bka' ma la pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsold pa/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal/
62b9(mdo): lo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa sad pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu song la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gsol ba tho bshig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa/
63a1(mdo): sha ra dra ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa a 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di god cig/ 'jam dpal kyis sbas pa/ btsun pa ga ya na ti'i bu dkon mchog tal la'i gsung
63a2(mdo): 'gyur pa cu ni// sha ra dwa ti'i lus rnam pa/ 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sbyor pa rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ste/ kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nis 'jam dpal gzho
63a3(mdo): nur gyur da pas/ gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos nyan pa'i 'di dag sgyu ma byung ba sha stag na/ kho bo su la chos bshad/ nyan pa'i ni su yin/ 'chad
63a4(mdo): ba ni su yin/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig/ kho bo nyan to 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pra shwa ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin smras
63a5(mdo): pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi/ tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid/ gang gi tshig bla dgas yin// skal la/ 'jas dpal songapa nyid ni tshig myed paldan
63a6(mdo): sa kyi / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan tu myed pa yin te/ de dag ni bstand tu myed cing mnyan du myed do// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta
63a7(mdo): bu bstan pa de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma myed pa bstan pa/ smon pa myed pa bstan pa/ zang ba myed pa bstan pa/ dor ba myed pa bstand pa/ sros pa myed pa bstand pa ste/ ma gros
63a8(mdo): pa bstan pa yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga' nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'jam dpa
63a9(mdo): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis/ 'jam dpal
63b1(mdo): gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpas byang chub sems dpa'as dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag/
63b2(mdo): bar bshad par bya/ 'jam dpas rgyas smras pa// rab 'byorarod gzungs 'di ni skye babyed par med la bya'o// dngom po myed pa dang / mtshan nyid myed pa dang / spros pa myed pa dang / dor ba myed par yid la byan
63b3(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur da to// lha dang myi drug cu rtsa
63b4(mdo): gnyis ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzad pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das la
63b5(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ci/ 'dra ba zhig lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal dpa
63b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongs su myi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad la/
63b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'dod
63b8(mdo): 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang dag
63b9(mdo): bar brjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan
64a1(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i sems su bya'o// 'dre ba myed pa mar du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems//
64a2(mdo): dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs bache ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang /
64a3(mdo): bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol// sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / thugs rtse ba mngal ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
64a4(mdo): du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dpya das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' lang to// khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma/
64a5(mdo): la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yangadag par rab tu ston par spo ba su yod// de nas byang chub sem/ sa dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
64a6(mdo): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan so da spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang
64a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' spobs pa rtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros myi bzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho
64a8(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin cen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta dang / byang chub sems
64a9(mdo): dpal ltar myi mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' la/ rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin cen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chu
64b1(mdo): sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan dpal dang / byang chub sems
64b2(mdo): cho pa' chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis
64b3(mdo): brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dka' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
64b4(mdo): spobs pa mkhas dang / byang chub semasu dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpalas 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa gyur dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang
64b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'/ nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma myed pa'i/ snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gnyi gdugs snying po dang /
64b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rten pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa dpa' ba dang /
64b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad du smras pa/ bcom lda/
64b8(mdo): 'das srad ma'i tshe/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag cag ce cang lus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang dag par bshad par spro la gso/
64b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni dka' ba ste go cha 'di 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
65a1(mdo): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po sa 'di skad ces bka' saHsad to// rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la pham pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyon cig/
65a2(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ sngags bka' saHla pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
65a3(mdo): tad ya thA/ AM me/ bA ra Te/ b+ha ra Te/ b+ha ra ba ran Te/ bA ran Te swa ha// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la chos// a la la chos// a la la chos shes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjo
65a4(mdo): bzed du brjod pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// chos chos shes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
65a5(mdo): bka' lad pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi myed pa'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po// myed pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam man
65a6(mdo): gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni bla ba myed pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba myed pa'i gzhi'i don to// de nas byang chub sem
65a7(mdo): dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sacald pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ myig dang na ba dang / sna dang
65a8(mdo): rtse dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams
65a9(mdo): cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dkon mchog ta la la'i gzung
65b1(mdo): 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang skye ba myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang
65b2(mdo): 'byung ba myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
65b3(mdo): du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste// rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung ba dang / kun tu btung ba dang / skom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / nam
65b4(mdo): par gzhag pa dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni 'di smra ste// rigs kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par rtag pa'i don to// de nas
65b5(mdo): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas/ yun ci srid cig lon/
65b6(mdo): 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang /
65b7(mdo): zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams ji srid nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i khams yun ji srid nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sa'i khams yun ji srid nas
65b8(mdo): zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rig pa dang / ma rig pa yun ji srid nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun ji srid nas zhugs
65b9(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid nas zhugs pa srid do// sha ra dwa ti'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis
66a1(mdo): sbas pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po myed pa'i ra bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid nas zhugs pa srid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa la 'di
66a2(mdo): skad ces smras so// kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa 'o bo la ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kyi dang / byi la thams cad dam/ tha rnams kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po
66a3(mdo): ri rab gzhig par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa cig gi mtha' yang rtogs par myi nus na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
66a4(mdo): gyu rad pa'i bstan pa ci smos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ku na tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na
66a5(mdo): mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzidi 'gros ba de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba mdzad par de bzhin gshegs pa la ra/ sol ba thob cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pra
66a6(mdo): rang gyi chos kyi bstan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'a de 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
66a7(mdo): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa chos smra ba de dag gi yot+pa gyi khyad par rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsal// bcom ldan
66a8(mdo): kyis bka' saHla pa// 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzind pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi dra chum mam par 'gyur ro// de dag
66a9(mdo): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro// de dag la bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu klags lta ba rnams kyis grags myi rnyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kang su dag chos sba ba'i dge slong
66b1(mdo): de la ser gol gtogs pa'i gcig tsam srid gcig myi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni myir gyur da pa las kyang ring du 'gyur ba yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos// 'jam dpal gas
66b2(mdo): yang gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni mo bkas ngan par 'gyur/ kye dang / sna byed par 'gyur/ rka la ka phyi phyogs su 'gyur/ lus nad bu can du 'chu
66b3(mdo): myig myed par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni myi gti mug pa de dag gi skyod du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal mdor bshad na/ de dag
66b4(mdo): 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu myed pa 'jug go// gal te myir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce myed par 'gyur ro// 'jam
66b5(mdo): dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag/ ni tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze can tu 'gyur/ mchu 'jigs 'jig/ sa ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ sus zhom par 'gyur/ lus cer
66b6(mdo): bur 'gyur/ lus skam por 'gyur/ yi dgas 'dra bar 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang myi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i de dag gi gnas ni/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye gre
66b7(mdo): bsam gis myi khyab pas mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan
66b8(mdo): 'das kyis bka' saHla dpa/ 'jam dpal kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ 'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten myos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ rab tu dngangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam
66b9(mdo): dpal gis gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di lta bu zos nas/ slan cad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar myi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ thugs che bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du/
67a1(mdo): gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ 'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba'i mying la 'di lta ste/ tsha pa dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun tu 'bar ba/
67a2(mdo): dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang / reg dka' dang / drag po dang / mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu lum dang / lcags kyi phye con dang / mun khung dang / mgo stod dang / spre'u tshugs dang / spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab 'bar/
67a3(mdo): dang / ru lad pa dang / rtag tu dri nga ba dang / rab 'joms dang / res 'jom dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal myi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'di dag go/
67a4(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
67a5(mdo): kyis bka' sa sad pa/ kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhu ba de leg sa par zhus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'dra/
67a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha sta//
67a7(mdo): go// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon tu 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mdor na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs myed dpag tu myed de// de dag ni bskal pa stod
67a8(mdo): dag gis kyang brjod myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu ba'ang pos gsold pa// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta
67a9(mdo): bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas yad pa/ kun tu bzang po 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems cad de dag ni/ phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ste/ 'di ska/
67b1(mdo): du 'di dag ni snyan sngags sbyar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no// 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma zos so zhes 'dze rad cing de dag
67b2(mdo): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro// spangs nas kyang 'bol zhing chags par myi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe// sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar ba myi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro// /
67b3(mdo): skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los myi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la lbu bar 'gyur ro// de ltar gyu rad nas kyang skal pa mang po skald pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus
67b4(mdo): long du 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas myi skye bar gyur da na yang / tshe rabs thams cad du dmus lor du 'gyur zhing lce myed pa dang gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / lhag skur dang / 'jing pa nub
67b5(mdo): pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres/ de shing skom pas nyen pa dang / lus skams pa dang / kha mnam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong ram zos na yid du myi 'od
67b6(mdo): par skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad nga ldan pa'i 'khor des 'grin gcig tu tshig sbas pa// bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal pa bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos
67b7(mdo): sba ba de dag la thos pa'i sems kyis bltas par gyurd pa rnams nongs pa nongs par chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar shes
67b8(mdo): rab 'chal par gyurd pa dang / ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams chags shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa
67b9(mdo): dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag sngangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di nas rab tu sngas lags so// bcom
67'a1(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bka' saca lad pa/ grogs po dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so// grogs po dag nga thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes brnyes
67'a2(mdo): ba yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/ gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni myi 'am myi ma yin pa 'am/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sus kyang
67'a3(mdo): rnam par dkrug par myi nus na/ dge sbyong ram/ bram ze gzhan dag gis lta ga la nus te ci smos// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs
67'a4(mdo): kyi bu dag dper na/ dkon mchog za tog ji lta bur mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du lta bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
67'a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa 'di ni legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag/ gis dad pas saHlad pa ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur//
67'a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la myi byams pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs
67'a7(mdo): pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su khyad pa 'am/ tha na dge 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal gcig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
67'a8(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam/ 'on te ring ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saNald pa/ gnas brtan
67'a9(mdo): sha ra dwa ti'i bu kha rog de skad ma spa shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams myed lnga po da ka ni bla'i// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams myed
67'b1(mdo): ba lnga byed pa ni/ mtshams myed pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas phyir skye bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par myi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung
67'b2(mdo): la gzhan yang rung bar byed par 'gyur ro// denas me dang ldan pa kar na to'i nubacom ldan 'das kyi spyan ldan du ning 'di skad ces smram mo// e ma'o dam pa'i nas spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sug bsngal la
67'b3(mdo): las kyi sgrim pa 'di sa bu dag ni bdag gis rgyas sa na yang mthong bar sa gyu da cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan bag nA nA ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' ya to// sha ra na tI'i bu de mas
67'b4(mdo): ma sems yin/ ram mas bsdud pa ni 'byung ba dang / ba yin na/ 'jig rten rnaMlas bdag gir b+hu ba/ rang kyisas kyi gr-i banas sa myong pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems
67'b5(mdo): can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal kyis tshor ba/ myong gi// de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma ldan no// ra dra ti'i bu ras ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/
67'b6(mdo): bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa myed par 'gro ba dang / mya na las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba myed par 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni sus kyis nyes
67'b7(mdo): par gyud pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par gyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par gyod pa dang san zhing / 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sog par g+ha ste/ log par smra ba'i las dang / chos
67'b8(mdo): log par blangs pa'i rgyus sus zhig nupa zhi ba'i 'og tu dran mong ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal pa rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams
67'b9(mdo): cwa nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ras sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i// sems can gcig po ni yongs
68a1(mdo): su btang bar myi bya'o snyam ste// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de dang 'dra'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig la bu cig pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na
68a2(mdo): stug pa/ kha tog bzang po// rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur da na/ myi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde bar gyur te/ du ga
68a3(mdo): zhing smre sngags 'don to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu cig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de
68a4(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin no// sha ra dA ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho che na po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig myi gnas so// sha ra dra ti'i bu
68a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig myi gnas so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gi slob ma mkhas pas lam po
68a6(mdo): che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par stsal te/ bya ba dag kyang ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na myi gnas/ phyogs na myi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gags shing lag pa gyi 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin
68a7(mdo): du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi gyod pa yang ston te/ mdzad pa ston kyang gyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// dper na nam mkha'i khams ni
