114b3(mdo): rten na gnas pa de lta bu la/ bdag gis 'dod pa rnams la ste nad pa ni bdag gi myi cha yi/ 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs tu
114b4(mdo): mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa rnams ni gsal shing lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni mtshon mdung zung lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni ral gyi so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni spu gri'i so lta
114b5(mdo): bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni sA la gi mgo lta bu'o// 'dod/ pa rnams ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni rul/ pa'o// 'dod pa rnams ni dri nga ba'o zhes gsungs so snyam ste/
114b6(mdo): de de ltar skyo nas sna dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim myed par yang dag par rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu 'byung nas ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /
114b7(mdo): khong du ma chud pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon tu ma byas pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang gzhi des kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul tu bshad pa dang / don dam
114b8(mdo): pa'i bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i thos pa 'dzin to// de gnyis ka la yang mkhas pas gdams ngag yang dag par sgom mo/ gdams ngag ma log par bsgom pa la brtson pas/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i tshu
114b9(mdo): la 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las gi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho/
115a1(mdo): ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// des lam khong du chud pas dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po gsal ba dang / de shes pa'i dbang po can no//
115a2(mdo): de dbang po rno zhing dbang po gsal la de shes pa'i dbang po can yin pas/ dben pa mang ba yin te/ de 'du ba thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi thos cad du yongs su spong ngo // smra
115a3(mdo): ba la dka' ba dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / lha la rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // shes kyi
115a4(mdo): zhe 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ste/ de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin te/ de sems la 'di snyam du bdag
115a5(mdo): gi sems 'di ci dge ba la gyod dam/ de ste myi dge ba 'am/ 'on tam lur du ma bstand pa 'am/ chos gang la 'apyod ces rnam par khyod de/ gal te dge ba la pyod na de la sems dam/
115a6(mdo): dang / rangs pa dang / mgu skyed do// dge ba'i chos de dag kyang ga nga zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu bdun no// 'on te myi dge ba la spyod na/ de la skyo ba mang
115a7(mdo): ba dang / rtog pa mang ba yin te/ myi dge ba'i chos de dag spang ba la brtson pa yin no// myi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug go// de la 'dod chags
115a8(mdo): rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring ba dang / rlung ngu'o// de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhen/ gang sus thams cad du khyab ste/ sems kun nas bzung zhing gnas pa dang / gang+gA gis de la man
115a9(mdo): zhing 'dod chags dang / bral ba'i sems myi 'thob ste/ de la gzhol ba'i de la ngo tsha ba dang / 'dzem pa thams cad kyi thams cad du myed par gyur te/ ji ltar na ngo tsha ba dang 'dzem pa thams cad kyi thams cad
115b1(mdo): myed pa yin zhe na/ de gcig pu tog du song ste/ de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog cing / de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/ de nyid la legs par shin tu smon pa dang / de nyid la yang yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na re
115b2(mdo): la ngo tsha ba myed pa yin no// ji ltar na 'dzem pa myed pa yin zhe na/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des pa ma'am bla ma lta bu gzhan dag dang rtsod cing phyir bzlog pa dang / rgol bar byed cing des ngo myi chal/ de la
115b3(mdo): yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na de la ngo tsha myed pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni 'dod chags chen po zhes bya'o// de la 'dod chags 'bring po
115b4(mdo): gang zhe na/ glang gis 'dod pa rnams la stend par gyur da na bya ba grub kyi bar du sten gyi/ bya ba grub nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems 'thob pa dang / 'gyod pa 'thob pa dang /
115b5(mdo): sems la myi 'am ci 'thob pa ste de ni 'dod chags 'bring po// zhes bya'o// de la 'dod chags chung ngu gang zhe na/ gang gis// 'dod pa rnams ste nad par gyur kyang / mnams pa dang / byug
115b6(mdo): pa dang / lus kyi reg pa tsam 'am/ tshig tu smra ba tsam 'am/ mthong ba tsam gyis tshim par 'gyur ba de ni 'dod chags chu ngus zhes bya'o// mdor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i sos
115b7(mdo): su gyur pa ste/ de ni 'dod chags zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang gang zhe na zhe sdang yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang / 'bring po dang / chung ngu'o// de la zhe sdang chen po gang zhe na/ zhe sdang gi rnam pa
115b8(mdo): gang gis zhe sdang zhing rngam 'khrugs gtum par gyur du nas/ mtshams myed pa lnga las gang yang rung ba las la byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba gang byas pa la mtshams myed pa lnga bsdoms pas kyang grangs
115b9(mdo): su yang nye bar myi 'gro/ cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang rgyur yang nye bar myi 'gro ba de lta bu byed/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye zhing / gal te/
116a1(mdo): brgya la myir skyes na yang gnag cing myig dmar la gtum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yang sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de ni zhe
116a2(mdo): sngang chen po zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur da te/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i las byas na/ myur bar myur ba skyen pa skyen pa la gor la gor du 'gyod cing de'i gnyen po la yA/
116a3(mdo): ste nad pa ste/ de ni zhe sdang 'bring po zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang chung ngu gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur nas/ tshig tsam dang / myi snyan pa tsam dang / ngan du brjod pa tsam gyis myi dge ba'i las bsachags pa/
116a4(mdo): ste/ de'ang de la brgyal bar 'ga' 'byung ste/ byung na yang skad cig de nyid dang / yud tsam de nyid dang / zang cig de nyid la gnyen po la sten pa ste/ de ni zhe sdang chung ngu zhes bya'o// de la gti mu/
116a5(mdo): gang zhe na/ gti mug kyang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste// chen po dang / 'bring po dang / chung ngu'o// de la gti mug chen po// gang zhe na/ gaji skad du smos pa'i gnas de dag la nyes kyang
116a6(mdo): dga' zhing mya ngan du myi byed/ smre sngags myi 'don 'gyod pa myed pa yin te/ de ni gti muka chen po zhes bya'o// de la gti mug 'bring po gang zhe na/ gang gis myi dge ba'i las la la byas kya
116a7(mdo): la gor la gor du 'gyod cing tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi drung du chags shing myi 'chab la/ de la yon tan du'ang myi lta ba yin te/ 'di ni gti mug 'bring po zhes bya'o// de la gti mug chu ngu gang zhe na/
116a8(mdo): gang gis rang bzhin gi kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa bcas pa'i kha na mtho ba/ bslab pa kun spyad pa'i lam gnyis gsum las 'da' ba ste/ de ni gti mug chung ngu zhes bya'o// de la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
116a9(mdo): phyir bzlog pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar sems la mkhas pa la gang 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa rnams la lhag par chags pa de lta bu myed pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir/
116b1(mdo): zhe na/ de ltar sems la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// 'on te lung du ma bstan pa la gyod na/ de la dran pa dang ldan zhing nan tan tu byed la/ de brtag pa la brtson pa yin te/ de la ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa la gyod pa yin/
116b2(mdo): zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems phyi rol du 'ang myi rgyu/ nang du 'ang myi rgyu/ dge ba la'ang myi gyod/ myi dge ba la'ang myi gyod/ lhag mthong la 'ang myi gyod/ zhi gnas kyang myi 'dzin cing / zhum la gnyid kyis non par
116b3(mdo): gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nyal nyal ba las sad pa myig gnyid kyis bsgribs pa'i sems myi gsal ba de bzhin du de'i tshe sems de myi gsal bar rgyu ba ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' ses
116b4(mdo): yang dag par gzer stod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par gzhag pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la mkhas pa yin no// de de ltar
116b5(mdo): sems la mkhas pas tshwa 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// chos 'di dag/ ni rmyi lam lta bu'o// chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o// chos 'di dag ni// myi dge ba'o// chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o// chos 'di dag ni myi
116b6(mdo): 'byung ba'o// zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni sems la gnas pa/ sems las byung ba/ sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/ sems shin tu bci la
116b7(mdo): shin tu btul/ shin tu khong du chud par byas na// chos de dag thams cad kyang shi nad tu bcil ba dang / shin tu btul ba dang / shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/ des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/ rgyu de dang rkyen de
116b8(mdo): dang / gzhi des sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ de sems nyid la sems 'dogs so// sems nyid kyis sems zhi bar byed do// sems nyid la sems rab tu 'jog go// de de ltar zhi ba la brtson
116b9(mdo): bas sems rtse gcig tu 'gyur te/ rtse gcig tu red nas mnyam par gzhog go/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa la/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba mngon tu 'gyur te/ de yid dga' bar gyurd nas/ 'dod/
117a1(mdo): pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang / bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par
117a2(mdo): byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa myi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed cing dka' ba dang bde ba'i ro de'ang myang bar myi byed de/ myi rtag go snyam nas bsam gtan dang po las sems skyed do// de rtog
117a3(mdo): pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing chags pa myed pa'i yid du gyurd pas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur da pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba bde ba can
117a4(mdo): bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// e dga' ba'i sdug bsngal yin par khong du chud par byed de/ sdug bsngal lo snyam nas// rgas ma sa nan yin/ ma gros la gnas pas dran pa dang ldan na shes bzhin
117a5(mdo): can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dka' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa
117a6(mdo): pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bsam gtan gsum pa stong ngo snyam nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la sems gtong ste/ des bsam gtan bzhi pa thob pas bdag tu 'dzind pa phyir ldog
117a7(mdo): go// bdag tu 'dzind pa phyir ldog pas/ bde ba yang spong sdug bsngal ba yang spong ngo // de bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba 'ang nub pas/ bde ba yA/
117a8(mdo): ma yin sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa btang ba snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bdag gi lus dang / nam mkha'i lus su gcig tu mos par byed de/ de de/
117a9(mdo): ltar mos pas gzugs kyi 'du shes las thams cad du thams cad yang dag par 'das pa yin/ thogs pa'i 'du shes kyang nub pa yin te/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang
117b1(mdo): par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams su nub par gyur da cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas/
117b2(mdo): te gnas so// de'i tshe'i de'i rnam par she pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang ldan pa yin te/ de rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
117b3(mdo): de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ ci yang myed do snyam nas/ ci yang myed pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de ci yang myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/
117b4(mdo): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas so// de'i gor na gang sems kyi mtshan ma myed pa rgyu ba thams cad 'gags pa/ sgribs pa thams cad dang bral ba 'di
117b5(mdo): ni 'gog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni shes par bya'o snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par 'jug gi/ de la mngon par dga' ba'i rten gyi gnas myi skyed do// de byams pa dang ldan
117b6(mdo): pa'i sems kho na myed pa/ 'gran zla myed pa gnod pa myed pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyur da pa/ tshad myed pa/ myi gnyis pa/ shi nad tu sgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nas
117b7(mdo): rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / tha dang / 'og dang / bad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan
117b8(mdo): ba'i 'jig rten 'di la byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems// khon byed pa 'gran zla myed pa gnod pa myed pa yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyu rad pa tshad myed pa myi gnyis pa/ shi nang tu bsgoms pas mos te/ khyab par
117b9(mdo): byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / ldan pa'i sems kho na myed pa 'gran zla myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa
118a1(mdo): tshad myed pa myi gnyis pa/ shi nad tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ci lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsu
118a2(mdo): pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / pra dang 'og dang / zad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di la btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kho na myed pa/ 'gran zla myed pa/ gnod pa myed
118a3(mdo): pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyurd pa/ tshad myed pa myi gnyis pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de mngon par shes pa lnga skyed do// de la yang ma zhen pa yi
118a4(mdo): te/ gong du 'ang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'i chos rnams yongs su tshol lo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum
118a5(mdo): tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan// na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams/ yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag myed pa la mthu
118a6(mdo): pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par sbyind pa la mkhas pa rnams yi na/ 'dus byas la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgyun la ma kham pa rnams yin/ 'khor pa ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams
118a7(mdo): yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ bdud kyi las yongs su spong ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ ma log pa'i shes rab
118a8(mdo): can rnams yin/ mnyam pa myed pa'i shes rab can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag myed pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang
118a9(mdo): dag pa'i shes rab kyis gzugs la rtog/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog ste/ de gzugs la rtog pa na/ gzugs kyi skye ba myi dmyigs/ kun 'byung ba myi dmyis
118b1(mdo): 'gag pa myi dmyigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba gyi dbyigs/ kun 'byung ba kyi dmyigs/ 'gag pa myi dbyigs so// de yang don dam
118b2(mdo): par gyi bskad kyi rang bzhin du ni ma yin te/ des don dam pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / baspyad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka yang brjod pa'i rang bzhin tu gyi dbyigs te/ de'i phyir
118b3(mdo): 'grus kyang nyam par gyi byed de/ mgo 'am gos la rtse 'bar pa bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus chom ste/ tshigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag byed pa la mkhas
118b4(mdo): pa yin no// de ltam byang chub sems dpa' las kyi nas byin pa la sems pa yin zhe na/ 'dis byang chub sem pa dang da ltar byed du rten gnas pa 'din gang gi yang
118b5(mdo): dang 'dra ba dri ba'i grong zer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong sems can 'di dag kyang sems can ma yin no// 'on kyang bdag tu la dzin pa sa mngon par rten pa sa/ de dag de'i phyimal pa khong cu
118b6(mdo): bgyi 'thob 'o// de dag ni 'di sam cu gal te bdag gis ses can nam/ srog kas/ skye ba po 'a/ gso' ba 'askyes bu 'am/ gang bag gas/ shed las skyes sam/ shed/
118b7(mdo): bu byed de/ dge ba dang / myi dge ba'i las kyirnas par smin pa'ang byed par 'gyur ro// sram du sems med kyisems can byed du zin kyang las kyirnam par smin pa 'a dzin nam ba ste/ de la byang chub ra/
118b8(mdo): dpa' de dri sam sems de'ang byed la/ ji ltar dge ba dang kyi dge ba'i las rnams kyi rnam par sbyin pa yang mngon pa de/ yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa'i ji ga pa bzhin tu rab tu gas te/ de ska na/
118b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par sbyin pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal 'dus byas kyi chos rnams
119a1(mdo): yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs par byed cing / 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ni myi gnas pa g.yo ba'i zil ba'i thigs pa lta bu ri bo'i 'bab chu lta bu yin no// de la
119a2(mdo): mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhen pa dang / chags par byed pa 'am/ de dag myed par gyur pas/ mya ngan du byed snyam nas/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang
119a3(mdo): bral ba dang / 'gog pa la sems gtong ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no// ji skar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyan la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
119a4(mdo): sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ba'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni ma rig pas mdongs pa 'khor ba la phyogs pa/ sred pa'i zhags bras bcings pa ste/ yind pa nye ba ma le nad to// de le nad pa'i
119a5(mdo): rgyus dge ba'i dang myi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed de// de dge ba dang myi dge ba'i las mngon bar 'du byed pa dang ldan bas srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur te/ de'i rgyu las
119a6(mdo): skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i yod pas rga bar 'gyur ro// rga ba 'i chos can ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba las mya ngan dang skye sa gas 'dond pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang
119a7(mdo): 'khrug pa rgyun chags pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gi phung po chen po chen po 'ab shig po de zo chun rgyud mo'i khor lo ltar 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rgyun tu 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de'ang byang chub seMs
119a8(mdo): dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal 'khor ba ldon
119a9(mdo): pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ ma rig pa myed par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen par myi 'gyur/ 'du byed la zhen pa myed par gyur da pas/ rnam par shes
119b1(mdo): par myi 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa myed par gyu rad pas/ mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa myed par 'gyur ro// sred pa myed par gyur pas lend pa myi 'gyur/
119b2(mdo): ste/ len pa myed pas srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor bar myi 'gyur/ srid pa'i nying mtshams sbyor ba myed par gyur pas skye bar myi 'gyur/ skye ba myed par gyur pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dond pa dang /
119b3(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnam rgyu dang chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub
119b4(mdo): sems dpa' 'khor ba'o// @pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
119b5(mdo): dpyod de/ chos 'dis ni rgyun tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'di// sa ni lan lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'dis ni phyir myi'o// nga bar 'gyur 'dis ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srid pa'i
119b6(mdo): kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/ nying mtshams sbyor ba myed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro// chos 'di ni rang sar bya bse ru lta bur gcig pu gyod par 'gyur ro// snyam ste/
119b7(mdo): de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed de/ chos de dag mngon du yang myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can gyi khams bdag
119b8(mdo): gis gzung bdag gis seng ge'i spa bsgrags te/ sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa thams cad bskal lo zhes dam bcas la gcig pu 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ba ni bdag gi
119b9(mdo): myi cha'o snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
120a1(mdo): sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la yang slob la/ slob pa yang myi dmyigs/ bslab pa'i lam yang myi dmyigs/ gang slob pa de yang myi dmyigs so// rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des chad par
120a2(mdo): lta bar yang myi ltung ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las spong ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' myi dge
120a3(mdo): ba'i grogs po thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ myi cha' ba'i yul la gnas pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsar tshig la sten cing sgom pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro/
120a4(mdo): la ched cher 'dzin pa thams cad kyi thams cad kyi yongs su spong // nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gang byang chub kyi lam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad du yongs su spong zhing / de dag
120a5(mdo): gi gnyen po la yang dag par stend te/ de ltar na byang chub se/ mas dpa' bdud kyi lam yongs su spong ba la mkhas pa yin/ no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab
120a6(mdo): can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos dang / gsang tshig dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad shes rab gtong te/ de sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i
120a7(mdo): phyir te/ shes kyi zhe 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/ de la yon tan tu lta ba'i phyir ma
120a8(mdo): yin no// gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/ gsung rab 'di ni dam pa ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snyam nas/ de de la yon tu lta bas mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ba can du myi 'gyur
120a9(mdo): te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa myed pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems
120b1(mdo): dpa' lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skyesage sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
120b2(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par gang de dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta bu'i sems can sems can gyi rim na myed de/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ skye
120b3(mdo): dgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis ma nond te/ de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa myed pa'i shes rab can yin no// rigs
120b4(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum chog pa nas yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu
120b5(mdo): gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa na// mas yin no// mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas// pa rnams yin/ yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas/
120b6(mdo): pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa yid la gcags pa'i selang pa'i bas mkhas pa rnams yin/ sems can dpung gnyen byed pa'i thab sa mkhas pa rnams yin/ sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar
120b7(mdo): sbyor ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ len pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzer stod pa dang /
120b8(mdo): yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed 'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thagra mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
120b9(mdo): yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs la ma khral yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag me tog gi rnam pa 'am/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa ra yir bya ba myed pa yongs su gzung ba myed pa de rnams
121a1(mdo): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo// dge ba'i cha ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o// de gang 'di
121a2(mdo): dag bcug pa'i shing ngam/ spos kyi shing ngam/ rin po che'i shing ngam/ dpag bsams kyi shing ngam/ me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba myed pa yongs su gzung ba myed pa de dag kyang nyin lan gsu
121a3(mdo): mtshan lan gsum/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o// de mdo sde rnams las mchod
121a4(mdo): pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba gang 'di dag rgya chen po rgya che ba dag nyan cing de dag snying zag pa nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mchod gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo'o// gang phyogs
121a5(mdo): btsun byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de ma yin pa'i sems/ can dag dge ba'i las rnams byed cing byang chub kyi phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag snying bag pa nas rjes su yi/
121a6(mdo): rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu yongs su thA la// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la me
121a7(mdo): tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos gsol ma/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ba bsal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o// de phyag
121a8(mdo): dar zhal zhal byed na sems dpa' can thams cad kyi spyod lam myi sdug par 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o// de me tog gi gtugs gsol na/ sems can
121a9(mdo): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba myed par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das/
121b1(mdo): las 'das pa'i ye shas kyis pad 'gro thams cad kyi sku dbya'o snyam du sems spyad de/ ba'i grong khyer du gzung do snyam du sems bskyed do// de phyir 'byung na 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ranA
121b2(mdo): gdon to snyam du sems bskyed do// de gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de sgo gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'a
121b3(mdo): thams cad kyi sgo rnams gcad do snyam du sems bskyed do// de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying la 'god do snyam du sems bskyed do// de gro g.yas pas nyal na 'di ltar sems can tha
121b4(mdo): cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bar yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems skyed do// de de na sa ldang na 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa kun nas snang ba rnams
121b5(mdo): las bslang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de lus kyi ched la 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gro/ sa su 'gro bar gyur da cig snyam du sems skyed do// de der 'uH/
121b6(mdo): na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo // snyam du sems bskyed do// de bkru bshal byed na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
121b7(mdo): pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems skyed do// de lag pa stsal na 'di ltar se ldan med kyi nyon mongs pa'i dring ba rnams bsal lo snyam du sems skyed do// de rkang 'khrun 'di ltar sems can thams/
121b8(mdo): cad nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// de so shing za na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems skyed do// de lus kyi g.yo
121b9(mdo): pa thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / pade par yongs su bsgo'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis phyag
122a1(mdo): bya bar shog shig snyam du sems skyed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par
122a2(mdo): zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal 'di lta ste mu stegs can yod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa las bsogs pa'i mu stegs can gyi gnas de dang de dag tu 'phrul pa dag
122a3(mdo): tu mngon par 'phrul te/ re sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir thabs byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyi zil kyis non pas// bdag gis sngar slob dpon gi tshul
122a4(mdo): gyis gdul bar ni myi nus kyi slob mar khas blang ngo // snyam ste/ de de dag gi khrod du rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ji ltar spyod pa dang / spyod yul dang mang du zos pa dang spyod pa dman tshes
122a5(mdo): kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de dag zi lad kyis gnond pa de lha de lta bu rtsol lo// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de de dag gi nang na slob dpon dang / phra ma lta bur bkur bar 'gyur
122a6(mdo): tshig gzung zhing dag myi gcog par 'gyur te/ de kye sems can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du shes nas/ grogs po dag 'di ni skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par 'gyur ba'i la
122a7(mdo): ma yin no// zhes mu stegs can dag gi sngags pa ma yin pa brjod par 'gyur te des mu stegs can gzhan de dag gnas de rnams las bslang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'god do// de
122a8(mdo): phyi rol kyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag gi gan du tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// de tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing chos de thob par bya ba'i phyir spyod cing rtsol lo 'bad do// de rtsol zhing 'bad pas
122a9(mdo): bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub ste/ ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gzhan de dag pas ches mchog tu gyurd pa dang / ches 'bar bar 'gyur pa dang / slob dpon
122b1(mdo): gyi mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / mkhas pas bkur bar 'gyur pa de ltar sgrub bo// des sems can de rnams yongs su smyind pa'i dus dang / tshod shes nas/ grogs po dag lam 'di ni skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang/
122b2(mdo): bral ba dang 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no// zhes bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi sngags pa ma yin par brjod pa yin te/ des sems can de dag gnas de las slar
122b3(mdo): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'god do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs cad rnam par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las ni
122b4(mdo): par zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'as sems can gang rab tu 'dod chags can rab tu 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can rnams mthong na/ des de dag gdul ba'i
122b5(mdo): babs gzhan byed do snyam nas/ des de dag gi drung du bud myed yul dpa bzang mo ltan sdug pa/ bud byed thams cad kyi mtsho/ ka dag 'phrul te/ sems can de rnams de dag la rab tu chags
122b6(mdo): bar rig nas/ sprul pa'i bud myed de ma la de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed du 'jug go// de yang skad cig de nyid dang / yud tsam de nyid dang thar cig de nyid la rul cing dri nga ba dang / 'jigs par 'gyur te/
122b7(mdo): de dag gis kyang de mthong nas sngangs skrag skyo bar red de/ bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i dri nga ba'i nang nas gang tha rad par byed pa su zhig yod ces nyam zag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems
122b8(mdo): can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ byang chub gsum las gag kyang rung ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can de dag la chos ston te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus las rnam par zlog pa'i
122b9(mdo): thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa yil bcags pa sel pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can su mtshams myed pa'i las byed pa'o//
123a1(mdo): myi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na de'i gang du song ste/ kye skyes bu ci'i phyir yid myi bde zhing myi dga' bar gnas zhes de skad zer ro// des kyang smras pa'i rigs kyi bu bdag gis mtshams myed/
123a2(mdo): pa'i las byas pas de'i phyir bdag la yun rin por gnod pa dang / phan pa myed pa dang / sdug bsngal bar myi 'gyur grang zhes yid myi bde zhing myi dga' bar gnas so// de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' smos
123a3(mdo): ga 'dzin tu 'jug go// nyes la'ang chags su 'jug go// de la chos bstan pa 'ab mo zab mo yang byed do// de ste 'gyod pa kyi gtong na de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul lam sems kun brjod pas ka yang dag par yid ches pa bskyed do// de nas seMs can de/ yang dag par gI ches pa skyes na
123a4(mdo): gag zhag ga nas ker gyung ro// de dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnyed pas/ de chos bsta nad tu rung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de dang mthun par 'dzind par 'gyur ro//
123a5(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de'i mdun tu 'di lta ste/ pha mar sruld pa mngon par srul da te 'di skad zer ro// kye skye/ sa bu khyod ltos la 'gyod pa ma byed cig/ ra yang khyod kyi grogs
123a6(mdo): te las 'di lta bus su yang shi nad tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ don thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba myed do// las de ye shes kyis bsal du myi nus pa yang ma yin no// zhes de skad
123a7(mdo): spras nas/ pha ma srog dang phrul lo// srog dang bral nas kyang yang rdzu 'phrul de ston to// de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang bral na/ bdag 'dra ba lnga ji zhig
123a8(mdo): spos snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa' de yang de'i tshe/ sems can de la ci nas kyang de'i las de snad bu'i 'dab pa 'dra bar gyu da pa de lta de lta bur chos stonang par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'argya
123a9(mdo): pa yid la bcags pa sel pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gar
123b1(mdo): chos bstand par rung zhing nus pa dag mthong nas/ de dag kyang shin tu myi dge ba'i las byed par gyur da na/ de dag gdul ba'i thabs su byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa dag mngon par phrul te/ de la sems can gang
123b2(mdo): nams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la rgyal por sprul pam ldan sa/ sems cad gang rnam sa blon po chen pos 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la blon po chen por sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang
123b3(mdo): rnams bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gi gyi dang / yul gyi gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gi myi dang / yul gyi phyir sprul pa dang / sems can gang rnams lus 'phru
123b4(mdo): pa de dag la/ sngar sprul pa dang / gang lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba de dag lagra na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gar rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa stond/ seMs
123b5(mdo): can gang rnams brdeg pa dang sdigs pa dang / gsang pa dang brtsi/ rabs 'dul ba de dag la re 'dra bar ston/ sems can klu / rnams de bas 'dul ba de dag la nges pas 'dul/ sems
123b6(mdo): can gang rnams mtshams myed pa byed 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la brgyab par 'dod pa de dag thabs sna tshogs kyis bzlog cing zi lad kyis gnon par byed/ phyogs gzhan du
123b7(mdo): yang bskar bar byed do// mtshams myed par 'gyur ba'i dngos po smos te/ de 'dra bar de'i mdun du spruld pa stond to// yang dag sems can dmyal ba stond to// mngon par shes pa ma skyes pa'i byang chub
123b8(mdo): sems dpa' tshe'i mtshan ma shes pa ni/ byed 'dod pa dang / gsod 'dod pa'i sems can de dag mthong nas/ snying rje chen po'i sems skye ste/ de yang 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni phung por
123b9(mdo): 'dod pa'o// kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni brlag par 'dod pa'o// snyam du sems shing de dag des lag mthil tu skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthor nas/ myi dga' ba'i sems chen po skyed de/
124a1(mdo): de yang 'di snyam du sems so// bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab du ma bzhag gi bar du mnar myed pa'i sdug/
124a2(mdo): bsngal bkur bar bzod na/ sems can 'di rnams kyang myi dge ba'i las byas te/ mnar myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa thabs gzhan gis ni bzlog par myi nus te/ sems can de rnams
124a3(mdo): me yang zung dad pa 'ang byed pa dag/ cig la yul gzhan du skur pa 'am/ pi lad kyis glan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag la myed na/ sems can 'di rnams kyi dge ba'i las 'di lus zhig nas/ mnar myed
124a4(mdo): pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar myi 'gyur grang / zhes de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ las bdag gir bya ba dang / 'thun par byas nas/ sems can de rnams la byams
124a5(mdo): pas khyab par byas te/ zabs gzhan gyis myi nus nas/ chad pa rab kyis 'chos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no//
124a6(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par myi lcogs
124a7(mdo): myi nus te/ zas dang gos lhur 'dzind cing / de kho nas chog par chi ba mthong na/ de rjes sa byang chub sems dpa' yi ge dang / bstan bcos dang / lag cis dang / grangs dang / shod zabs las btsogs pa'i
124a8(mdo): las dge ba dang ldan pa dag ston te/ myi dge ba dang ldan pa myi stond to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
124a9(mdo): dpa' le nad pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam thob na yang len te/ dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na yang le nad to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di ltar
124b1(mdo): sems te/ sems cad 'di dag ni ser ma can/ brkam bachags pas bil gyis non pa 'jungs pa yin te/ d+hu dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi dris chu'i phung po chen po sa non pa bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung chub byed
124b2(mdo): ba/ de dag la de ni yun ring zer don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ sum ste de grangs nas bdag gis kyi byed pa/ chags pa'i sems kyi skyed de/ gzhan dun sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
124b3(mdo): rgyab dang / chom dang dge 'dun dmas rgya bskyed do// sems can drus thasas pa rnams la yang ba par byed do// sbyin pa'i bdag pa de yang yamadag par gabe sod pa dang / yang dag par gi nang tu dga' bar byed na/
124b4(mdo): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' le nad pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
124b5(mdo): can gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lcogs shing / nus pa zhig la/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob par rtsol
124b6(mdo): shing / 'bad de/ brtsom 'grus rtsom pa mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslang ste/ zan 'khor dbye ba yang byas nas// theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas
124b7(mdo): gnas su slob pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'jim tu 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng stong pa dang / yang drug par shin du tu dka' bar byed pa'i thabs
124b8(mdo): mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sems can byang chub kyi sems skyed du 'jug/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems can le lo can/ brtson 'grus chung ba
124b9(mdo): tshul khrims tsam gis chog par 'dzind pa dag ni brtson 'grus la 'jog/ sems can gang rnams bslab pa kun gyod pa phra mo las gal ba dag rgya de dang // rkyen de dang gzhi des sems kun khebs shipa 'khod/
125a1(mdo): dga' mgu rangs pa yang myi rnyed pa de dag la/ de ci nas kyang gnas de nas ldang ba de lta de lta bur chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa dang /
125a2(mdo): yang dag par gzeng stong pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba'i thabs mkha
125a3(mdo): pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gyur te/ rnyed pa chung yang rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin/ de gcig pu lkog du song ste/ rab tu dben par gnas nas/ de 'di ltar sems
125a4(mdo): ste ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim mo bya ba bsam mo snyam nas/ de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems pa de'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug
125a5(mdo): sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar na pha rol// da tu phyind pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na// de la gang mchod pa rim gro bya ba mngon par byed pa 'di ni de'i sbyin
125a6(mdo): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de la gang sems can thams cad la dmyigs pa'i sems skyed pa'i di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// mchod pa dang
125a7(mdo): rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems pa mngon par mos shing / shi nang tu dga' ba 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sems kyi skyo ba 'di ni de'i brtson
125a8(mdo): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang nye bar rtogs pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa
125a9(mdo): 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
125b1(mdo): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myi
125b2(mdo): dman pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ ma gum pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa
125b3(mdo): pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad gi nad tu char gcod pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dri pal myi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ myi skrag
125b4(mdo): smon lam pa rnams yin/ yongs su myi skyo ba'i smon lam pa rnam sa yin/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa rnams na no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi dman
125b5(mdo): pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba 'dod cing smon lam myi 'debs te// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi dman pa'i smon
125b6(mdo): lam pa rnams yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsu ma las skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par smon
125b7(mdo): lam myi 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
125b8(mdo): sems dpal 'di ltar sems can gyi khams ci snyed ma lus par de thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas/ bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smon
125b9(mdo): lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i
126a1(mdo): smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sems kyi khams ji snyed pa de thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug ste/ mtha rad kyis
126a2(mdo): byang chub kyis spyad pa spyod du btsud nas/ byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams
126a3(mdo): kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs su gsol lo// zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na bya/
126a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu char gcod pa'i smon la ma pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/
126a5(mdo): ci nas kyang bdud kyi smra'am/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'bru/ ra bar yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lham 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad
126a6(mdo): shin tu mar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang ts+tsha sems dpa' gzhan gyi drangs kyi 'jog pa'i sgon lam ma yin te/ na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gi dri ngal bla na byed pa yang
126a7(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam kyi 'debs kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyis kyis shes rab kyis dpyad de/ sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal pa la bltas nas/ bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs
126a8(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dri la myi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang
126a9(mdo): chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi tshogs rnams kyi phyogs 'ga' zhig bzung nas nyi che ba'i smon lam myi 'debs kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.ya
126b1(mdo): pa'i lha ra sa la btsugs te/ sems skyo bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams rnams su bltas te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang / gang dag dka' ba spyod pa
126b2(mdo): la gnas pa dang / gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba de rnams la snying zag pa nas pasas
126b3(mdo): de dag gis chos bstan pa ji snyed pa de dag la mos par byed do// mos par gyur nas rjes su yi rang ngo // rjes su yi rang nas bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su tho ste/ de ltar na
126b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi skrag pa'i smon lam pa sti zhe na// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin yang chos
126b5(mdo): zab mo zab mo rnams tho pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab/ mo zos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams par rol pa/ zaza ma thos pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo thos
126b6(mdo): kyang myi skrag myi dngang dngang bar myi 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sa ngas rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mtha' yas la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis seMs
126b7(mdo): can yongs su smyin par par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/ de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par myi nus kyi/ sangs rgyas dag nyid kyis mkhyend kyi/ bdag gis myi shes so snyam du sems te/ de ltar na byang chub seMs
126b8(mdo): dpa' myi sdug pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su myi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod/ sems can 'dul dka' bar rig
126b9(mdo): pa ste/ de rnams kyis yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i chu rgod 'di lta bu gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go zhes ste/ de'i phyir yongs su skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur da te/ gang na sems can
127a1(mdo): 'di lta bu dag gi mying yang myi thos pa'i 'jig rten gi khams yongs su dag par smon lam myi 'debs so// sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su dag pa'i
127a2(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams su skye bar yang myi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can kA rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung ba/ blun po glen pa lug
127a3(mdo): ltar sdug pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su mya ngan las kyi 'da' ba'i chos can sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'di las bsdigs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs
127a4(mdo): par gyurd pa yod pa de dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur pa la/ bdag gis de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug tu 'jug ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
127a5(mdo): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems skyed de/ byang / chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa'i sems bskyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu gso'o// sangs
127a6(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du
127a7(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par 'am rAN+Da ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su m+b+ha skye ba'i smon snyam pa son no// rigs kyi bu ji sa ra byang chub sems dpa' legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i
127a8(mdo): pham pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud gi dpung gzhom pa dang / bra na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
127a9(mdo): par 'tshang rgya ba dang / yang de las par smon lam myi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na mar ram 'bru mar gi sdod 'chad du gang ste/
127b1(mdo): lhag pa'i rdul phra rab tsam gi thigs pa yang myi shor na// de'i phyir me ma'o snod gang pa e ma'o snod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
127b2(mdo): rgyas pa la/ smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ smon lam ma rdzogs pa rdul phra rab tsam yang myed do// de bas na legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi
127b3(mdo): bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//
127b4(mdo): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zi lad kyis myi gnond pa'i stobs ngan sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ myi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum gas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs phun sum chos
127b5(mdo): pa rnams yin// shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa/ rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dpa
127b6(mdo): gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par myi zhugs pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bka'
127b7(mdo): myi gtsigs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zil kyis myi nond pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang
127b8(mdo): chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol pa kukyi zil gyis myi nond pa yin te/ de ltar na zil kyis myi nond pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi tshugs pa'i stobs
127b9(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs kyis thub pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gi ris na myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi tshugs pa'i stobs phun
128a1(mdo): sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phus tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten 'jig rten pa'i
128a2(mdo): 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin
128a3(mdo): zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs kyi chos gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang / mngon du ma byas pa dang / khong du ma chud pa de dag
128a4(mdo): byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun gyi tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
128a5(mdo): dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin/ lta ba nyams pa// ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin// gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa'
128a6(mdo): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub seme sa dpal 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin
128a7(mdo): zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gi yul thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gi yul thams cad zild kyis non te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gi stobs bskyed pa/
128a8(mdo): mchog gis zi lang gis gnon to// de 'dod na 'dzam bu'i gling skra nyag ma gcig gi rtse mo la 'jog go// de bzhin tu gling bzhi pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gi khams dang stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gi stod
128a9(mdo): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyang de bzhin no// 'dod na gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog go// de bzhin du gang ga'i klung gnyis gi bye ma snyed dang / gsum dang
128b1(mdo): bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas/ brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab gcig la 'jog kyang /
128b2(mdo): rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang bri bar yang gyi mngon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du gdos par myi 'gyur/ sems can de rnams la gnod par yang myi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
128b3(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal dbang gi sto zas phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig
128b4(mdo): rten gi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob bo// de 'dod na brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang bar byi
128b5(mdo): kyis rlob ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stob/ sa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la
128b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzi snyed cig don tha dad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge tha dad pa dang / brjod
128b7(mdo): pa tha dad pa dang / tshul tha dad pa dang / tshul ba dad pa'i chos bshud pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sa/ skad cig yud tsam thang cig cig la/ thams cad 'dzin par byed/ khong du chud par byed/ sgom par byed de/
128b8(mdo): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par myi 'khrugs pa'i byin kyis rlabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na// de bzhi
128b9(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpas byin gyi rlabs byin du rlabs pa la/ gang rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu
129a1(mdo): sems can gyi ris na myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par myi 'khrugs pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyi stobs phun sun tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' myi
129a2(mdo): gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu sems can gi ris na ma mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na
129a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bka' myi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
129a4(mdo): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag myed pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la/
129a5(mdo): bdag myed pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa yin/ pa ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ti nge 'dzin kyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams
129a6(mdo): yin/ byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ myi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun su
129a7(mdo): tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum
129a8(mdo): tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag myed pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas phung po rnams
129a9(mdo): skye ba yang yang dag par mthong 'jig pa dang / 'gog pa yang yang dag par mthong ngo // des phung po skye ba rnams snying po myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / gsog tu yang yang dag par mthong / phung po 'gag
129b1(mdo): pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni bdag myed pa sems myed pa/ srog myed pa/ gso' ba myed pa/ gang zag myed pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin/
129b2(mdo): pa la mngon par zhend pa 'di dag ni 'di ltar bdag cag gi phung po rnams bdag ko// bdag cag phung po rnams la bdag yod do// bdag cag gi bdag la phung po rnams yod do// bdag cag gi bdag ni phur mo can no//
129b3(mdo): snyam ste/ de dag bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de kho na nyid khong cu rtsi chung // de kho na nyid khong du ma chud pas mgal bye'i 'khor lo sngar 'khor ba ma 'khyam mo snyam du sems shing / de thams cad
129b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpas yang dag par ji ltar ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag byed pa'i ye / sa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
129b5(mdo): dpa' chos la bdag myed pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin// zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos su sgro 'dogs pa// dang / chos la skur pa yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du ra/
129b6(mdo): tu shes te// de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtag/ sa pa'i mying gdags ste/ chos de yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ yin de dag kyang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin mod kyi/ 'di ni mying tsam dang /
129b7(mdo): tha snyad tsam du bya'i/ 'di la mngon par zhes par myi bya'o// glo bu du byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad gi mas ca du byed pa ma yin te/ gzhan gi rkyen dang / gzhan gi rkyen la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung
129b8(mdo): ba zhing / rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni yod do// zhes de thams cad byang chub sems dpas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag myed pa'i ye
129b9(mdo): kes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyid che ba ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpal nyim pa'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing /
130a1(mdo): skad cig gnyis pa la myi 'jug pa ma yin gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni skad cig thams cad la thogs pa myed par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i
130a2(mdo): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
130a3(mdo): rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang rab tu shes so// des
130a4(mdo): ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzind gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyod yul gang la rang sangs rgyas spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/
130a5(mdo): ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzi nad kyi spyod yul gang la byang// chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzind// dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs TI
130a6(mdo): spyod pa de 'ang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu shes kyi/ ma par sbyin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no/
130a7(mdo): ting nge 'dzin gzhan rnams ni rnam par sbyin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzind kyi khyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar
130a8(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpal nyan thos kyi byin gi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
130a9(mdo): rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu zhes byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang
130b1(mdo): byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na// 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu steg/
130b2(mdo): can thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis myi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na/
130b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag pa dang zhing rnyog pa myed pas sems can
130b4(mdo): gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/ des de na sems can la la byang chub sems bskyed pa dag dang / la la byang chub tu sems ma bskyedapa dag dang / la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrubs pa dag dang /
130b5(mdo): la la byang chub kyi sems ma bsgrubs pa dag dang / la la sa// dang po la gnas pa dag dang / la las bcu pa'i bar la gnas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag da
130b6(mdo): pa la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo/ rab tu bskor ba dag dang / la la bya ba kun byas te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yod/
130b7(mdo): su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba dag dang // la la ngan 'gror skye ba dag mthong ngo // de ltar sems
130b8(mdo): can thams cad kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dang
130b9(mdo): lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gyod pa 'am/ 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba na lhun gyis grub cing ye shes 'byung ste/
131a1(mdo): 'di lta ste dper na myi gnyid kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa dag lhun gyis 'grub cing 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de yang de bzhin du lta'o// ye shes de yang thams cad
131a2(mdo): du myi chags par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum chog
131a3(mdo): tha yid zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi tshan nyid mtshungs par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig par yang rab tu shes// mtshan nyid du mar yang rab tu shes/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'ang
131a4(mdo): rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du 'ang rab tu shes ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs
131a5(mdo): kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das// pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'a// de la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa myed pa'i ye shes 'jig
131a6(mdo): rten thams cad las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
131a7(mdo): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
131a8(mdo): yangs shing tshad myed pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams yin// gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral rnams yin/ chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa rnams yin/ sems /
131a9(mdo): can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur da pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur da pa rnams yin// rin po che'i snod du gyur da pa rnams yin/ rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur da pa rnams yin/ myi skus
131b1(mdo): ba rnams yin myi sdang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal yangs shing chad byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po thams cad du yangs shing tshad myed do//
131b2(mdo): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis kun tu yangs shing chad myed pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing chad myed pa yin no// ji ltar na/
131b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar yo byad rnam pa de de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur/
131b4(mdo): pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab las sotshogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams
131b5(mdo): dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin te/ de ltar// na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba
131b6(mdo): gyurd pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang / lan tu phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste rig sa kyi bu dper na sa chen po ni gnod pas kyang zhe 'gras par myi/
131b7(mdo): 'gyur/ phan pas kyang rjes su chags par myi 'gyur te/ de la gnyis su 'du shes pa myi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gnod pa dag kyis kyang zhe 'gras par myi 'gyur// phan pa dag gis kyang
131b8(mdo): rjes su chags par myi 'gyur te/ de ni sems can de dag la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba yang myi skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang lan du phan 'dogs pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar
131b9(mdo): sems dpa' chos kyi srin chen po kun zed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po ni sprin chen po las bab pa'i chu'i klung chen po kun zed de/ bzod cing kun 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub mas
132a1(mdo): dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi 'od pa chen po rab tu phab pa kun zed cing bzod pa 'dzind te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin no//
132a2(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// de bzhi
132a3(mdo): du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i gnas su gyur da pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur da pa yin
132a4(mdo): no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gi gzhir gyur dra ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon thams cad ni sa chen po gzhir gyur pa las skye'o// de bzhin du ses
132a5(mdo): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang/ chub sems dpa'i gzhir gyu rad pa las skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gi gzhir gyur pa
132a6(mdo): yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la ste dper na sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod yin te/ sa chen po la
132a7(mdo): rin po che sna tshogs kun sdang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ste/
132a8(mdo): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i sdod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ci chen po'i snod du gyurd pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtse chen po gang dag
132a9(mdo): nad rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar gyur da pa dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo // de bzhin du gang dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nang rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rmi
132b1(mdo): po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sa gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi skul pa
132b2(mdo): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ma sa chen po ni 'di ltar na sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sprul da gis reg pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi sprul pa yin no// de bzhin du
132b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyir nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi skul ba yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' myi sprul pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji
132b4(mdo): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byi sdang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyibu 'di lta ste dper na sa chen po ni rgyang po'i rgyal po dang / ri dgas kyi rgyal po rnams sna tshogs kyi sla bos kyang myi skrag myi dang
132b5(mdo): dngang bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyi sgra thos na myi skrag/ myi dngang dngang bar myi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
132b6(mdo): sems dpa' myi sdang ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dge dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams na no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa
132b7(mdo): chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge bo'i chos la gzhol ba rnams yin/ dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/ dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher
132b8(mdo): pa can rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul ba rnams yin/ dang zhing rnyog pa myed de gsal ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/
132b9(mdo): 'dod pa la sred pa thog pa na ma yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mthon dman 'gengs pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i tshul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no// rikra/
133a1(mdo): kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub
133a2(mdo): sems dpa' yang dge ba'i chos la gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos
133a3(mdo): thams cad skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu ni rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / mi dang nags tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pa rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
133a4(mdo): sems dpa' yang ting nge 'dzind kyi chus byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed do// skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad ma nad pa nyid kyi shing du gyur kyi bar du phyir zhing rgyas par byed do//
133a5(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gis sangs/ rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems// can rnams 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
133a6(mdo): dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin no// ji snya na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs po'i gsher ba can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu
133a7(mdo): na rngam nyid kyis gsher ba can te/ gzhan yang gsher ba byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang ngo bo nyid kyis dga' ba dang / dang pa dang / rangs pa'i gzer ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang /
133a8(mdo): dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can du byed de/ de la dga' ba' ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o// dad pa'o ni sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la rten pa'o// rangs
133a9(mdo): pa'aM gang sems dag bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad rgyal
133a10(mdo): ba yim men/ rigs kyi bu 'dis ma/ dmaman/ chun gong gi rnam pa dang / chu'i nim pa'i sa bdag gi rgyud rnams sprul lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdus
133b1(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i tsha ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun 'di dag gi myir yang myi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i bag chags kyang myed par 'gyur ba de lta bur srul te/ de ltar
133b2(mdo): na byang chub mos dag can yongs ni sa ni rgyun zas cad skul ba yin no// ji ltar na dang zhing rnyog pa myed de gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu ni rang bzhin gis dngo zhing rtog pa myed de gsal lo// de bzhin du byang chub
133b3(mdo): sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa myed de gsal ba yin no// de la bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba dang bral bas na dang ba'o// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral bas na rnyog pa
133b4(mdo): myed pa'o// dbang po rab tu dang bas na gsal ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang zhing rnyog pa myed de gsal ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdub pa rab tu
133b5(mdo): zhi bar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu ni sa chen// po dpyid ka'i tsha bas gdungs pa dang / de las gzhan yang se/ mas can rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi
133b6(mdo): bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mong sa pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
133b7(mdo): nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdungs pas rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa bzlog pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu ni skom pas nye nad pa'i sems
133b8(mdo): can rnams kyi sgom pa rnam par zlog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la sred pas nyen pa'i sems can nyen par gyur pa dag la gang gis sems can de dag gi yul la sred pa ldog par 'gyu
133b9(mdo): pa de lta bu'i chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi sku/
134a1(mdo): 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i 'dzings ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang 'di lta ste bdud thams cad dang mu stegs can
134a2(mdo): thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
134a3(mdo): bu 'di lta ste dper chu'i klung ni sa phyogs mthon dman 'gengs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu'i klung gis sems can gi khams mthon dman 'gengs te/ ji ltar chus 'gengs pa ltar sems
134a4(mdo): can la gnod par byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gi/ sems can de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu'i klung 'bebs shing / de dag la gnod par myi byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
134a5(mdo): mngon dman 'gengs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub semasadapal nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin// zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chus ni sa'i phyogs
134a6(mdo): skam zhing rdul 'thul pa thams cad snum par byed cing rdul de dag zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lta ste shes rab la gnas pa'i
134a7(mdo): ting nge 'dzin kyi chus sems sdum par byed cing sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa
134a8(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rgya dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu rom bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtse dang mtshungs pa rnams yin na//
134a9(mdo): gang zhe na 'di sa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dam khung thams cad kyang sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su sbyind par byed/ nyan mongs pa'i 'dam khams cad kyang skam par byed/ mye'i thub
134b1(mdo): bo dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ snang bar gyurd pa rnams yin/ skrag par byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byind pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyurd pa rnams yin/ mchod par byed pa
134b2(mdo): rnams yin/ myi brnyas par byed pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu ngal ji ltas rtsa chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ce na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na me ni phyag dar khung dang rtswa dang /
134b3(mdo): shing dang / gel pa dang / rtsi dang / sdong po thams cad sreg go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mu/
134b4(mdo): gi nyon mongs pa'i phyag dang rba thams cad sreg ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dang khung thams cad sreg pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgya
134b5(mdo): kyi chos thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed cen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste dper na me'i lo tog dang / rtsi dang / sdong po'i rnam pa/ thams cad yongs su smyin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
134b6(mdo): sems dpa' yang zhes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smyin par byed pa 'ang ji ltar 'jig par myi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smyin par byed do// de ltar na sangs rgyas
134b7(mdo): kyi chos rnams yongs su smind par byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'das thams cad skam par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar sde dper na me'i ni chu bran gi 'dam thams
134b8(mdo): cad skam par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams
134b9(mdo): cad skam par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mye'i phung po dang 'dra ba'i yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can brang ba'i nad kyis nyen pa rnams kyi grang ba myed par bya bI
135a1(mdo): phyir mye'i phung po byed do// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i grangs pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad myed par bya ba'i phyir shes rab
135a2(mdo): kyis rab tu dro bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gangs kyi rtse mo 'am/
135a3(mdo): ri dbyigs byed gi rtse mo na me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba des dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sdar bar byed// dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang / dpag tshad gsum kho ra khor yug du yang snang bar byed do/
135a4(mdo): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi snang bas dpag da tshad brgyar yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong du'ang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar yang khyab par byed pa nas/ 'jig
135a5(mdo): rten gi khams dpag du myed grangs myed pa'i bar du yang khyab/ par byas nas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis sku// nga bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba des myi shes pa'i mun pa
135a6(mdo): mun nag thams cad rnam par sel da te/ de ltar na byang chub se mas dpa' snang bar gyu rad pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub se mas dpa' skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di
135a7(mdo): lta ste dper na ri dgas khro bo 'am/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po khro zos mye'i phung po chen po mthor na skrag cing dngangal dngang bar gyurd cing 'di lta ste mye'i 'jigs pas skrag pas gnas de ring ba bas kyang shin
135a8(mdo): tu ring bar spong ngo // de bzhin du bdud rnams sam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na skrag cing dngang la dngang bar gyurd cing // 'di lta ste gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir gang du byang
135a9(mdo): chub sems dpal rnams kyi phying yang mye thos nas mthong ba la spos kyang ci dgongs par ring bas kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs de yongs su song ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems skrag par byed pa yin no//
135b1(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byind pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dperi myi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las mye'i phung po chen po mthong ste/ de de logs su song ba dang /
135b2(mdo): des de grong ngam rdzi'u brang mthong nas de nas de shugs phyi nad de rab tu dbugs phyi nad nas/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon
135b3(mdo): par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na/ shugs phyind par 'gyur rab tu dbugs phyi nad par 'gyur// nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/
