135b4(mdo): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byind par yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur da pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar ste dper
135b5(mdo): na mye ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur da te/ ji ltar/ na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la ya/ da de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang seMs
135b6(mdo): can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang
135b7(mdo): thun mongs du gyur da pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na myed la ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi myi dang / yul gyi myi
135b8(mdo): rnams kyis mchod do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang 'di lta ste/ lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis stond par 'du shes pas mchod de/ de ltar na byang chub
135b9(mdo): sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no// ji ltar na myi rnyas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mye stag chu ru yang 'tshig pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na myi nus pa yin no// de bzhin du mos pas/
136a1(mdo): spyod pa la gnas pa'i byangang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs ma rnyed pa theg pa chen po la las dang po pa yang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis myi rnyas pa yin no// de ci'i
136a2(mdo): phyir zhe na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' ni ring por myi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
136a3(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mye dang mtshungs
136a4(mdo): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu ga zhe na 'di lta ste gnas myed par spyod pa dang / spyod yul kun tu mu
136a5(mdo): myed pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis snyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhi// nga 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa dang / chos kyi char sprin che/ na po kun nas skyed pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
136a6(mdo): gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin dpag
136a7(mdo): tu myeng pa kun 'dzin pa dang / chos rnam pa la dad pa'i gzhal myed khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su 'god pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpas bsam ni
136a8(mdo): shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par nges pa'i me tog yid tu 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa dang / skal pa grangs myed par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsdum
136a9(mdo): pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo brgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khar pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri las srog
136b1(mdo): pas yongs su bsko rad pa'i sems can gyi 'kho shi kyil 'gron 'dru pa yongs du sbyind par mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na myed cing lus myed pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor ra
136b2(mdo): gtong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas myed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs pa myed cing gnas myed de rten
136b3(mdo): myed de/ gzugs myed kyang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / ri rab dang rgya mtsho las stsogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed pa snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
136b4(mdo): rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu myi gnas pa yin te/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang // myig gi khams dang /

136b9(mdo): rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag
137a1(mdo): tu/ 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag tu 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dag la yang gnas

139a2(mdo): kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar stor gyi 'jig rten gi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams lta'o// ji ltar stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams

139a6(mdo): ba'o// des rgya mtshos na ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyam tsha rnams // gling dang / bar gyi thing dang / rigazhan dang / gling chen po lams tshogs pa ltar ni spor ba dang / gzungs dang /
139a7(mdo): can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / thob ma'i dge 'dum lam grags pa la'o// grong rdas dang / nags tshal dang gzhal byed 'ang lar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i sangs su dag pa la son/
139a8(mdo): bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag bsams kyi shing kyi nags tshal rnams par nI sa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / ye shes snang bar/
139a9(mdo): dbang dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po las batshogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam yun sum tshigs
139b1(mdo): bu'i chos rnams bskum// rigs kyi thu des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod rnams bcu palamatshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste dperan/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu la byon/
139b2(mdo): re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ga' ga'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa/
139b3(mdo): gyurd la/ de ltar bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam pa de sdoms pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po gcig cig ldan par 'gyur te/ rnam
139b4(mdo): grangs des shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das/ te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de snyed cig/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de 'dra ba nyid dang
139b5(mdo): so sor ldan par gyur pa la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig/ rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtug/ sa pa/ dag na sems can yod do cho ga ji snyed pa de dag
139b6(mdo): thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang / so sor ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis jig rten gyi 'ams de snye du gtogs pI sos can rnaMs brgya byin gyi
139b7(mdo): bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan bri byi/ 1gyur da la/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung
139b8(mdo): po ci tsam pa de dang / brgya byin gcig gcig ldan par gyurd te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtus pa/ thams cad na sems can gang ji snyed
139b9(mdo): 'khod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin de dang 'dra ba'i sha stag gyur pa la bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ka'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems
140a1(mdo): can de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur la/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig tu sdoms pa dang / tshangs pa chen po gcig gcig ldan par gyur pa la/ tshangs pa chen po ji ltar bar sems
140a2(mdo): can thams cad kyang de bzhin du gyur da te/ snga ma bzhin du bgrang ba'i de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang / rang sangs rgyas dag dang / byang chub sems dpal chen po thob pa 'od gzer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bskur ba
140a3(mdo): dbang bskur ba dbang bcu thob pa/ sha stag tu gyurd te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu myed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khas su gtogs pa dus gsu
140a4(mdo): pa/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de dus gsum gyi nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad dus phra
140a5(mdo): rab brgyar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung/ bu gcig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad/ du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs myed
140a6(mdo): pa bcur bsgyur bas/ dpe' byung bzang po brgyad bcu la dpe' byang babang po re re mngon par 'bru ba za// dpe byang bab baur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de thams cad badz+ra/
140a7(mdo): du byed pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du myed pa bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprin mtshams kyi mdzod sku/
140a8(mdo): zla ba nya pa ste/ dri ma myed pa'i dkyil 'khor stong pas kyang lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan par mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du myed pa bye ba stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas de bzhin gshegs
140a9(mdo): pa'i spyi bcug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bsngar gyi snang ba gtsug tor gyis yongs su brgyad pa mngon par 'grub bo// de yang brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
140b1(mdo): stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pa dmyigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba spun gyis grub pas sems can
140b2(mdo): thams cad bsam pa yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du go bar byed pa marlona'agrub ste/ rigs kyi bu de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yod nas rgya'i mtshan ces bya'o//
140b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs myi bzad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa/ bkod pa dang ldan pas sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rim
140b4(mdo): kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na// gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rkyen gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnaM
140b5(mdo): sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog/ dang ldan pa lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyan 'chang ba dbang bcu/ la dpar sgyur ba/ sha stag tu gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs
140b6(mdo): pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po la 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che sna cho gas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ nam mkha'i tshad
140b7(mdo): tsam gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed so so nas thogs te/ phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par yongs su bkar zhing skad cig skad gcig tu blangs shing khyer yang ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
140b8(mdo): po de gang ba 'am/ bri bar myi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems//
140b9(mdo): ma skyed pa'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba'i dang / dri ma myed pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can dang / shi nad tu sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon tu gyu dang / ring du song dang / myi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo
141a1(mdo): gro ba dang / chos kyi sprin dngasas rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od te/ sa bcu gnyis po ni de dag rko// de la byang chub kyi sems ma skyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i gyod pa dang //
141a2(mdo): log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / khyad zhugs shing
141a3(mdo): 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su myed pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od
141a4(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa myed pa'i stobs kyi shugs chang pa/ 'jig rten gi khams grangs myed par skad cig re re la gro zhing 'ong na/ dri zhim po dang 'od gzeradra ba'i tshogs chen po
141a5(mdo): gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kun tu 'byung ba// pad mas rkang pa yongs su brtan pa/ stong gi 'jig rten mi khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i stand kyi rgyan dang ldan pa
141a6(mdo): chos thams cad shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa ra bsgoms pas/ thogs pa myed cing yid du 'ong ba'i dmyigs pa 'i mtshan ma chen po bcu las stsogs pa grangs myed po'i ltas
141a7(mdo): bzang po mthong ba phyir myi ldog pa/ phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa/ thams cad 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis myi khyab par rab tu 'gyed pas// zhing dpag tu myed pa'i rgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi
141a8(mdo): khams brjod du myed pa'i 'jig rten gi mnga' bdag dpag myed pa snyed kyi bdag gi gzugs brnyan gyis dpang bskur ba/ yang dag par gnod pa'i dbang dang / byin kyi brlabs la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa
141a9(mdo): dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin po che'i char kyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu myed pa thams cad gtan pa myed par kun tu rgyas par 'gyengs pa'i mchod pa sbyin pa chen po'i sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/
141b1(mdo): blta na bzang zhing yid du 'ong la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang / myi mthun pa myed cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa
141b2(mdo): rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro ba/ ngan 'gro las satshogs pa las sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / chos kyi sgo 'dzin nus pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang /
141b3(mdo): gzungs dang rnam par tha rad pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs myed pas rnam par rol pa/ chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas/ zang zing myed par phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar
141b4(mdo): buthug pa'i rnam par myi rtog cing / lhun gyis 'grub pa'i dka' ba'i byags kyi snang ba thob pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zer 'bum dpag tu myed par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshog
141b5(mdo): yongs su rdzogs la/ gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyi nad pa'i/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa/ grub pa'i sngon gi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs pa'i
141b6(mdo): mos pa chen po yi yang chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang bo de ma thag tu 'thob par gang gnas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sem sa dpa'i byang chub gi sems ma bskyed pa'i sa'o// rigs
141b7(mdo): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni myi'i kha dog las ni 'das la lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal yang / 'jig rten pa dang / nyan 'os dang / rang sangs/
141b8(mdo): rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das pa yin/ don dam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang dpung myed pa ma lus pa dri ma myed pa'i chos thams cad
141b9(mdo): la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do// de la ting nge 'dzind rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
142a1(mdo): kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste rim cem kun tu 'phags dang / nang tu gnas pa dang / myi skul ba dang / phyir myi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / nyi ma'i 'od
142a2(mdo): kyi gzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / ye shes smon ma dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
142a3(mdo): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin da ni mtha' yas so// gzungs ni bcu ga ga zhen/ 'di lta ste dbang skur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / dgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa dang / myi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil
142a4(mdo): pa mtha' yas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad ma bkod pa dang / chags pa myed pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan
142a5(mdo): byin kyis brlabs pa dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang sangs rgya/ sa kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/ de dag las stsogs pa snga ma bzhin tu sbyar ro// mngon pa
142a6(mdo): shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lha'i myig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / pha rold kyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gi kan sa rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul mngon par
142a7(mdo): shes pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs myed dpag tu myed par byin gyis cho
142a8(mdo): pas/ tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin brjod du byed pa'i yang brjod du byed pa la nges par rtog cing / 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bkod pa'i brgyan
142a9(mdo): du mas brgyan par byin kyis rlob pa stond pa'i tshul gis yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smyind pa byin kyis rlob pa stond pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gi khas
142b1(mdo): thams cad du skye ba stond pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang ba stond pas mos pa la dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par mngon par rdzogs pa/
142b2(mdo): byang chub pa stond pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa stond pas/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba mtha' dang dpung
142b3(mdo): myed pa yongs su stond pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe' byad bzang po dang
142b4(mdo): mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad du ga/ rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs las mtshogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnam pa
142b5(mdo): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye she/ sa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ston pas ye shes la dang / nga ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/
142b6(mdo): dpar rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs dang / smon
142b7(mdo): lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub
142b8(mdo): sems dpa'i stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gzungs kyis zos pa 'dzind cing / don bstand pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / bdag myed pa 'o
142b9(mdo): du chud pas gzhan gtse ba'i mtshan ma myi 'byung zhing / rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du myed pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i myi 'jigs pa dang / chos bzung ba
143a1(mdo): sun tu myi brjed pa dang / thabs dang zhes rab mthar phyind pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa stond pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du myi 'gyur ba'i myi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems
143a2(mdo): ma nyams shing / theg pa gzhan gyis myi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la myi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
143a3(mdo): myi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ma bstand pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstand pa'i
143a4(mdo): tshul khrims can rnams dang / ma bstand pa'i bzod pa can rnam/ das dang / ma bstand pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams dang / ma bsta/ na pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang / ma bstand pa'i shes ra
143a5(mdo): can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad/ sdud pa rnams dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang
143a6(mdo): gis theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba stond pa rnams dang / pheg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo stond pa rnams dang / zung dang / snrel gzhi'i rgyud
143a7(mdo): la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du myi byed cing / kha na ma tho ba myed par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha'
143a8(mdo): dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus le nad pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba rnams dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga'
143a9(mdo): bar stond pa rnams dang / byis pa dang / nyan thos myi babad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang / dge ba'i mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam sa ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems yongs
143b1(mdo): su ma nyams pa rnams dang / chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas/ dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bstan pa las myi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems
143b2(mdo): dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa'i mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
143b3(mdo): kyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par sbyin pa len pa mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyend pa
143b4(mdo): 'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
143b5(mdo): byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / sngo/ na gi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'gro/ dang skye ba mkhyend pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad par mkhyen/
143b6(mdo): pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto pas rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
143b7(mdo): par byang chub pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du myi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstand pa la myi 'jigs pa dang / phun
143b8(mdo): sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba 'byung ba lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la myi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras
143b9(mdo): ba bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la ste de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba byed pa dang / maco myed pa dang / bsnyel ba byed pa dang / sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa myed pa dang / ba dad pa'i 'du shes myed pa dang / so song
144a1(mdo): ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms myed pa dang / mos pa'i nyams pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa myed pa dang / dran pa nyams pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa myed pa dang / shes rab nyes/
144a2(mdo): pa myed pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa myed pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong pa 'jug pa dang
144a3(mdo): da ltar kyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang / lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye
144a4(mdo): shes rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon tu 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bco brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhi
144a5(mdo): gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin// gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni/ rnam pa sum bcu cha gnyi/ sa dang ldan par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams mtha'
144a6(mdo): yas mu myed pa dag tu bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad ni bdag myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni bdag myed par ma
144a7(mdo): mos pas/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni sems can tu smra'o zhes sems can rnams
144a8(mdo): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni srog myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni srog tu smra'o zhes// de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen
144a9(mdo): po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gang zag myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni myed pa yin na
144b1(mdo): sems can rnams ni yod par lta'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gnas myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gnas la rten to zhes sems can
144b2(mdo): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gzhi myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gzhi la dga'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// /
144b3(mdo): chos thams cad ni ra 'ir bya ba myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni nga'ir bya ba la rten to// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag po myed pa yin/
144b4(mdo): na/ sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la brtson no zhes/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa yin na/ sems can
144b5(mdo): rnams ni dngos po la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhi// na gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni ma// skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes
144b6(mdo): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni shi 'phos myed cing ma skyes pa yi na na// sems can rnams ni shi 'pho dang skye ba la rten to zhes
144b7(mdo): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin na/ sems can rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes/ sems can rnams la
144b8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'dod chags par byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
144b9(mdo): bugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni zhe sdang bar byed do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos
145a1(mdo): thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyurd to zhes de'i phyir/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad 'ong/
145a2(mdo): pa myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba myed pa'i yin na/ sems can rnaMs
145a3(mdo): ni 'gro ba la gnas so zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod
145a4(mdo): do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni spros pa myed pa yin/ na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i phyir ses
145a5(mdo): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni stong pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni lta// ba la zhen to zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshes
145a6(mdo): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma mye da pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul can no// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
145a7(mdo): rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni smon pa myed pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni smon lam la spyod do zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig
145a8(mdo): rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing / gnod sems gi za ba dang / zhe sdang la zhugs pa gzigs nas/ de dag la gnod sems kyi za ba dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos bstand par
145a9(mdo): bya'o zhes/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam pa khar zhugs pa/ lam gol ba la gnas
145b1(mdo): yin gyis/ de dag yang dag pa yi lam du gzung bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni rkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil kyis non
145b2(mdo): pa ste/ chog kyi shes shing gzhan gi nor la 'phrog pa yin gyis de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang / tshul khrim pa dang / zom pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ro tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la 'god do//
145b3(mdo): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru la sred pas 'khrold pa ste/ snying po myed pa la snying por 'du shes
145b4(mdo): pa yid kyis de dag la shi nad tu myi rtag pa bstan par bya'o// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni myi rigs pa'i 'a
145b5(mdo): ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis/ de dag/ la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstand to// zhes// sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o
145b6(mdo): kye ma sems can 'di dag ni cho ga myi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni cho ga shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin gyis/ de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde
145b7(mdo): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas shin tu chog par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa la
145b8(mdo): rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag la byung zhing khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad
145b9(mdo): ni rgyas nye bar 'gro ba ste/ bslabs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni 'phags pa'i rnams par grol ba la le lo byed/ de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i brtson 'grus
146a1(mdo): rnam par rnam pas dang rten pa sems can rnams sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i lugs rje rje zla'o// sems can rnams mi chags pa myed pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan
146a2(mdo): dang sa 'das pa 'du btang zhing gang 'di nyid thos kyi sdig pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ga 'dun ma yin gyis de dag pa gang 'ad sas rgyas kyi shes pa rtsigs par byab phyir/ men pa 'thom pa sa
146a3(mdo): bya'o// zhes sems cadan rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pa skye ste/ rigs kyi bu nam kha sum bcu ma gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen ne
146a4(mdo): skye'o// de bas de bzhin gshegs pa zugs rje chen po la gnas pa zhes byas ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can drag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen
146a5(mdo): bo skyen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bso da nams kyi zhing gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa'i phyir myi ldog pa/ sems can ga don la brtson par rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po/
146a6(mdo): 'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa na/ srog chags stong phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog chags brgya
146a7(mdo): stor ni myi sme ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rigs kyi bu de ltar na de dag las phyogs la
146a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi chos rnam par dgod pa'i dpag tu byed grangs myed de de dag phyi ma'i mkhali bur thug pa'i bska
146a9(mdo): par/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mthal byed na/ sems can rnams kyi dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs cam zhig bstand te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
146b1(mdo): thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu myed pa kun 'dzin nus
146b2(mdo): pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper rlung mar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu myed cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / chags pa char sprin dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po
146b3(mdo): bzhi par bcas pa ri rab dang / ri btang bzung dang / btang zung chen po dang / gangs dang khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal myed
146b4(mdo): khang gi rnam par bcas pa dag yongs su 'dzind to// de bzhi dan du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu myed pas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa
146b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi sprin gis phab pa'i gtan pa myed pa'i chos kyi char gyi rgyun chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzind to// 'jig/ rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe ji skad du brjod pa'i ri
146b6(mdo): rab dang / rgya mtsho dang / gling chen po bzhi pa dang ri btang zung dang ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / khor yug ri dang / khor yug ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi ngad ldang dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang /
146b7(mdo): nags tshal dang / gzhal myed khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang / sa dang pha rol tu phyind pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang dang spobs dang myi 'jigs
146b8(mdo): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la stsogs pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad yongs su 'dzind to// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
146b9(mdo): rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu myed pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par yongs su 'dzind do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu myed pa kun 'dzin/
147a1(mdo): nus pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal myed khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing / yongs su 'god pa yin zhe na/ rig
147a2(mdo): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rlung mar ni gzhal myed/ dgod pa'i rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs thams cad kun nas gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de/ nags tshal dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / mdapa ma
147a3(mdo): dang / ldum bu dang / myu gu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po las stsogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang / nying lag rnam par dbye ba sna tshogs su rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad
147a4(mdo): par yongs su gzhog cing / rnam par 'byed de/ gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma chags shing //
147a5(mdo): mtha' yas pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'ad// sa pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sgo sna tshogs nas yongs su gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang
147a6(mdo): bar byed/ yongs su stond par byed/ thob par byed cing / rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ rnam pa 'di dag 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan song sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro sgrub
147a7(mdo): pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag na
147a8(mdo): myir sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni lhar bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni 'khor los sgyur bar sgrub pa'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdu ste/ 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni
147a9(mdo): gzugs dang / g.yog dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / dpal chen po sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni sgyu rtsa lad to// 'di dag ni gzo'i gnas so// 'di ni bstan bcos sna tshog
147b1(mdo): la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ste/ 'di ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni theg pa chen po ste rnam pa
147b2(mdo): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don yang dag par 'thob par byed pa kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams
147b3(mdo): dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / dbang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thard pa rnams dang / stobs rnams
147b4(mdo): dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma 'dres pa rnams so// zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag las stsogs pa rnam pa tshad
147b5(mdo): myed pas gzungs par ma bkod pa las sogs pa la mkhas pa/ sa/ chos bkod pa rnam par dgod pa dag byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhas myed
147b6(mdo): 'ang chen po'i bkod par rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'a byed cing yongs su 'god pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi shing las
147b7(mdo): shind tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par rnam par nges pa me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chung dmar ni dpag bsams zhing gi/
147b8(mdo): nags tshal dag las gang gis lba dang phyi rnams shi nad tu dka' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan byed par rnam par rtse zhing dga' la dka' mgur spyod de/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chang par 'dog dang stobs/
147b9(mdo): dang / mthu dang / yid bde ba las yongs su myi nyam pa de lta bu'i spos dang / me tog dang / rgyar dang / gos dang / rnga dang / sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra las stsogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par
148a1(mdo): 'bebs yongs su spyod cing / 'byind par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
148a2(mdo): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas sems can dag la gang nas sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par chos kun dga' la mos shing 'dund pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba myed pa dang /
148a3(mdo): gzi dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skyo bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa dang / myi nyam pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyis snang bar gyur pa
148a4(mdo): pas/ rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par gdong bar 'gyur ba'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung bstan pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde
148a5(mdo): dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang // skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / chos rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / gtan la bab par bstand pa'i sde
148a6(mdo): dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i me tog las stsor/ sa pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so// rjes su 'thun pa dang / rjes su myi 'thun pa dang / snre la gzhi dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud
148a7(mdo): las stsogs pa'i gtam rnam par nges pa'i nye bar sgrub pa'o// bsnyad kyi dmyigs pa thams cad la bdag myed pa zhi zhing rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brjod cing ston la rnam par byang bar byed do// chos thams
148a8(mdo): cad sgo kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba yongs su stond to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed do// chos thams cad la dga' bar che ba'i
148a9(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa rnams kyi sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad kyi lung bstan pas tshim par byed do// mtha' dang dbung myed pa'i rdzu 'phrul la mkhas pa skyed de/ de ltar
148b1(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gi dkyil 'khor dpag bsams kyi gling las shind tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag pa rnam par gdon myi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no//
148b2(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs myed par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstsags pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang / rnam par b.rad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / za ba dang
148b3(mdo): nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i khor yug ri la stsogs pas yongs su bskord pa'i sems can gyi kha'o kyi dkyil 'bod na gdul ba yongs su smyind pa mar po yang dag par
148b4(mdo): gnas pa bla na myed cing lus myed pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'ji jug pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug
148b5(mdo): ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams/ gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang / 'or yug ri dang
148b6(mdo): rgya mtsho las stsogs par bcas pa kun nas 'jig cing / rnam par thor ba dang / dmyeg myed par byed cing nam mkha'i rang bzhin tu byed pa/ de lta bur stobs kyi shugs thogs pa myed par ldang ngo //
148b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chung mar yang bskal pa mang por tshogs bstsags pa'i sems can bsod nams dang ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byas
148b8(mdo): chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstand pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa myed pa rab tu bskor ba'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags
148b9(mdo): pas chos kyi phung po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis 'dul ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par myi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa dang / tshul bzhin yid/
149a1(mdo): la byas nas yang dag par sems nang tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind phun sum tshogs pa la rten te/ srid pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus thams cad gshig cir rnam/
149a2(mdo): par gtord te/ lus myed par byas nas/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa rnam par gshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa/ bsam gyis myi khyab cing gzugs myed pa'i
149a3(mdo): bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstand par rnam par gzhig pas// gnas gyurd pa rnam par dag pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa/ rnam pa thos
149a4(mdo): cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa// de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtor te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bas lang pa grangs myed par dkar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bsdam
149a5(mdo): pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par ba rad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang / 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags tshal dang / 'dra ba dang / dge ba'i
149a6(mdo): khor yug gi ri las stsogs pas yongs su bsko rad pa'i sems cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gdul ba yongs su sbyind pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa/ bla na myed ming lus myed pa'i
149a7(mdo): gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chung nam dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// de nas
149a8(mdo): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas 'di skad ces gsolang to// A la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan zhing sems can rlabs
149a9(mdo): po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po 'di dag bstan pa bcom ldan 'das rngo mtshar to// bde bam gshegs pa ngo mtsha rang to// bcom ldan 'das lnga dang kyi la latsam 'di dag la mom zhing rnan
149b1(mdo): tan bgyid pa de dag thams cad ji snyed du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bde ba dang bcas pa yid bde ba dang bcas par thoza bar 'gyur te brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong la stsogs pa zhig bgyin
149b2(mdo): na yang gzhan gi don la gzhol zhing tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
149b3(mdo): te/ sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la nan tan du byed pa de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bltas pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs
149b4(mdo): pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang spong ba'i skyes bu glen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la ste nad pa'o//
149b5(mdo): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan// du bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gar
149b6(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste dri ma myed pa rnams yin/ ma chags pa yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ shes rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin// ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam
149b7(mdo): pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du mos pa rnams yin/ so sor myi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog ge
149b8(mdo): spyod las 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan na// byang
149b9(mdo): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams la chags par yang myi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang myi 'gyur
150a1(mdo): ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams dang / dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang reg bya rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par yang myi 'gyur
150a2(mdo): khor khro bar yang myi 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / grags pa dang ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pas chags par yang myi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang myi
150a3(mdo): 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba lta bu rnams yino//
150a4(mdo): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa dang / mthong ba dga' ba rnams yin/ chos dkar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos nag po rnams 'bri bar byed pa/
150a5(mdo): dang / rab tu bsngags pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag/ pa rnams yin/ gzhon pa mchog la zhon pa rnams yin// rtag tu brgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi kun dka' la mos
150a6(mdo): shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin/ no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas
150a7(mdo): ji ltar na 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bas rab tu sim par byed do//
150a8(mdo): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba ga ra na yang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba dang / dga' la dang dad pa dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong bas sems can thams cad
150a9(mdo): kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba sha rad na// zhi kyog nga na dang/ ses gi tu pa byed gang sems can thams cad mthong na dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal
150b1(mdo): zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste dbang po rnam par gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no// /
150b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yar kyi ngor la zla ba nya ste rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par gyurd kyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla
150b3(mdo): pa yang thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ gzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de
150b4(mdo): na rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba mar gi ro la bab pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khom 'u dog dang snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ba ste/ bco lnga
150b5(mdo): ji ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du myi mngon pa de ltar dbri// 'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bzla ba yang nam 'jig/ rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa de na de'i myi
150b6(mdo): dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar byang chub kyi snying po la thams cad kyi thams cad du myed pa ra 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
150b7(mdo): dper na tha ba sha rad na bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yul gyi myi skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems
150b8(mdo): dpa' zla ba sha rad na yang lha dang myi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di ltar rang gi
150b9(mdo): bsod nams kyi las rnam par sbyind pas grub pa ni yongs su dag ste rnyog pa myed cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i lus kyang 'di lta ste chos nyid kyis mngon
151a1(mdo): bar grub pardzus te skyes pa/ pa ma'i bcog pa dang mer mer po las byang pa ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa myed cing dang ba dang gsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba/
151a2(mdo): ni bzhon pa mchog la zhon te/ gling bzhir snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gi khams mtha' yas mu myed par snang
151a3(mdo): bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyand cing rgyan ma rnyis pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di ltar yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis rtag tu brgyan pa
151a4(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i ni rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba la mos pa yin/ no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang rtag tu rgyun gyi/
151a5(mdo): 'chad par chos kyi kun dga' la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi// 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ni ma yin no// rigs kyi// bu 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu zla ba ni 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba
151a6(mdo): ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'de lta ste bsod nams chen po dang ye shes chen pos 'phrul che zhi nga mthu che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
151a7(mdo): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu mim par byed pa nas/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu na 'a// byang chub sems dpa' tha dra rnams yin no//
151a8(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i mun pa sel pa rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnam par 'byed pa byed pa
151a9(mdo): rnams yin/ phyogs bcu thams cad du ldan ner byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos mngon par bshad pa rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ sdang bar byed pa rnams yin/
151b1(mdo): mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil kyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa kun bstand pa rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa zhes
151b2(mdo): yin/ skye bo dge ba dga' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i mun pa seld pa nas/ ji ltar skye bo dge ba dka' ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
151b3(mdo): 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma sha rang na mun pa mun nag thos cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma sha ra da na yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ra to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
151b4(mdo): dper na nyi ma sha ra na pad ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shar da na yang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad ma rnam par 'byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
151b5(mdo): dper na nyi ma shard na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner bya/ da do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang phyogs bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang ye gre
151b6(mdo): kyi 'od zer gyis rab tu lhan ner byed kyang sems can rnams la gnod par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling tu nyi ma'i 'od gzer dag nam sdang ba de'i tshe na
151b7(mdo): sha rad ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od gzer rnams nam snang ba de'i tshe dge ba'i chos rnams bshard ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du /
151b8(mdo): ma'i snang ba nam myed par gyur pa de'i tshe na nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du nam myed par gyurd pa de'i tshe na zag pa zad ces bya'o//
151b9(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma sha rad na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal nyi ma sha rang na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyis sdang
152a1(mdo): bar byed cing / gti mug kyi mun pa'i rab rib kyis khebs pa rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma sha rang na 'od thams cad kyi 'od byed kyang nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad
152a2(mdo): 'od myi sdang bar bya'o snyam du myi sems mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od myed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal nyi ma sha rad pa na yang mu stegs can ngan pa'i 'od dang /
152a3(mdo): mu stegs can ngan pa'i lugs thams cad 'od myed par 'gyur mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ni ngas 'di dag 'od myed par bya'o snyam du myi sems te/ 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od myed par
152a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma sha ra na 'dzam bu'i gling gyi myi rnams la mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa le gas par stond to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
152a5(mdo): nyi ma sha ra da na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snar/ bas mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa legs par sto nad to// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i
152a6(mdo): lam gyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu myi mnyam pa zhes bye ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma sha ra da na mo brko'i las kyi mtha' thams cad
152a7(mdo): 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal nyi ma sha ra da na yang / dge ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ma nyi ma sha ra na skye bo dge ba'i ni dga' bar 'gyur
152a8(mdo): la myi srun pa'i rang bzhin can dag ni myi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma sha ra na yang skye bo dge ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin can rnams ni dag
152a9(mdo): bar 'gyur/ lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang / myi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal da pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga'
152b1(mdo): ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni myi dga' bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa seld pa nas/ skye bo dge ba dga' ba'i bar du yin no/
152b2(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gar zhe na 'di lta ste/
152b3(mdo): bag myi tsha ba rnams yin/ mya brtams pa rnams yin/ myi zlogs pa rnams yin/ ser ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal dang / nags tshal kyi 'dab na rgyu ba/
152b4(mdo): rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ le nad pa myed pa'i rnams yin/ bdag gyi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde rab tu 'jom pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi
152b5(mdo): lo tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bag myi tsha ba nas/ dge ba'i chos kyi/ lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
152b6(mdo): dper na seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba myed par ma thod bas bka myi tsha zhing myi skrag par 'gro'o// de bzhin du byar chub sems dpa' seng ge yang ba dag dang 'dra ba myed par
152b7(mdo): ma'ong bas gar 'gro yang bag myi tsha zhing gyi skrag par 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras myi brtabs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' se ke yang
152b8(mdo): pas rgol ba thams cad kyis brtsad pas brgald kyang myi brtabs shing rgod pa dang zhum par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni bsgrubs na phyir myi ldog pa yin no// de bzhin
152b9(mdo): du byang chub sems dpa' ser ke yang phas kyi rgal pa thams cad kyis bsgrubs ni myi zlogs shing myi zhum par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni sma gang gis ri dgas 'phra mo zas
153a1(mdo): cad dang / wa thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag myed pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzind pa la mngon pa/
153a2(mdo): zhen pa gzhan mu stegs can gi ri dgas rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can za thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer par 'gyur ba de lta bu sgrog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ni bdag tu 'dzind pa las bzlog par
153a3(mdo): bya ba dang / sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma rtogs par de dag la gnod par bya ba'i phyir bdag myed pa'i ser ge'i sgra myi sgrog go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ser ge ni kun tu lta yang
153a4(mdo): myi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta yang myi 'jigs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni
153a5(mdo): rang bzhin gyis nags tshal dang / nags tshal kyi 'dab na rgyu/ pa yin no// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' ser ge yang / rang bzhin gis dben pa la mngon du phyogs shing / nags tshal
153a6(mdo): dang nags tshal gyi 'dab na spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu'i de lnga ste dper na ser ge ni ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no// re bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ser ge yang ye shes kyi brag gis/
153a7(mdo): phug na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na seng ge ni myi len par 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ser ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa myed
153a8(mdo): par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe na sed ge ni gig pu gnyis su myed par bdag gi brtson 'grus dang stobs dang mthu thob pas pha rol kyi sde 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ser ge
153a9(mdo): yang gcig pu gnyis su myed par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na grong gi 'dab gang na ser
153b1(mdo): ge rgyu ba der ri dgas phra mo dag gis lo tog rnams chud myi gson to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ser ge yang yul na u gi cog gar na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos
153b2(mdo): kyi lo tog chud myi gson te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bag myi tsha ba nas dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog srung ba'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
153b3(mdo): sadapa' ser ge lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste byang chub kyi sems brtan pa rnams yin/ byang chub
153b4(mdo): kyi sems shin tu byi dor byas pa rnams yin/ dbang po bsdams rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ bur chen po ber por pa rnams yin/ sems can gi don rnams la yongs su myi skyo ba
153b5(mdo): rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tsho ba rnams yin// tshul 'tsho// sa pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ dran pa'i rang
153b6(mdo): bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
153b7(mdo): cad shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas rnal 'byor da spyod pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa myed cing kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyun dam bcad
153b8(mdo): pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' myi gcog pas bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yon/ dma' ba
153b9(mdo): dang / dma' ba'i yid kyis gdol bu ltar 'jig rten na gyod pa rnams yin/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsod snyoms blang bar 'du shes nye bar bzhag pas/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / bral
154a1(mdo): pa rnams yin/ 'di sngar de mdzod gsum du shes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur myed pa rnams yin/ chos chos rang gis rig pa'i phyir the tsom myed pa rnams yin/ rang gis/
154a2(mdo): lam mthong pas gzhan gyis myi bkri zhing pha rol gi drir myi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
154a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste ma gos pa rnams yin/ sdig pa chu ru
154a4(mdo): dang yang lhan cig myi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnams yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ myi rtsub pa rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa
154a5(mdo): rnams yin/ zo rnam par byed pa rnams yin/ blo yongasasu smyind pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnam/ sa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
154a6(mdo): ma gos pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bor du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad ma'i ni chu'i nang nas 'byung yang myi 'chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di
154a7(mdo): ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chu las 'byung yang myi chags par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i babs dang / shes rab kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir
154a8(mdo): ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na spyod kyang 'khor pa'i nyes pa dag gis myi gas te/ de'i babs de ni shes rab kyis yang dag par mi nad pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
154a9(mdo): pad ma la chu'i thigs pa chung ngu yang myi 'chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yar myi 'chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sa'i phyogs gar du pad ma skyes par gyurd pa'i
154b1(mdo): sa phyogs de dris khyab par 'dug go// de bzhin du yul dang yul gyi phyogs ka na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab par 'dug go// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad/
154b2(mdo): ma' ni sa phyogs kar skyes pa'i phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang gror ba dang yul gyi myi thams cad kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang
154b3(mdo): gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams 'du ba yin/ sa
154b4(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad ma ni 'bye ba 'di lta ste sems can rnams kyi yin
154b5(mdo): du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snar ro// de bzhin byang chub se// mas dpa' yang khro gnyer myed cing dbang po zhi nad tu dbabs bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
154b6(mdo): na/ pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing myi thub pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yin/ myi brlang zhing mu cor myi smra ba'i nga
154b7(mdo): rang bzhin can yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper pad ma ni rmyi lam dang / ltas dang / yud tsam dag la mtho par yang 'di lta ste don grub pa'i phyir bkra gis shi ba rab tu bsngags pa yin no// de bzhin du
154b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' mthong pa yang 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par bya ba la dus thams cad du yang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad ma' ni nam
154b9(mdo): rgyas pa de na rnam par bye ba zhe bya'o// des 'ar du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi mye tog rgyas pa de na blo rnam par bye ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di la sde dper na pad
155a1(mdo): ma ni nam yongs su sbyin par gyu rad pa de na bltas na myig gi dbang po tshim par byed/ mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsnams na sA'i dbang po tshim par byed/ reg na lus kyi dbang po chem
155a2(mdo): bar byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal ya das shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smyi nad par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bltas na myig gi dbang po rnam par
155a3(mdo): dag par byed/ mnyan na na ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ tshul khrims dang yon tan gi dri bsdams na sna'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang bsnyen bkur byas na lus kyi dbang po rnam par
155a4(mdo): dag par byed/ yon tan brjod pa rnam par bsams pas yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na pad ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste myi dang myi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu
155a5(mdo): yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang // de ma yin gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
155a6(mdo): skyong ba dag gis shi nad tu yongs su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
155a7(mdo): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma sA bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyind pa zas
155a8(mdo): cad yang dag par bsgrub po zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sems can thams cad gdul lo zhes sems rgya cher
155a9(mdo): skyed do// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug ste bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
155b1(mdo): 'jig rten du dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ swa'am bdud dum/ tshangs pa'am sus kyang chos dang 'thun par sngon ma bsko rang pa'i chos kyi 'khom mo zaskor ro zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// 'jig rten gyi khams mngal yas
155b2(mdo): myed par song ste/ sems can gi don bya ba'i dngos po de dang de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do// shes rab kyi gru sbyar te sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol/
155b3(mdo): tu ba skal lo zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do// mgon myed pa dang / skyabs myed pa dang / gnas myed pa dang / rten myed pa dang / dpung gnyen myed pa dang / zhal lag myed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag bya'o zhes
155b4(mdo): sems rgya cher skyed do// lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs pa ra bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dar/ myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang du sangs rgyas
155b5(mdo): kyi khyu mchog nyid bstan to zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi ser ge'i sgra/ bsgrag go// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam parabartse'o// glang po che'i lha stangs kyis blta bar bya'o zhes seMs
155b6(mdo): rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ dka' ba spyod pas ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin/ zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no//
155b7(mdo): zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi nam ga yo sa ldan 'ad/ sa danams rnam par dag sa rnas pan no// mug zhan pa sa te/ pa rgyags
155b8(mdo): bamam pa sum sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'di sa ste bsam pa la sku myed pas bsam pashin tu gnas pa rnams yin/ 'di la ste nyan zas kyi byang chub yid la byed pa kyi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
155b9(mdo): kyi byang chub yi la byed pa gyi skyed pa dang / brtson pa chung ba yid la byed pa gyi skyed pas tshul bzhim ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ga ste nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma
156a1(mdo): thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste sgyu'i spyod lam dang bral bas lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste yang dag pa'i don kun stond pas/ ngag gi tshul 'chos pa dang
156a2(mdo): bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste lus kyi 'du 'dzi myed pa dang / gang gis 'dod pa chung ba dang sems kyis smon pa myed pa'i phyir sems kyi tshul 'chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa 'ang chud myi
156a3(mdo): gzon na/ mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa gzo ba rnams yin/ byas pa tshor ba rnams yin te/ dgos pa byas pa la myi smod myi sbyang yon tan ma yin par myi lta ste/ gzhan du na chung zad byas pa 'ang tshor zhing
156a4(mdo): de la stod par byed/ gzer stod par byed/ yang dag par dag par byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed cing de la yon tan tu lta ba yin no// ji ltar smra ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/ byang chub sems
156a5(mdo): dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par stond cing / sems kyis myi ma/ thun bAr sems dpa' ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' na/ mas ngag gis stod cing sems kyis ran du bya ba'i sbyor bar
156a6(mdo): myi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis 'jam par bya smra zhing sems kyis zhe la nond te shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa stond cing /
156a7(mdo): sems kyis 'on gyis mdud par 'dzind pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba stond cing sems kyis rnyes par byed pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul myi 'chos kha gsag
156a8(mdo): kyi byed/ ser sna dang pra dog gis kun du grags pa ma yin/ sgyu dang g.yom gyi sdod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'bab span gyi byed/ phan tshun du dpa' ba 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'
156a9(mdo): rnams kyi lus kyis kyang ri mor skyed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i dor smra ba las su yang sgrub bo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la skur ba'i phyir zhugs pa sa
156b1(mdo): yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la bsku rad pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la bskur pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub seMs dpa' bla na myed pa yang
156b2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag gyon nas/ yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de rab tu byung na rgyal pos
156b3(mdo): banar ba myed par rab tu 'gyur/ rkun pos gtse ba myed pa dang / dul gyi she dang ga men dang / 'tsho ba myed pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa myed par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dang de rab tu byung nas dge ba'i tshe yin
156b4(mdo): zhes tshol ba yin te/ de dge ba ci zhes tshol bas dge ba'i bshe sa gshes gnyen rnams la snye nad par byed/ stend par byed// bsnyen bkur byed do// de dag las chos kyang nyand to// thos
156b5(mdo): nas kyang nan tan du byed cing nga rgyal gyi zil gyis ma nond pa yin/ te/ de nga rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzind pa yin/ ma log par 'dzind pas lam shi nad tu rtogs pa 'thob bo/
156b6(mdo): de lam shi nad tu rtogs pas chos nyid 'thob bo// chos nyid thob pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te// de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand
156b7(mdo): ba'i la skur pa ma btab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu podo dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
156b8(mdo): dpa' sems nem nur myed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba las mngon par dad de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsar ba dang // de shi shin na kyi
156b9(mdo): gas chu yad gas tha/ byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang mig pa gan sa pa dang / cus sna tshogs bstand pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung spa dbyangs bab mo dang / sems can gi bas
157a1(mdo): pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsung ba la mngon par dad pa nas/ ji ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba
157a2(mdo): bzhin du 'dus pa la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang zhi ba'i sgra dang / kyi mnyam pa'i
157a3(mdo): sku dang / mya mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad myed pa'i sku dang / phal la myed pa'i sku dang / rdo rje'i sku zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni de myi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la
157a4(mdo): de nem nur myed the tsom myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji lta ra na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gas
157a5(mdo): ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon tu lung stond pa dang / gsangs te lung stond pa dang /
157a6(mdo): ldem po ngag gis kyang sems can rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul da pa'am/ ca co myed de/ de'i phyir de la rdzun tu smra ba'i nyes pa myi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
157a7(mdo): gshegs pa ni spyodan thams cad spangs pa za ca mas pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ dbang du gyu rang ba/ zhi ba dang ba/ yongs su dag pa// rnyog pa myed pa rnam pa/
157a8(mdo): gsal ba ste/ grang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'khrul pa 'am/ tsaco 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs myed do// zhes zos pa 'drini yang dag pa'o// 'din de kho na'o// 'di ni kyi zla ba'o snyam ste/
157a9(mdo): gnas 'di la de nes yur myed the tsom byed de/ de ltar mede bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsar ba la mdzod par
157b1(mdo): ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas ji dgongs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa sems la gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
157b2(mdo): gyur pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems can thams cad kyis shes par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni
157b3(mdo): bab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ chog ge'i spyod yul las shind tu 'das pa/ dpag tu myed pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa/ rtog ge'i pa thams cad kyi
157b4(mdo): yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni 'o nol/ 'di ni myi slu ba'o snyam ste gnas 'di la de nem nur byed the tsom myed pa yin te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba
157b5(mdo): la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang // chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dad cen/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu byang chub kyi
157b6(mdo): gzhi byang chub kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du daphyogs pa dang / sems can gyi bya ba dang / sems can gyi byed pa dang / yongs su myi skyo ba dang / myi skrag pa dang /
157b7(mdo): 'ur chen po byer pa dang / mthu rtan pa dang / rtul ba brtan pa dang / pha rolang tu phyind pa yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / bogs pa myed pa'i blo dang / maH
157b8(mdo): yas pa'i blo dang / gyi mnyam pa'i blo dang / phal la byed pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / go cha brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa las kyi g.yo ba dang / dam bcas pa phal la byed pa de dag/
157b9(mdo): thams cad rims kyis 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhes thos pa 'don yang dag pa'o// 'din de kho ra'o// 'di ni gyi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem chung byed
158a1(mdo): com myed de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du
158a2(mdo): sems so// gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i myig chags pa myed cing thog babyed pa sgrib pa myed pa 'thob bo// lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes
158a3(mdo): su dran pa'i shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pas shes pa chags pa myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ sgrib pa myed pa thob bo// de
158a4(mdo): 'phyir sems can gi khams la mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ste// sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyis ran tu gyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan tu spyod pa dang ldan pa
158a5(mdo): 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang gzhi des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan
158a6(mdo): 'gro bar ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi leg/ sa par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par gyod pa dang ldan
158a7(mdo): ba/ 'phags pa srung ba myi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des sus gzhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris
158a8(mdo): kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o// snyam nas de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can kyi khams la bltas te/ sems can gyi khams de nyid kyi dge ba dang / myi dge ba'i las rnams la rnam par blta'o//
158a9(mdo): de yang 'di snyam du sems te sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon
158b1(mdo): lam de yongs su rdzogs so// bdag gi brnag pa de yongs su rdzogs so snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni myi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur myed the tshom myed do//
158b2(mdo): gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam par sangs rgyas pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas des na rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang //
158b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstand pa la mngon par dad ce na de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di
158b4(mdo): lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o// zhes zos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni myi slu ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin pa'o// ma no rad pa'o gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa
158b5(mdo): gzhan rnams kyang 'di las byung ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di// lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu bu'i gling na gang gling yod pa rnams mying// gis tha dad par shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ni 'dzam bu'i gling du
158b6(mdo): 'du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling la brten to// 'dzam bu'i gling gi grangs su 'gro'o// 'di'i phyir na grong gcig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'jam bu 'i gling ngo // de bzhin du theg pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
158b7(mdo): pa'i theg par 'du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o// de'i phyir theg pa ni gcig pa kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i the/
158b8(mdo): pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur myed the tsom myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gcig gis tshul bstand pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar tshul sna tshogs bstand pa la mngon par dad ce na
158b9(mdo): de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di mdo sde de dang de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna tshogs bshad pa zos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni myi slu ba'o// de 'aci'i phyir zhe na 'dul
159a1(mdo): pa'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston to snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur myed the tsom myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan
159a2(mdo): pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung smra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyang
159a3(mdo): zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni myi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i phra ba chung ngu'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dbyangs kyang zab cing snyan pa yin/ bskald pa brgya stong du mar dge hUM/
