159a4(mdo): rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur myed the tsom myed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsla'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon
159a5(mdo): par dad do// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems// can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na// de 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa
159a6(mdo): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal mkhyend te sems can mos pa tha dad pa dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs cig brjo da pas the tshom gcod cing / yongs su sbyind pa ji lta ba bzhin tu
159a7(mdo): sems can rnams 'dul lo// sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos stond te// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to snyam byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni myi rtog na
159a8(mdo): myi rtog go zhes zos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni myo slu ba'o// snyam ste gnas 'di la nem nur myed the tsom myed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gi bsam
159a9(mdo): ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang na byang chub sems dpa' sems nem nur myed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
159b1(mdo): dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyu rad pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin rgya che zhing tshad myed pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhog/
159b2(mdo): pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i ro dang lhan gcig myi 'dug pa rnams yin// nogacon pa rnaMm yin// chu bo kun med pa rnaMm yin/ dus las myi yol pa rnams yin/ 'byung po mang po'i gnas su gyur da pa rnams yin/ myi zad
159b3(mdo): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pas nA/ ji ltar na myi zad pAl du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni//
159b4(mdo): rin po che'i thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi thams cad kyis rin po che blang bas myi zad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung
159b5(mdo): gnas yin te/ sems can thams cad kyis yon tan rin po che// blangs pas myi zad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya ma// tsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhi//
159b6(mdo): du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab ci ra sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu tshad myed pas
159b7(mdo): na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ blo tshad myed pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni pags kyis gzhol/ pags
159b8(mdo): kyis 'bab/ bags kyis bab bo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la 'bab bo// rigs kyi
159b9(mdo): bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig myi 'dug go// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang myi dge ba'i grogs so/
160a1(mdo): rnams dang lhan cig myi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu bo ji snyed bab pa de thams cad kyang ro gcig pa yi//
160a2(mdo): te 'di lta ste lan tshwa'i ro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dkar po rnams ji snyed sdud pa de dag thams cad ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyedad pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta/
160a3(mdo): ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu bo tshad myed pa kun zed kyang / de la bri ba 'am gang bar yang myi mngon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad myed pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba 'am gang bar myi mngon no//
160a4(mdo): de rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las myi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar bya ba'i sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i dus las kyi yol lo// rigs
160a5(mdo): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni 'byung ba mang po'i gan so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams/ cad dang chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so// rigs kyi bu
160a6(mdo): A ste dben rgya mtsho chen po ni sems cad kyis chu bcus kyang myi za da pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos stond pa myi zad pa yin te// rigs kyi ltar na
160a7(mdo): pa mad ma che'i lungs rgya pa nas kyi dpa'i bar du banan/ rigs kyi du chos can pa da nga zhan bya chu su ma na no// sa sa ya na lum sa than mayin no// bcu gang zhe na 'dis ste 'byung /
160a8(mdo): chol pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// chom thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgra ma'i mtshad nyid du khong tu chud pa rnams/
160a9(mdo): yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa lta mkhas pa rnams yin/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin// las bsam gyis myi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams
160b1(mdo): yin/ smram pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa jis pa bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la ma'as/
160b2(mdo): ba yin pas nas ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste 'dod chags kyi skyes kun tu 'bar ro// po
160b3(mdo): rgyudang tu med la kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste dper na zhe sdang ki du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'chubs pas rnam par rmongs so// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste gti mug gi mun pas mun nag
160b4(mdo): tu gyur to snyam mo// de ni 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ji ltarabyung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhi ma chos bas cad la rtog go// chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
160b5(mdo): khong du chud par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid/ khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan
160b6(mdo): nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes pas/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas/ rten cing
160b7(mdo): 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so// rten cing 'brelang par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas bsam gyis kyi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po myed pa'i chos rnams
160b8(mdo): la las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtsha rad to snyam du sems so// de ltar de bro zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gis don shes so// des
160b9(mdo): don shes pas don yang dag pa jis pa bzhin du rtogs so// rom yang dag pa'i lba pa bzhin du rtogs pas de lo sa mthong ngo // de kho na mthong bas sems can rnamapa 'khor ba'i brtson ra nas pa da par
161a1(mdo): byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
161a2(mdo): blo zhib pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste chos thams cad bdag myed par 'jog go// chos bas
161a3(mdo): cad sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa dang / gso ba myed pa dang / gang zag byed pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po myed pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po myed pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug
161a4(mdo): myed pa dang / stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang rkye nad las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di chos nyid dang mthun
161a5(mdo): pa'o// chos thams cad sems can myed pa dang / srog myed pa zhes/ bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang mthun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso' ba myed pa dang / gang zag myed
161a6(mdo): pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po myed pa dang / shes pa po dang mthong pa po myed pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug myed pa dang stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang rkyend las byung ba
161a7(mdo): 'o bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid dang myi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid las myi 'khruld pa de ni
161a8(mdo): rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la bab pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la bab pa dan rags pa'/ gang chos nyid stond pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la ma spobs pas na/ de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa rnaMs
161a9(mdo): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnam
161b1(mdo): yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste spobs pa thogs pa myed pa rnams yin/ spobs pa myi zad rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa myi rtags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum//
161b2(mdo): rnams yin/ spobs pa myi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal la myed pa rnams yin/ spobs pa zil gyis ma non pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i thob
161b3(mdo): pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
161b4(mdo): par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'dar 'dar po myed pa'i spobs pa tsan rnams yin/ myi 'khrul ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ myi zhan pa'i spobs pa can
161b5(mdo): rnams yin/ yid yer po myed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin// de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral// pa ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba
161b6(mdo): ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ myi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yi na no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa 'dar 'dar po ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'khor da kyi 'jig
161b7(mdo): pa'i phags dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na blo brtan zhing kyi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa
161b8(mdo): ni zhand pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor kyi nang du phyind na myi 'jigs myi skrag ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa myed cing myi skrag myi
161b9(mdo): sdar ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni yang yeng po myed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs
162a1(mdo): pa ni yeng yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa myed pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rig
162a2(mdo): kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi na don dang bral bar gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na bstan
162a3(mdo): bcom thams cad la 'jigs pa myed pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs phyags 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ bstan bcos thams cad 'jigs pa myed pa rnams kyi
162a4(mdo): ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba kyi mkhas pa rnaMs
162a5(mdo): kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang / ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams da kyi spobs pa ni kar phyis sba bar bya ba de sngar smra ba 'am/ gang
162a6(mdo): sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bu dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni du shes pa yin// chod shes pa yin/ dus min shes pa yin no// byang chub
162a7(mdo): sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yid du myi 'ong ba myi snyan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spabs
162a8(mdo): spobs pa ni chub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gyi gsal ba yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po
162a9(mdo): rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa ni myi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//
162b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer myed pa
162b2(mdo): rnams yin/ don tu sba ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ myi ngoms par smra ba rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba myed pa rnams
162b3(mdo): yin/ 'khrug pa myed pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems
162b4(mdo): dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum snying khro gnyer myed pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' don tu smra ba ni/ tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub
162b5(mdo): sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba no// / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos stond pas sems/
162b6(mdo): can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpe'i myi ngom pa ni nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshu ngas pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub
162b7(mdo): sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chom sngond pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba myed pa ni ngang tshul nges pas sems can mgu bar byed do//
162b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa myed pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu
162b9(mdo): bar byed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig
163a1(mdo): 'bru bzung ba rnams yin no// bcu kar zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos myi stond te/ zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba
163a2(mdo): rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo byed pa rnams la ma yin/ dad pa mar ba rnams la ma yin/ g.yo dang / sgyus grags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/
163a3(mdo): rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang phra dog dang / ser snas grags pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos myi stond to// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na byang
163a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang myed/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang byed/ sems can rnams la ri mor myi bye dra pa yang myed/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang
163a5(mdo): myed mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyurd pa'o// zhes btang ba snyoms// su gnas pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thos
163a6(mdo): cad rnam par sel pas gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o / na sems can ji 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston da/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal
163a7(mdo): pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos stond to// sems can dge ba'i zha ba sbyind pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba/
163a8(mdo): la bya ba byas pa rnams dang / g.yo myed pa rnams dang / sgyu myed pa rnams dang / spyod lam myi 'chos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa dang / bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs
163a9(mdo): pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zi nad pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston nus pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba kar bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur/
163b1(mdo): ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems cad de ka bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
163b2(mdo): rnams chos stond to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams
163b3(mdo): yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang yang dag par sgrub pa yang myi dmyigs so// pha rol tu phyind pa yang dag par
163b4(mdo): sgrub pa'i phyir chos stond kyang pha rold tu phyind pa dang yang dag par bsgrub pa yang myi dmyigs so// byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos stond kyang / byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa yang myi dmyigs
163b5(mdo): so// nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir chos stond kyang nyon mongs pa dang spang ba yang myi dmyigs so// skyo ba dang 'dod/ chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos stond kyang / skyo ba
163b6(mdo): dang 'dod chags dang / bral ba dang / 'gog pa yang myir myi// sa so// rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos stond kyang rgyund
163b7(mdo): tu zhugs pa yang myi dmyigs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba la yang myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos stond kyang
163b8(mdo): dgra bcom pa dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i chos stond kyang rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang myi dmyigs so//
163b9(mdo): bdag tu 'dzind pa la mngon par zhend pa spang ba'i phyir chos stond kyang / bdag dang 'dzind pa yang myi dmyigs so// las kyi rnam par smyind pa yang 'jog mod kyi las dang las kyi rnam par sbyind pa yang
164a1(mdo): myi dmyigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang mying gang gis brjod pa de myir des yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge/
164a2(mdo): rnams ni chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten tha snyad la brten/ brtags pa la brten nas mying myed pa'i chos rnams la mying du 'jog ste/ mying de yang gsob po/ gsog go// gang gsob dang
164a3(mdo): gsog de la don dam pa myed do// gang la don dam pa myed pa de brdzun te/ slu ba'i chos so// gang brdzun zhing slu ba'i chos de ni byis pa skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub ses
164a4(mdo): dpa' chos rjod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
164a5(mdo): rnams chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs las kyang myi 'byung chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du/ byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang myi 'byung / chos
164a6(mdo): kyi rjes su yang 'brang la 'dod pa'i khams las kyang myi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang myi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs myed pa'i
164a7(mdo): khams las kyang myi 'byung / rab kyi yumang grang sachobasas kyang kyi zung / tshabs rjes su wA la/ rabs pa 'a kyi 'gyur/ cheb kyi rjes su la 'bra la sems cad kyi phyir yab kyi 'brang // chos kyi rjes su yang 'bra la chad par lta ba'i phyir
164a8(mdo): yang myi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la lam las kyang myi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos
164a9(mdo): kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i brtse
164b1(mdo): gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shi nad tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas/
164b2(mdo): pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmyigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu bu byang chub seMs
164b3(mdo): sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs ste/ de la stond par 'du shes skyed cing de la brtan te gnas so// de dge ba'i bshes
164b4(mdo): gnyen la brtan pas na myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas
164b5(mdo): na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa byed cing / lam gi rgyun ma bcad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing lus dang ngag/ dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de shin
164b6(mdo): tu yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo bcas pa yin no// de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang pa yin no// stong pa nyid la bsgom pa mang bas dmyigs pa'i
164b7(mdo): lta bar myi 'gyur ro// de dmyigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa// bcom ldan
164b8(mdo): 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ya lad pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dgas so// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa the
164b9(mdo): bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bca sad pa/ rigs kyi bu gar gyi u ba'i de ni yang dag pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das myi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
165a1(mdo): stsa la pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor da pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de nyid dang / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal
165a2(mdo): pa/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa yin te/ 'di ni yi ge dag gis gdags par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba thams cad
165a3(mdo): las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba/ blang ba dang dor ba thams cad
165a4(mdo): dang bral ba/ phye ba dang btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba brtag par bya ba ma yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa
165a5(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul la/ sa yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i yul las yang dag pa/ ra yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las yang
165a6(mdo): dag par 'das pa// bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa// rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag
165a7(mdo): par 'das pa/ gnas ma yin pa myi gnas pa/ zhi ba'i 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig pa/ dri ma myed pa ma gos pa/ dang ba'i rnam par dag pa/ gya nom pa mchog dang
165a8(mdo): pa/ phul brtag pa brtan pa/ zer zug myi 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub seMs
165a9(mdo): dpa' chos nyid 'di thob nas/ sems can dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus tshom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa rigs kyi bu de ni
165b1(mdo): de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// gnyis su myed
165b2(mdo): pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
165b3(mdo): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o// rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol
165b4(mdo): pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi mngon du bgyis pa de/ rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bka' sa ldad pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na shes rab kyi/
165b5(mdo): ni chos rnams yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // lus kyis ni mngon du byed do/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib thams cad// rnam par seld pas gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
165b6(mdo): kyi bu gang dag gis zos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsams pa la sa byung ba'i shes pas/ chos 'ong du chud par gyurd pa de rang gi sa rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
165b7(mdo): stsa la pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe' nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
165b8(mdo): dper na/ 'brog chen por sos pa'i zla ba tha ma la myi la la zhig shar da phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas myi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ongs te/ de yang sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su
165b9(mdo): gdungs par gyurd nas/ skom gyis nyen pa de/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i phyi ni skad ces spa ste/ kye bskyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gis nyen ma/ kar na mtsho 'am lteng ka
166a1(mdo): 'am rdzing kang chu bsil ba dang ba rnyog pa myed pa gsal bas gang ba yod de/ gang du bdag tsha ba dang / skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la stond cig ces zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'odra
166a2(mdo): pa'i myi de yang lam shes pa/ lam mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngan chad mthong la// sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te
166a3(mdo): des myi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi rab du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang / nags tshal de'i dbus na mtsho 'am lter
166a4(mdo): ka 'am rdzir chubasil zhing dang ba rnyog pa myed pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba mye da par byos shig zer na/ rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems
166a5(mdo): sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i myi des chu zos ma zag dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba myed par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ram/ chu de
166a6(mdo): bsil ba'i yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das myi de nam der phyin nas des chu der zhugs te/ 'tshal bar gyurd pa de'i tshe/ myi de'i
166a7(mdo): tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang /
166a8(mdo): bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par myi nus so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba 'di ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dgas so// myi sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing
166a9(mdo): skom gyis yin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// lam shes pa'i myi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dag
166b1(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa/ chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas so// chu bsil zhing dpa la rnyog pa myed pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig
166b2(mdo): bla dgas so// yang rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa che'i tshad skal bar bzhugs ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi myi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud ci'i
166b3(mdo): dri ma zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te/ bsngags pa brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam sems/ ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de
166b4(mdo): 'ibasngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla da pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis nam grangs 'dis ji ltar gro//
166b5(mdo): pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par myi nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu ya/ ra dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig
166b6(mdo): gis shing tog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myar pa' zhig myangs par gyur da la/ des myis gzhan zhig gi mdun tu shing tog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog
166b7(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i snyam du sems/ ci myi des shing tog gi rog de rang gA rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom
166b8(mdo): ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mas lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar zos pa tsam 'am gyis so so rang gi rig pa'i chos khong du chud par myi nus par
166b9(mdo): rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa shi nad tu legs par gsungs/
167a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das chos kyis chos tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
167a2(mdo): bu de dag gis chos 'di thos par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob
167a3(mdo): par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang
167a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ myi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
167a5(mdo): 'i stong pa'i nyid kyang rab tu shes tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa/ nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyi/ nga rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu she
167a6(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong pa'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong
167a7(mdo): pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzind pa dang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa 'ang myi dmyigs/ rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang /
167a8(mdo): gzhi des myed par yang myi ltung ngo // rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma myed
167a9(mdo): ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi rol kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin// nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad bral
167b1(mdo): ba rnams yin// dmyigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmyigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams
167b2(mdo): yin/ rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po myi dmyigs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma myed pa
167b3(mdo): gnas pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma
167b4(mdo): ma mchis pa la gnas pa yang de 'dra na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ji lta 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHyad pra/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo// de ci'i
167b5(mdo): phyir zhe na bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de// bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na sems can// thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
167b6(mdo): kyi pha rol da ta ma tshu rol mthong bar myi 'gyur myi dmyigs te/ tha mar na dub pa'i skal ba can tu 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni zab cing gting dpag
167b7(mdo): dka' la bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ dpag tu myed pa rgya che ba nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog ge pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmyigs pa can thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa 'am/
167b8(mdo): bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar myi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsold pa/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstand pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
167b9(mdo): kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ya lad pa/ rigs kyi bu/
168a1(mdo): khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa/ bdag bstod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
168a2(mdo): skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la stong pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma yad pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod
168a3(mdo): kyis dris pa tshul bzhin du dris so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
168a4(mdo): cad rnam par sel pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'asaHlang to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas
168a5(mdo): kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bad// ga bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis no nad pa dang / rnyed pa'i zild kyis nond pa dang / bkur sti'i zi lar kyis non//
168a6(mdo): pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang shes kyi khye 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa 'am kha gsag byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag stong pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de
168a7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa nye bar bzhag pas chos bstand pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang /
168a8(mdo): bde bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld par gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ sems can 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus ma 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan
168a9(mdo): 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu myi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dman tshegs la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ dad
168b1(mdo): pa chung ba/ dge ba'i cha ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gi che ba myi shes pas/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad do/
168b2(mdo): de yang nan tan gis sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur da cing / sa'i phyogs de na yang smand pa de gcig pur zad de kany+tsi
168b3(mdo): su myed la de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang myi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba nad kyis nyen pa'i sman pa myi mkhas pa/ gnod pa la stend pa yin
168b4(mdo): gis/ bdag gis de dag gsol bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du/ kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste/ nad la mkhas pa'o// nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o// sma nad pa
168b5(mdo): la mkhas pa'o zhes bdag gis yon tan gi sngags pa bdag nyid kyis// brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o// zhes bya bar she// sa shing / yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas
168b6(mdo): sma nad pa de sems can de dag la gso' zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la stod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das/
168b7(mdo): kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po bla na myed pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso' ba la mkhas pa/
168b8(mdo): chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin kyang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyurang pa'i sems can rnams kyis myi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyu rang pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du/
168b9(mdo): bdag gi yon tan dang / sngags pa bdag nyid brjod do// de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis bsngags pa'i che ba thos nas yid ches par gyur
169a1(mdo): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas sman gyi rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe/
169a2(mdo): na 'di lta ste/ myi stug pa dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'breld par 'byung ba las stsogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas bdag la bdag nyid stong pa mdzad do// rigs
169a3(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la myi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul
169a4(mdo): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gta na dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang chub dang lam da dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la myi
169a5(mdo): gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chu/ ba sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ myi gnas pa/ ra 'jig rten thams cad rnam par spyod do// rigs kyi bu chos su
169a6(mdo): po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin
169a7(mdo): no// bcu gang zhen 'di sa ste/ nyi ci pa skyed pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ ba dad pa myed pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa ma ma yin// chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtog pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa/
169a8(mdo): nams yin/ gnod pa myed pa'i byams pa'i dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems byed pa'i byams pa da
169a9(mdo): ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnam ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
169b1(mdo): dpal byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / s+yag
169b2(mdo): myed pa dang / mgon myed pa dang / rten myed pa dang / dung gnyen myed pa dag mthor na/ byang chub sems bskyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad rtsol brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dka'
169b3(mdo): ba spyad pa brgya dag kyang byed do// de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de/ 'di ltar ste sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/ tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/
169b4(mdo): gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'jug pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed kyang / sems
169b5(mdo): can gyi sdug bsngal myi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba dag gis nyen cing / byang chub las phyir ldog par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos pa/ cu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid
169b6(mdo): can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dga' bu la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor pa'i btson ra rab tu 'bar
169b7(mdo): ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gi 'khor ba'i dpyar zag yun ring po nas thogs pa chad do zhes dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po chu srin gyis dkrug pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya
169b8(mdo): mtsho las rga lad to zhes rab tu dka' ba skyed do// bdag ni yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga rgyal gi rgyal mtshan bskal lo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi ro rje bcom ste/ ji ska
169b9(mdo): rdul kyang myi snang ba de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs phyi nad pa yin gyis da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni 'jig rten gnas pa yun ring/
170a1(mdo): bo nas gnyid log pa sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su zin pa/ myig gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang na sad pa'i yin gyis da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni ngan
170a2(mdo): dza dza 'gro dang ngan mo pa dang / log par ltung ba bams cad las rnas par grol ba yin gis da ni gzhan yang bad song dang ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par dgrol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dka' ba skyed do// bdag
170a3(mdo): 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun rin po nas 'byams te grogs byed cing / gnyis su myed par kar yang 'khyam zhing lam la gyi mkhas la/ lam myi shes shing / yul gyi shes pas/ lam stond pa rnyed do// zhes rab
170a4(mdo): tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to// zhes rab tu dka' ba skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa
170a5(mdo): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sem sa dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs
170a6(mdo): rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ myig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas par myi 'gyur/ gno da par myi 'gyur/ ma byung bar myi 'gyur ba rnams dang / de bzhin
170a7(mdo): tu na pas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid
170a8(mdo): kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa yin te/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smas par myi 'gyur ro// gnod par myi 'gyur/ rma byung bar myi 'gyur ro//
170a9(mdo): 'du byed gi sdug bsngal dang / sug bsngal gi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sug bsngal gi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i skus/
170b1(mdo): bsngal gis sbas pas myi 'gyur/ gnod par myi 'gyur/ rma byung bar myi 'gyur ro// bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dka' ba' dang / dad pa dang rangs pa skyed ning
170b2(mdo): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal par gyurd to// zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang
170b3(mdo): snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'chi 'pho 'ang ston/ skye ba 'am ston//
170b4(mdo): bcas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/ mngon par 'byung ba yang spyod/ dga' sa khyad pa'ang sngon byang chub kyi snying por yang 'gro ba yang s+ho/ nad/ btud 'dul ba'ang ston da/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
170b5(mdo): pa'ang ston / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba 'ang nyod yongs su mya ngan/ las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib thams cad rnam par/ seld pas
170b6(mdo): 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba ldan gi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho stond pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i/
170b7(mdo): bar tu stond pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma lad pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams
170b8(mdo): cad dang khyad zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun kyi phul du byung ba/ myi nyam pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos pa chags pa/ shi 'pho bar mthong na/ rtag pa'i 'du
170b9(mdo): shes ldog cing myi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ kyi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag bag myed pa spyod pa'o//
171a1(mdo): pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du myi 'dor gyi ste nang / bsnyen bkur myi byed cing de dag
171a2(mdo): dzang 'di gas d+ha sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bshags su/ bdag cag kyang 'od de/ dus kyang ring du yod kyis 'dong bar bya'o// snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dan
171a3(mdo): shi 'pho bstond te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho ba mthong nas/ skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag skyo bar gyur da nas/ bag myed pa myi byed de/ bag yod pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pI
171a4(mdo): byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'dug pa'i mthu mthong na/ ro mtshar rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ci na
171a5(mdo): kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'a// gyur pa// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'a/ dug bzhin du chos stond to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
171a6(mdo): dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / sras kyis nang na 'dug pas yongs su sbyin par bya ba yod pas de dag yongs su sbyind par bya ba dang / dman pas la
171a7(mdo): mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyis nang na 'dug pa stond to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
171a8(mdo): 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su sbyind par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su sbyind par bya ba phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba stond cing / rab tu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can gang
171a9(mdo): dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su sbyin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin
171b1(mdo): par bya ba dang / bu stegs can gzhan char gcad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa stonang // rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byung
171b2(mdo): chub kyi spying bar 'gro ba'i ma mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes thon las btab pa yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro sa
171b3(mdo): la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang
171b4(mdo): dag nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang dregs pas rlob pa yod de/ de ga de las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sna dang po la 'dug cing / bdud 'dul ba stond to// sems can
171b5(mdo): gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba/ 'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ston te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'tshang
171b6(mdo): rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams ni sgra sna tshogs dang / ca co sna tshogs kar yod pa de dag thams cad myed cing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyang zhi bar
171b7(mdo): gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong na/ bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so//
171b8(mdo): rigs kyi bu sems can gang stond par bkur ba dang stond par khas che la/ de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang sems can dge
171b9(mdo): pa'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstand pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi ka'i grong rdal du song nas lan gsum du bzlas te rnam
172a1(mdo): pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su/
172a2(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa stond te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu ste 'di ni rkye nad te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ shi 'phos stond cing yongs su mya ngan lam 'das pa chen po'i bar du stond to// rigs
172a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa yin no//
172a4(mdo): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myi dge ba'i chos las phyir log pa rnams yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las myi 'da' ba rnams kyi na/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/
172a5(mdo): pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin// shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ thabs mkhas pa rnam/ sa yin/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mar
172a6(mdo): pa rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni myi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang
172a7(mdo): tshor ba myi bzad pa rtsub pa/ tsha ba yid du myi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yun rin por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur myi
172a8(mdo): 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs
172a9(mdo): pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'das pa gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal myi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba myed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang
172b1(mdo): ser sngar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des yi dgas gi nang du skye zhing / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal myi bzad pa rtsub pa myong bar 'gyur ba myed do// byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes
172b2(mdo): pas dge ba'i bshes nyen dang 'grogs pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su myi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyod pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas
172b3(mdo): pa yin pas/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang / rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub seM//
172b4(mdo): dpa' ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnams pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du myi rung bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang myi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bso//
172b5(mdo): nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos sam dge 'dun la bya ba kang byas shing bsnyen pa dang / bstend pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas dbang po
172b6(mdo): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang / de dag byed cing / dbang bo phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul
172b7(mdo): gang na sems can blun pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug pa'i ngang tshul can skal pa myed pa legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu myed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur da pa/ mar
172b8(mdo): myi 'dzin pa/ par myi 'dzind pa/ dge sbyong du myi 'dzind pa dang / bram zer myi 'dzind pa dag gi nang du myi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/ dbang po gsal ba/
172b9(mdo): mkhas pa mkhas par bkur ba/ skal pa yod pa legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu' yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyurd pa/ mar 'dzind pa
173a1(mdo): par 'dzind pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzind pa/ bram zer 'dzind pa dag gi nang du skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gi shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// byang chub seMs
173a2(mdo): dpa' rnams ni kang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu myed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba la tshe rings po'i nang du myi skye'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i
173a3(mdo): nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ni thabs mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas myi bzhugs/
173a4(mdo): pa dang / chos myi thos pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen bkur byar myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag du myi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o/
173a5(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir/ ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba myi mnga' ba dang / dmu rgod gi ngang tshul can ma yin
173a6(mdo): kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas 'di lta bu dag thos phrag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/ skyo bar gyur nas/ myi dge ba'i chos la de dag spang ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus
173a7(mdo): brtsams pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
173a8(mdo): sems ma stord pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste g.yo dang sgyu myed de/ drang zhing bya mya myed la sems dang pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de 'dzind pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis
173a9(mdo): dang / nem nur dang / be tsom byed pa rnams yin/ chos la slob dpon gi dpel 'khyud dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral
173b1(mdo): ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de lta bur byed de myi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzind pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas 'i yod
173b2(mdo): pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol theg pa chen po la 'bab/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la stond par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skye
173b3(mdo): pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma sto da pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs
173b4(mdo): dran pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/ dam pa'i chos yo sa su 'dzind pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag
173b5(mdo): pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa myed pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa myed pa/ rnams yin/ dka' ba mang ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin/
173b6(mdo): rdzus te skyes pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnam sa yin te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dam pa'i chos la rim gro yo//
173b7(mdo): cing / bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa'i gang bag rnams la rim gro med cing / bkum sti/ yod pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus dang srog la gyi lta bar dam pa'i chos
173b8(mdo): yongs su 'dzind cing / 'chang ngo // klog go// kun chub par byed do// gzhan la yang rgya cher stond to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul
173b9(mdo): khrims rnam gsum gyis tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa myed pa yin te/ de yang rim gro myed pa ma yin gyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'gyod pa myed pa
174a1(mdo): sgrib pa myed pa yin/ sgrib pa myed pas dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ bsgom pa mang bas sems mnyam pa gzhag par 'gyur/ sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs
174a2(mdo): su dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir tshe rabs dran pa yin te/ de tshe rabs gcig kyang
174a3(mdo): rjes su dran no// gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang /
174a4(mdo): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
174a5(mdo): sangs rgyas mthong pa dang / zos pa dang / dran pa dang / ma bral ba/ rnams yin/ chos mnyan pa dang / ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge/ 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / ma bral ba rnams yin//
174a6(mdo): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra/ pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang
174a7(mdo): zag chos smra ba dag dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyind pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa/
174a8(mdo): dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyand pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang
174a9(mdo): chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs mo yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'ad
174b1(mdo): lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o// lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs
174b2(mdo): pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'ji la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs
174b3(mdo): pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim pa dang stend pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na/ sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs pa
174b4(mdo): rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des/ gnas 'di dag rnam par spongs pa'i tshe/ gang zag de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par myi bya/ khong khro ba'i sems dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed
174b5(mdo): par myi bya yi/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / sems can rnams ni khams so sor ste nad te/ ste nad par gyur da nas chud za bar 'gyur ro// zhes bka' saNald kyis/ de bas na bdag
174b6(mdo): gis bstend pa yongs su spangs par bya'o// snyam du sems nye bar bzhag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdig pa'i grogs po yod ma su spang
174b7(mdo): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag
174b8(mdo): pa rnams yin/ lus rma myed pa rnams yin/ lus legs par grub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing / gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gis mye
174b9(mdo): khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yin/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
175a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
175a2(mdo): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maN+Dal pa/ rigs kyi bu sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
175a3(mdo): lus kyi myi mnyam pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur da pa'i phyir ro// sa gnyis pa'i la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yod
175a4(mdo): su dag pa 'thob bo// sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba dang gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma myed pa 'thob bo// sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs
175a5(mdo): su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa 'thob bo// sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus 'thob bo// sa drug pa la brtags pa
175a6(mdo): bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir/ lus brtag par bya ba'am yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo// sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su
175a7(mdo): grub pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i lus bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'thob bo// sa rgyad pa la sros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo// sa dgu pa
175a8(mdo): la lus tshad myed pas khyab pa'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo// sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes bya thams cad yang dag par grub
175a9(mdo): pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid
175b1(mdo): la tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rigs kyi lus tha dad pas tha dad du bya ba myed de/ yon tan dang mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa dzaH
175b2(mdo): cad rnam par se lad pas gsold pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lu tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la yon tan dang mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa ca lad pa/
175b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni// tha dad pa myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa'
175b4(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lngar na gang lta bu yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu de
175b5(mdo): pas na don 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpel/ bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ byi dor ma byas pa'i/ nor bu rin po che dang / byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'odi
175b6(mdo): lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ji ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin bo che mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa ltar ni byi dor ma
175b7(mdo): byas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang
175b8(mdo): chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes myi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi
175b9(mdo): khams tshad myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams tshad myed pa 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shi nad tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems da'i
176a1(mdo): lus nor bu rin po che ni de tsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na tshes gnyis gi zla ba ni zla ba zhes bya
176a2(mdo): ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas/ zla ba nya'i bar gyi zla ba yang zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir
176a3(mdo): te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te/ lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lam myer myi 'gyur/
176a4(mdo): lhan ner myi 'gyur/ lhang der myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na zla ba nya ba'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin du gshegs pa'i sku dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod thosan/
176a5(mdo): kyi'i mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid kyi sa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chubasems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// bcu gang
176a6(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi za ba dang / dri ma dang nga rgyas dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lta ba phyin
176a7(mdo): ci log dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po dag gis myi tshugs pa yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis
176a8(mdo): myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad bdud/
176a9(mdo): kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la gyod pa thams cad kyis myi tshugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs
176b1(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po deng dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bkur/
176b2(mdo): pa rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/ phyind par byed pa rnams yin/ brten par bya ba rnams yi ni/ nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/ rgyags shi nang du phun gsum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshegs shi nad tu sug+sa/
176b3(mdo): pa rnams yin/ mya ngoms pa rnams yan/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yini/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyind par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba
176b4(mdo): yin pa nas/ ji ltar na thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyind par bya ba'i la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang rgyal
176b5(mdo): po'i blon po chen po dag gse bkur ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs
176b6(mdo): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi myi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang myi/
176b7(mdo): slob pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
176b8(mdo): na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dkon par 'dron pa// mang por gcan bas gtses pa dag par legs par bde zhing yongs su ma skyo bar phyind par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'kho
176b9(mdo): ba'i 'brog dgon par chen po'i na ngan sems can 'dron pa mang po nyon mongs pa'i gcan pas gces pa legs par bde zhing yongs su ma skyo bar phyind par byed par yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po la
177a1(mdo): brten pa sdug bsngal ba dang / 'phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas/ 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa/ ded dpon chen po la brten na gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang
177a2(mdo): gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye
177a3(mdo): bar 'tsho ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dka' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs gi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni/ nam
177a4(mdo): phyogs su 'gro bar chas te/ 'dron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyind par bya ba'i phyir/ 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ grong khyer chen por phyin da ga bar du rgyags phun gsum tshogs
177a5(mdo): pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo/ ba myed par 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang / nam sangs rgyas kyis bstend pa'i phyogs
177a6(mdo): su 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can 'dron pa mang po/ ded de 'khorar ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyind par bya bar 'dod
177a7(mdo): pa de'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi brgyags kyi tshogs shi na du phun sum tshogs par 'gro'o// rigs ka bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang
177a8(mdo): bye dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man zhes dang / byi yul stsogs pa mang po bstsogs shing phyogs su 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen po
177a9(mdo): mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs shinang tu bstsags shing 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni nor bstsags pas chog myi zhes pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub seMs
177b1(mdo): dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos gi nor brtsegs pas cho ga myi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste nor phun gsum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas/
177b2(mdo): 'dron pa mang po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yeng 'di lta ste yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi ngo bo dang / chos la dbang ba dang / ma log
177b3(mdo): par smra bas/ sems can 'dron pa mang pos thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyind par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no// de bzhin du byang
177b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da kyi grong khyer chen por phyind par byas pa la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas
177b5(mdo): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi grong khyer che na por phyind par bya/ ba mkhas pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag/ dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no//
177b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la ma khas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste lam mnyam pa 'ang rab tu shes/ lamanyam nga ba'ang rab tu shes/ lam bde ba
177b7(mdo): 'ang rab tu shes 'cham pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang / chu myed pa yang rab tu shes/ lam gi dgongs mal dag kyang rab tu shes lam gi sa tshugs dag kyang rab tu zhes/ lam 'khyog pa dag
177b8(mdo): kyang rab du shes/ lam drang po dag kyang rab du shes/ lam 'byung ba 'ang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
177b9(mdo): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par stond pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lam stond kyi nyan thos kyi lam
178a1(mdo): gyi ston to// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam stond kyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam myi ston to// thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad/
178a2(mdo): mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam stond kyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam myi stond to// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam stond kyi thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi lam myi stond to// bdag
178a3(mdo): tu 'dzind pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzind pa la mngon par zhend pa rnams la bdag myed pa'i lam dang / stong pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang
178a4(mdo): skyes bu dang / gang zag gi lam myi ston to// mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam stond kyi mtha' gnyis la gnyis pa myi stond to// sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams
178a5(mdo): la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam stond kyi g.yeng ba'i lam/ myi stond to// sros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems canarnams la/ de bzhin nyid kyi lam stond kyi/ byis pa spros pa'i
178a6(mdo): mngon par dga' ba'i lam myi stond to// 'khor ba la mngon bar dga' ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam stond kyi 'khor ba'i lam myi stond to// lam gol bar zhugs
178a7(mdo): ba'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang / cher ma byed pa'i lam stond kyi/ nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i lam gyi ston du to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
178a8(mdo): sems dpa' lam ma log par stond pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyu nad myi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di
178a9(mdo): lta ste lus la dran pa shi nad tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// tshor ba rnams dang / sems dang / chos rnams dang / yul rnams dang / dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang /
178b1(mdo): yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su gcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa' rnams dang / nye ba'i nyon
178b2(mdo): mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pashin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shind tu nye bar
178b3(mdo): bzhag cing gnas she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' kang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa'i myi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo 'o// de'i 'og gi rkang pa'i
178b4(mdo): mthil nas brtsams te/ yang na klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go// lus la bdag myed par yang rtog ko/ lus kyi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa'i dang / chu rgyus kyis glags pa dang
178b5(mdo): dri myi zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / kha dog myi sdug par rtog ste/ de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ gang lus la lus su 'dod pa dang / lus la 'dod chags dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gi
178b6(mdo): 'dzind pa dang / lus la zhend pa de dag myi 'byung ste/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar myi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan tu na lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang
178b7(mdo): du 'gyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa shind tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
178b8(mdo): 'di snyam du sems ste/ tshor ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyi nad ci log du gyu da pa rnams ni bde bar 'dzind te/ byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin
178b9(mdo): kyi 'phags pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sug bsngal bar thugs su chud nas/ de spang ba'i phyir/ nan tan mdzad la sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis/ bdag gis kyang de gi rjes su bslab pa
179a1(mdo): bya'o snyam ste/ de de ltar rtogs pas tshor ba rnams la dran pashin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang myed/ khong khro ba 'ang myed cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no//
179a2(mdo): gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ de 'di snyam du sems
179a3(mdo): te/ sems 'di ni myi rtag pa la rtag par mngon par dka' ba'o// sug bsngal ba la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o// bdag myed pa la bdag tu mngon par dka' ba'o// gyi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o// gso
179a4(mdo): nang myi nyan la gyur du 'gyur ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o// ngan song nams kyi sgo'o// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o// bde 'gro rnams chung gsond pa'o// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
179a5(mdo): gti mug rnams kyi rkyend du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag/ por gyur da pa'o// chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur da pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems phog par 'gro ste/ sems yongs su rtse
179a6(mdo): na/ chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// gzhan ya 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa ste/ sems ni sems kyis myi mthong ngo // dge ba 'am yang na gyi dge ba'i khas ni sems kyis bsngags pa'o//
179a7(mdo): sems ni mgal khye bskor ltar 'khor// sems ni rta s+phar rnam par 'byam/ sems ni nags kyi me ltar tshig/ sems ni mu chen bzhin du myed// de de ltar rtog pas sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas
179a8(mdo): sems kyi dbang du myi 'gro yi/ sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems de'i dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyurd pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnaso
179a9(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la dran bzhin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug las bstsogs pa dang / de dag la gnas/
179b1(mdo): pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni myi dge bI rmo rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la bsten zhe sdang dang gti mug gi gnyen po la ste nad cing / de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no// chos
179b2(mdo): 'di dag ni dge ba'i zhes bya bar shes nas/ chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar 'jog ste/ chos de dag kyang yang dag par blangs shing gnas so// gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub seMs//
179b3(mdo): dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shi nad tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shind tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas shes na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i
179b4(mdo): yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg la chags par 'dzind par yang myi 'gyur/ 'ong khro ba'i sems kyang myi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po myed pa'i chos
179b5(mdo): rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni bdag gi myi cha ste/ de ni bdag byis/ pa'i dang / rmongs pa dang / myi 'gal ba dang / myi mkhas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur de nas zhe nad pa
179b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro// rmongs par dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba'i chos rnam par bsgom par myi 'gyur te/ de'i rgyu sa ngan song du 'gro bar gsungs so zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag
179b7(mdo): chos gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems skyed pa ni bdag gi mya che ste/ de ni bdag gi myi bzod pa dang / dang du myi lend pa dang khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te ni 'phags pa rnams kyis ni smad par 'gyur/ tshangs pa
