179b8(mdo): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams pa kyis ni dpya' bar 'gyur ro// zhes de de ltar rtog pas yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas te/ yul rnams kyis myi sbas shing rma byung bar myi 'gyur la gzhan yang bslab
179b9(mdo): pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pashind tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/
180a1(mdo): de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa myed par rnam par spyod pa rnams gi gnas so// zhi bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so// dgon pa na ni lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za gzhan gi
180a2(mdo): sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed la byed cing / sems pa de ni bdag gi myi che'o snyam ste/ de tshul
180a3(mdo): bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhan/
180a4(mdo): cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas shes na/ 'di la byang
180a5(mdo): chub sems dpa' grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i spyad pa spyod na'/ gnas gang tshul dang myi 'dra zhing / yod
180a6(mdo): su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang myi mthun pa de dag yongs su spong ngo // de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chang ma'i khyim 'am/ spang 'tshong gi khyim 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ brgyan po'i gnas so/
180a7(mdo): ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam gar mkhan dang klu gar gi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang myi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spong zhing / de dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cir gnas te/ de
180a8(mdo): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang /
180a9(mdo): bkur sti dang / grangs pa dang / sma dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la/ dran pashin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing rnyed pa
180b1(mdo): dang bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ ci nas kyang zhen par myi 'gyur/ sred pa myi skye chags pa myi skyed/ bdag gir myi byed/ nor du myi 'dzind/ bdag gir myi 'dzind pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang / thun mong du
180b2(mdo): byas shing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba de ltar gtong ste/ gal te yang rgyu de dang / rkye nad de dang / gzhi des grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang / des khengs par myi
180b3(mdo): 'gyur/ nga rgyal myi skye rgyags pa myi skye ste/ de 'di snyam du sems so// ring por myi thogs par grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang las byung ba dang / gang gis phyung ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra
180b4(mdo): dang / tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur na/ de la mkhas pa rang bzhin can du su zhig myi rtag cing kyi gnas pa'i chos myi brtan pa yid brtan du myi rung ba dag la dga' ba'i sems
180b5(mdo): skyed pa 'am/ khengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang tshigs su
180b6(mdo): bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab ba bcas pa sa dran pazhin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'dra
180b7(mdo): la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bsrabs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//
180b8(mdo): gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
180b9(mdo): kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes/ de de ltar yid ches pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa yin te/ brtson par byed pa dang /
181a1(mdo): legs par bya ba byed cing / shi nad tu rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la/ dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar
181a2(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pashin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas she na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mong dra ba rnams la dran
181a3(mdo): pa dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te de dag gang las byung ba dang / rkyen gang gis byung ba'i gzhi yang rab tu shes te des de ltar shes nas byung ba de dang / rkyen
181a4(mdo): de dag yongs su spong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems da la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang kun nas nyon mo sa pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag cing gnas pa yin no//
181a5(mdo): rigs gi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag
181a6(mdo): dar khrod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste yang dag par zla ba la brtan pa rnams yin/ sems dman pa rnams yin no// yongs su gyi skyo ba rnam sa yin no// de la ma zhen pa rnams yin/ nyes par wA
181a7(mdo): pa dang bral ba rnams yin yod tan lta ba rnams yin/ bdag la kyi stod pa rnams yin/ gzhanal gyi rtsod pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs ldan mas yin/ lha 'du ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi nun
181a8(mdo): la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas ji ltar na lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad ning bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/
181a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad cing yid ches pa yin/ de srog gi phyim yang yang dag par blangs pa gyi 'jig cing yang dag par blangs pa las myi 'gyur te/ de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas bsam pa phun sumachog
181b1(mdo): pa dang / sems dpa' zhing nga rgyal byed pa yin de nga rgyal myed cing sems dpa' bas/ phyag dar khrod pa dang don yongs su bor ba/ skye bo thams cad dang khyi mthun pa dag sung ngo // de dag bsus nas 'dra bar byed do// de bkru ba dang
181b2(mdo): klan pa dang / bcom pa dang / btso bar byed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing yongs su myi skyo ste/ yongs su myi skyo ba rkyend du byas nas ci tsam gis don grub par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de la zhen par yang myi 'gyur ro//
181b3(mdo): kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni zhigs pa'o kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sdom pa'o// kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni shig mang ba ste/ lus la myi bde zhing dngul 'byind to zhes nyes par lta ba ma yin gi/ phyag
181b4(mdo): dur khrod pa 'di dag ni drang srong gis bgos pa'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mthun pa'o// 'phags pa'i rigs dang mthun pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas pas bsngags pa'o//
181b5(mdo): zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ rgyu de dang de rkyen de dang / gzhi des bdag la myi stod gzhan la myi smod do// de ba dag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang / thalapas chub rnaMs kun du chogs pa yin
181b6(mdo): dun du sa rnams 'dub / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam sa kyis bsngags pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ngas su bca' ba yin/ myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs
181b7(mdo): su bsrung ba yin/ bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong rnam gi gyi dang / lus kyi phyi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/ sangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gzeng bstod sngar bya ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu tshom bcu po ni/
181b8(mdo): dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' phyag dang thod pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad nam yar seld pas gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya
181b9(mdo): khro rnams la spyod pa dman tshigs kyis ci zhig mgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas lad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyor pa yin te/ stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'dzin
182a1(mdo): 6 garten dang 'thun par spyod kyi/ stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu ma thob pas ni/ nyon mongs pa ma langs pa'i gnyen por bstend par bya'o// gzhan
182a2(mdo): yang rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos pa/ 'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
182a3(mdo): stsal pa de'i lan gsol du/ bdag gis tshig myi phyi nad to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa las smos pa ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni
182a4(mdo): chos gzigs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang la yang mos par bgyi ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa gling gzhi'i
182a5(mdo): myi rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mos pa dam/ na pa gzhan la spyod pa dman tshegs stond cing / de dag gi mdun du sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa de ci'i phyir/
182a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag de lta bus 'dul ba'i slad du ste/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnaMs
182a7(mdo): kyi nyon mongs pa ma skyes pa'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa stond pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHsad pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams kyang 'dul ba'i dbang gyi
182a8(mdo): phyir phyag dar khrod par 'gyur gi/ dman pa la mos pa'i phyir ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos gos
182a9(mdo): gsum pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chog shes pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa chung pa rnams yin/ kun tu btsal ba dang / bral ba rnams yin/ stsogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ bstsags pa chud
182b1(mdo): zos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ bstsags pa chud zos pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral ba rnams yin/ yid myi bde ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'khrug pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ lend pa myed pa rnams yin/ zag pa zad pa
182b2(mdo): bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gos ngan ngon gyis chog shes shing 'dod pa chung ba yin/ de 'dod pa chung bas na kun tu tshol ba myed pa yin/ kun tu tshol ba myed pas na// stsogs
182b3(mdo): pa myed pa yin/ stsogs pa byed pas na bstsags pa chud za ba myed pa yin/ bsngags pa chung za ba myed pas na bsngags pa chud zos pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myed pa yin/ sdug bsngal myed pas na/ yid myi bde ba
182b4(mdo): myed pa yin/ yid myi bde ba myed pas na 'khrug pa myed pa yin/ 'khrug pa myed pas na lend pa myed pa yin/ lend pa myed pas na zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
182b5(mdo): dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cho blo gsum pa rnams// yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phying ba can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste// 'dod chag
182b6(mdo): kyi bsam pas myi 'gro ste de'i phyir phyir pa can zhes bya'o// de bzhi na du zhe sdang gi bsam pas myi 'gro gti mug gi bsam pas myi 'arlo/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi bsam pas myi 'gro/ phra dog dang sem
182b7(mdo): sna'i bsam pas myi 'gro/ nga rgyal gi bsam las myi 'gro/ grags pa 'dod pa'i bsam pas myi 'gro/ shes kyi khye 'dod pa'i bsam pas myi 'gro// rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i bsam pas myi 'gro/ zhing bdud la
182b8(mdo): myi 'dud dga' bar bya bas snyems pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir phyir pa can zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
182b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems can rnams la phan par zhugs pa rnams yin/ mthar gyis bsod snyoms le nad pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi chad pa myed
183a1(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin can rnams yin/ chos shes pa rnams yin/ bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin/ ma chags pa rnams yin/ bsod snyoms bza' ba la chod zhes pa rnams yin/ dge bzhi
183a2(mdo): phyogs la mngon tu phyogs pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i cha ba shind tu yongs su sus pa rnams yin/ ri mang po'i 'du shes myed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems cad rnams la
183a3(mdo): phan par zhugs pa yin pas nas/ ji ltar na ril po'i 'du shes myed pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dge ba'i pha ba chung ba dang / dge ba'i cha ba chung ngu dang ldan pa sdug bsngal
183a4(mdo): ba dag mthong na/ sems can de dag la phan pa'i phyir/ zos snyoms pa'i yid dam 'dzind te/ de nam grong ngam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal nu bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ba de'i tshe/ dran bzhin tu nye bar bzhag pa dang /
183a5(mdo): spyod lam mdzes pas dbang po kyi g.yo ba dang / dbang po kyi rgod pa dang / dbang po dul ba dang kanya shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / dge ba 'i chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag nas bsod nams
183a6(mdo): kyi phyir 'gro'o// de bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro na/ bsod snyoms ma dkyis lend pa yin te/ mgo la 'bang bstod cing bram ze gings la chen po lta bu'i grong ngam/ rgyal rigs zhings la chen po lta bu
183a7(mdo): 'igrong ngam/ khyim bdag shibs la chen po lta bu'i grong 'byor dpa 'byor pa dag tu myi 'jug gi/ mtha' gcig nas bzung ste/ nam de'i don grub par gyur kyi bar du bsod snyoms spyod de/ gzhan du na gnas gang na
183a8(mdo): khyi za 'am/ ba drus ma 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa/ rang bzhin gyis ngang tshul ngan pa'i srog chags sam/ bud myed dam/ skyes pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo rgyal ka bya ba'i bsam pa dag yod pa 'am/ smad
183a9(mdo): pa'i gnas thams cad du thams cad yongs su spong ste/ de mtha rad kyis bsod snyoms la 'gro na/ yongs su yi myi 'chad cing kun nas nyon mongs pa myed la/ sems can de dag la chags pa yang mying skyed/ 'ong khro ba
183b1(mdo): yang byi skyed de/ yongs su yi 'chad pa myed pas/ so sor ci rigs pa'i bsod snyoms ngan don gyis chog shes pa yin te/ des bsod snyoms de blangs nas bdag gi gnas su 'ongs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag
183b2(mdo): rga lag bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la bkur ba ste dang rim gro byas ste/ gnas su song nas bsod snyoms de las cha gcig ni tshangs pa mtshungs
183b3(mdo): par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir gzhog go// gnyis pa ni stug bsngal pa rnams kyi phyir gzhog go// gsum pa ni sems can log par ltung pa rnams kyi phyir gzhog go// cha bzhi pa ni bdag za ste/ de za ba na 'do/
183b4(mdo): chags par za ste/ chags par ma yin/ brkam par ma yin/ zhen par ma yin gyi gzhan du na ji tsam du lus gnas par 'gyur ba dang / 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir za ste/ ji ltar na ha cang yang nyam dma' ba dang / ha cang
183b5(mdo): yang lus lus lci bar yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar za ste/ de ci'i phyi/ ra zhe na/ ha cang nyam dmas na ni dge ba'i phyogs la rgyab kyis pa/ ltas par 'gyur ro// lus ha cang lcis na ni gnyid kyis gnon
183b6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// des bsod snyoms de zos nas/ dge ba'i phyogs la mngon tu phyogs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / le lo myed pa dang / snyom pa myed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
183b7(mdo): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar bya'o// de byang chub phyogs kyi chos yongs su 'dus pas/ bdag tu 'dzind pa myed pa yin/ bdag tu 'dzi nad pa myed pas bdag gi shas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs
183b8(mdo): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin no// bcu
183b9(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste bdud thams cad kyis bsdigs kyang byang chub kyi snying po'i bstan gcig las kyi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan las myi g.yo ba rnams yin// 'jig te/ las 'das pa'i
184a1(mdo): shes rab las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'jig brten las 'das pa'i ye shes las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ stong pa nyid las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag
184a2(mdo): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ lam las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ de bzhin nyid las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa
184a3(mdo): nyid kyi stan las myi g.yo ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/ de ni thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi stan no// rigs kyi bu stan gcig po ni 'di yin te/ de ni chos kyi stan to// stan de las
184a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de dag myi g.yo ste/ de bas na stan gcig/ pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stan gcig pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi
184a5(mdo): bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zas phyis myi len// pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste myi brkam pa'i rang // bzhin can rnams yin/ ma chags pa'i rang bzhin can rnams
184a6(mdo): yin/ de dag gis nam tshod gzung bar gyur da pa de'i tshe/ tshod yod dam myed kyang rung ste/ de dag gi lus rton pa'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ mar ram 'bru mar ram/ sbrang rtsi 'am bu
184a7(mdo): ram 'am/ rtsa ba'i khu ba'am/ sdong po'i khu ba 'am/ 'bras bu'i khu ba de lta bu dag bzar myi rung ngo // gzhan za ba mthong yang khong khro ba'i sems dang / 'jungs pa'i sems kyang myi skyed do// yang
184a8(mdo): gal te zas phyis myi lend pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ji lta bu'i nad kyis srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'am/ dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du 'gyur te/ nad tshabs chen des 'gyod pa myed cing the tsom
184a9(mdo): myed par byas la/ sman yin par sems nye bar bzhag pa spyad par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bas phyis kyi len pa yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
184b1(mdo): chub sems dpa' bas phyis myi len pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dkon pa pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste yun ring po nas tshangs pa mtshungs
184b2(mdo): bar spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa zhes yin/ dbang po ma nyams pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin// nus pa rnams yin/ bdag du 'dzind pa'i 'jigs pa dang pAl/
184b3(mdo): ba rnams yin/ ri dgas dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ lus kyi zag pa bsrings pa rnams yin/ dben pa la mngon tu phyogs pa rnams yin/ myi dka' ba dang ma 'dres pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu
184b4(mdo): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na myi dgal ba dang / ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' legs
184b5(mdo): par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin/ 'jogasum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang san pa yin chos nyid del mkhas shing cho ga dang / spyod yul dang / 'gro ba dang / phyir
184b6(mdo): 'ong ba la mkhas pas/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams kyis bslab pa'ilam bstand pa de 'di lta ste/ don dang tshig dang / 'byung ba la
184b7(mdo): mkhas pa dang / gzhan gi dring myi 'jog cing / gzhan gis myi bkri ba yin no// de ltung ba byung na ltung ba las 'byung ba rab tu shes shing gnas de dag kyang yong su spong ngo // gnas de dag la gus par byed cing /
184b8(mdo): 'chags pa mang ba yin no// sdig pa de la smad cing 'gyod de/ 'thol bar byed do// gnas gang dag du ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes shing / gang dag tu myi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ gang
184b9(mdo): dag tu chen por 'gyur ba dang / gang dag tu 'bring dang / gang dag tu chung ngur 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu shes/ las kang gi rnam par sbyin pa'i yun ci srid pa de yang rab tu zhes te/ de yang nan tan gyis sgrub bo//
185a1(mdo): de myig gi dbang po ma nyams pa dang / rna ba'i dbang po ma nyams shing / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ma nyams par dgon pa na gnas te/ gnas gang na 'tshe ba myed pa'i gnas de dag tu gnaso// /
185a2(mdo): gnas gang dag na bsod snyoms blang ba'i dpyod yul dang ha cang yang myi ring ha cang yang myi nye ba dang / gnas gang dag na chu dang zhing rnyog pa myed pa gtsang zhing dri ma myed pa/ tshegs chung ba yod pa dang / gnas gang na shing
185a3(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/ gcan zan khro bo myed pa/ phug dang ldan pa/ sman bshos dang ldan pa/ thag thug myed pa/ 'gro na
185a4(mdo): bde ba/ zhi ba gnyis su myed pa'i gnas/ de 'dra ba dag na gnas so// de gnas de dag na gnas shing / gang des sngon blags pa dang / sngon zosra de nyin lan gsum/ mtshan gsum du sma ha cang yang myi che/ ha ca
185a5(mdo): myi chung ba dang / dbang po myi rgod cing phyi rol tu ma song ba'i sems// kyis dad pas/ nye bar 'tsho bzhir tshig nye bar bzung ste/ man/ na ma 'dzin cing gnyid kyis ma log par kha ton byed do// gal
185a6(mdo): te dge slong dgon pa'i drung du rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ de ma yin pa'i gzhan bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ grong rda la gyi myi 'am/ yul gyi myi dag 'ongs na des de dag la gus par
185a7(mdo): legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des rgyal po chen po ji ltar bdan bting ba la bzhugs shig ces de skad byas nas/ gal te 'dug na gnyi ga yang 'dug par bya'o// de ste myi 'dug na gnyi ga yang
185a8(mdo): myi 'dug par bya'o// gal te dbang po rgod par gyu rad na rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis sa phyogs na dge sbyong pa dang / bram ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ mang du thos pa dag myi rgod
185a9(mdo): dang / spre'u rnams kyis a gtses par gnas pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bstod par bya'o// de ste brtan bzhin du la la dbang po rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te/ chos bstan par rung na/ de la chos snga
185b1(mdo): tshogs bstand par bya'o// de ste chos sna tshogs bstand pa la myi dga' na/ de la skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i chos bstand par bya'o// de ste skyo ba dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan pa la myi dga' na/ de la de bzhin gshegs ni
185b2(mdo): rgya che ba rgya che ba dag bstand par bya'o// bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yukyi shu myi dag 'ongs na yang ci rigs par bya ba dag bya'o// de de sngar mang du thos pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems
185b3(mdo): mgu bar byed nus pa yin te/ sems can de dag kyang de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa thob par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa kun nas langs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yang nus pa yin no// mang du thos pa'i
185b4(mdo): stobs bskyed pas// bdag tu 'dzind pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin no// de bdag du 'dzind pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral nas// dgon pa de na myi 'jigs myi skrag myi sdang / bag tsha ba myed cing /
185b5(mdo): rab tu dben pa la mngon tu phyogs par gyur te gnas so// de dgon pa de na dben pa la mngon tu phyogs shing 'du 'dzi myed par/ gnas pas ri dgas dang 'dra ba yin no// ri dgas kyi bu byang
185b6(mdo): chub sems dpa' dgon pa ni ri dgas ltar rtag tu 'jigs pa yin/ te/ de la ri dgas kyi nyes pa yang myed mod kyi/ ji ltar ri dgas dag bdag 'di'i lan bon gyis srog gi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong /
185b7(mdo): zhes yul dang yul gyi phyogs ring po pas kyang ring por spong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa 'di'i lan bon gis/ yi dam gyi bar chad dam/ sems g.yeng bar gyur da na myi rung ngo zhes bud myed dam/ skyes
185b8(mdo): pa 'am/ khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / 'du 'dzi myi byed cing / 'du 'dzi dag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // de de ltar zag bsrings te/ gnas pas rab tu dben pa la mngon tu phyogs pa yin/ de rab tu dge
185b9(mdo): ba la mngon tu phyogs pas/ dgon bdel yon tan tu lta ba dang / zhi bar lta ba yin/ de yon tan du lta zhing zhi bar lta bas na/ myi dga' ba dang myi 'dra'o// de myi dgal dang ma 'dres pas/ dkon pa pa'i chos rnams yang dag
186a1(mdo): par blangs nas spyod de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa nas/ myi dka' ba dang ma 'dres pa'i bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
186a2(mdo): dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shing drung ba rnams yin no// / bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ grong dang ha cang nye ba'i shing drung du
186a3(mdo): myi rten/ grong dang ha cang ring ba'i shing drung du myi rten/ lA ma ldum tsher ma can gis kis gang ba'i shing drung du myi rten/ shing ma u ta dang / ka pi ka tsu'i khri shing gis gang ba'i zhing drung dur du myi rten/ shing lo mo skams pa'o /
186a4(mdo): rlung du myi rten/ swe lu 'dug pa'i shing du myi rten/ bya gnas pa'o ging cu myi rten/ gcas 'an 'khro bo gnas pa'i shing drung myi rten/ 'dron po ga nas pa'i shing drung du myi rten/ myi g.yon can gnas pa'i gi rlung
186a5(mdo): du myi rten gis gang na lus bag yangs shing sems dka' bar 'gyu ra ba'i shing drung de lta bur rten no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po do dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal shing drung ba rnams yin no//
186a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bla ka ba myed pa rnams yin no// bcu kang zhe na 'di lta ste dkun nam dpyid dam dbyar ram ston yang rung ste/ rtsig drung ne myi ga nas/ gir drung d+hu ma
186a7(mdo): yin/ sog ma spungs par ma yin/ ri'i sman gshong du ma yin/ chu lkog du ma yin/ grang ba skyob par yang myi byed/ rlung skyob pa ma yin char skyob pa ma yin/ nyi ma skyob pa ma yin/ ba mo'i skyabs kyang myi byed
186a8(mdo): kyi/ gzhan tu na gal te byang chub sems dpa' bla ga ba myed pa pa na 'am lus kyis myi nus par gyur du na/ des gtsug lag/ khang du gnas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po phyir de bzhin gshegs sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcas/
186a9(mdo): te/ cinas kyang bdag yug lag khang na gnas bzhin du/ nyon mongs po rnams 'aspong la 'bad pa de ltar bya'o// zhes de lam sems bskyed par bya'o// gtsug lag khang de la yang chags pa gyi skyed de/ zhen dpa
186b1(mdo): pa yang ma yin no// de yapa 'di ltar sems te/ sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams la phan gdags par bya ba'i/ bdag cag gis bdag nyid gsol bar myi bya'o snyam ste/ de rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par tha gab myed pa'i 'du zhes
186b2(mdo): bar 'jog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bre ga ba myed pa pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu' dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang
186b3(mdo): zhe na 'di lta ste/ gnas gang na gnas kyang rung / skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ de dag 'chi ba'i 'du shes rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par nye bar 'jog pa rnams yin te/ de dag rnam par zos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar bar
186b4(mdo): 'du shes pa dang / rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par rul bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par bam par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang /
186b5(mdo): kyeng rus dang 'du shes pa rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par nye bar 'jog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pas ni bya/ mas pa'i sems su bya'o// phan pa'i sems dang / sems
186b6(mdo): can la snying pa che' ba dang / tshul khrims dang chang sA'i cho ka dang ldan zhing / sha dpa'abag pa myed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dur khrod dam yod na ni gang byang chub sems dpa' sha za pa
186b7(mdo): mthong na/ ma dad pa skyed cing / gtse bar sems pa'i myi ma yin pa dag gnas pa yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tur khrod pas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag
186b8(mdo): byas dge' srong rgan rabs rnams la phyag byas te/ gsar bu rnams kyang dga' bar byas la/ 'greng ste 'dug par bya'o// dge la 'dun gi mal stan la/ 'dug par myi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
186b9(mdo): sems dpa' 'jig rten ki yid dang sbyar te byas ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa ni/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten dang myi mthun kyi// 'phags pa dang ni myi mthun pa myed do// gal te byang chub sems dpa'
50a1(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / zil gyis
50a2(mdo): myi gnon pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu myed pa dang phrad pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzind la rnal 'byor da du bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
50a3(mdo): sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du gnas/ gang dag
50a4(mdo): thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi// gzhan na gyi dring la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' dri ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhan
50a5(mdo): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems
50a6(mdo): can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang bde bar bya ba'i sems dang / snying brtseche ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i seMs
50a7(mdo): dang / stug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang / kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te/ sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed
50a8(mdo): do/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpal de lung mnod pa dang / kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o// mang du zos nas// rab
50a9(mdo): tu dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu dben pa gyur nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas/ bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o//
50b1(mdo): bka' blo bde bar gyur nas/ dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// dus shes par gyur da nas/ myi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o// myi 'jigs par gyurd nas/ don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// don shes par gyurd nas
50b2(mdo): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su gyur nas/ rjed pa myed pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// rmongs pa myed par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
50b3(mdo): sems bskyed ma zag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing / gong du gnas gang dag zos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gi dring la myi 'jog pa
50b4(mdo): thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la na la 'byor de spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang
50b5(mdo): zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la rnal 'byor da spyod pa'i bya// nga chub sems dpa' ni dmyigs pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed de// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
50b6(mdo): la myi rtog pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag myed pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo ba myed pa nyid dang / 'bugs 'byin pa myed pa nyid
50b7(mdo): dang / gnas myed pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa myed pa nyid dang / rtsol ba myed pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir/ sbyor bar byed myi byed
50b8(mdo): myi sbyor bar yang myi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni/ rnal 'byor da pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rnal 'byor da spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag
50b9(mdo): pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar byeda'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
51a1(mdo): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba
51a2(mdo): 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni rnal 'byor de pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
51a3(mdo): gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyar ba byed
51a4(mdo): pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gar zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid las phyir myi zlog pa dang / sangs rgyas la myi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par gyu da pa yongs su
51a5(mdo): grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par spyod pa dang / zhing la rnam par spyod pa dang // 'jig rten la rnam par spyod pa dang / las la rnam par spyod/
51a6(mdo): pa dang / rnam par sbyin pa la rnam par spyod pa dang / 'khor ba la rnam par spyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par pyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong bar byed pa bcu po de dag gis gsung rab
51a7(mdo): 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
51a8(mdo): mnyam pa nyid rnam par gyud pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par spyang
51a9(mdo): pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon do pAM
51b1(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par grub pa rnam par khyad pa la sbyang bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
51b2(mdo): yang dag par grub par rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su
51b3(mdo): 'grub pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub
51b4(mdo): pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang
51b5(mdo): bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyi/ ra te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sem/ sa dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i
51b6(mdo): sras dag de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i// byang chub sem sa dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' de la sbyor ba phun gsum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
51b7(mdo): dge ba'i las gang ci rtsol yang de dag thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa 'dod par bya ba dang / sems cad thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang / seMs
51b8(mdo): can thams cad la snying rtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la rab tu thar par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa myed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can
51b9(mdo): thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul bar dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir chom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub
52a1(mdo): sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can maH
52a2(mdo): yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu myed pa dang / sems can grangs myed pa dang / sems can bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / sems can mtshungs pa myed pa dang / sems can gzhal du myed pa dang / sems
52a3(mdo): can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba myed pa nyid dang / sems can myed pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa myed pa la sems 'jo//
52a4(mdo): cing gong du gnas gang dag zos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal po'i sras dag 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems
52a5(mdo): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// // kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di/
52a6(mdo): las bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcus thob pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bsdu
52a7(mdo): pangs rgyas kyi sngags pas yin pa lan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi sngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngags pa 'am
52a8(mdo): bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i gyod pa'i sngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas
52a9(mdo): kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa 'am/ sems can gi khams rgya che zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhes 'am/ sems can
52b1(mdo): gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe 'am/ sems can gi khams gdul sla zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings chung zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe 'am/
52b2(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams dag 'jig ce 'am myi 'jig ce 'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod rtse 'am/ chos kyi dbyings myed ces 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal gyi/
52b3(mdo): sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu
52b4(mdo): yang dag par brjod bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa nyid du yang dag par rjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa
52b5(mdo): nyid dang / myed pa nyid dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmyi la/ ma lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa myed pa nyid du yang dag par
52b6(mdo): brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar myi 'phrogs pa'i phyir/ shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba chos can du gyurd cig/ gong du gnas gang dag zos pa'i gnas
52b7(mdo): de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gi dri la gyi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// / kye rgyal
52b8(mdo): ba'i sras dag de la phyir myi ldoga'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmyigs pa bcu thos na/ sangs rgyas
52b9(mdo): kyi chos rnams las phyir myi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yod do zhe 'am/ myed do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir myi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe 'am/ myed do zhe
187a1(mdo): dur khrod pa gang dag gi mal stan la btar na/ des ci nas kyang de 'gyod par myi 'gyur la/ gzhan gis kyang dpya bar myi 'gyur bar shi nad tu rtogs par byas la/ dge' slong de'i bsam pa yang shes nas/ gdod stan de la gdol bu
187a2(mdo): dpa' dra bar dma' ba dma' ba'i sems kyis stan de la 'dug par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cog
187a3(mdo): bu ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ sems yongs su gdung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa ma yin/ gnyid kyis non te 'dug pa ma yin/ lus nub par 'dug
187a4(mdo): pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' cog pu pa 'dug pa ni byang chub gi tshogs yongs su bskang ba'i phyir 'dug go// sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir 'dug go// lam mngon du bya ba'i phyir 'dug go// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i
187a5(mdo): phyir 'dug go// sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'dug pago// nyon dmongs pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir 'dug go// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cog bu ba rnams yin
187a6(mdo): no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gzhi rdzi bzhin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste mal stan la ma chags pa rnams yin/ bdag nyid kyang mal snyan myi 'di /
187a7(mdo): gzhan yangs kyang mal stan 'ding du myi 'jug/ 'ding ba'i phyir bdal myi byed cing / gzhan du na lo mas gang ba'am/ rdzas gang ba'i gnas kyang rung ste/ gnas de dag tu nyal bar byed cing / sa gang gi phyogs na sprul
187a8(mdo): gis gang ba 'am/ sbrang ma dang / sha snang gis gang ba dang / khung mang ba de dag ring po bas kyang ring por yongs su spong ngo // de dag nyal ba na klo g.yas pas nyal bar byed de/ rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas/ lus chos
187a9(mdo): gos dag gis shi nang du g.yogs shing dran pa dang shes bzhin du snang ba'i 'du shes dang / ldang ba'i 'du shes su nyal bar byed de/ gnyid kyi bde ba la chags par myi byed/ skyes pa'i bde ba la yang ma yin te/ gzhan du na de
187b1(mdo): dag ci tsam du 'byung ba chen po rnams gnas shing 'tsho ba'i phyir nyal bar byed la/ rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la mngon du phyogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
187b2(mdo): gzhi'i ci bzhin pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste myi sdug pa bsgom pa'i rnams yin/ byams pa bsgom pa mang ba rnams
187b3(mdo): yin/ tend cing 'breld par 'byung ba bsgom pa nas yin/ skyon la mkhas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa mnga' rnams yin/ mtshan ma myed pa bsgom pa rnams yin/ rnal 'byor bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ rgyun du zhugs
187b4(mdo): la nos pa yang ba rnams yin/ 'gyod pa skyed pa rnams yin/ khrims sun gsum tshogs pa rnams yin na// rigs kyi nu rjengan byang chub sems dpa' gyi sdug pa bsgom pa yang ba rnams yin no
187b5(mdo): na/ rigs gi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu lkog tu song ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas/ rab tu dbyen pa la mngon pa/ ra phyogs shing / shi na tu drang po'i sems kyis lus drang po drang po
187b6(mdo): dang / lus 'gas kyis klod pas dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/ phyi rol tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sem sa te// ji snyed du myi'i nang na kha zas dang zas skom rtsang ma yang rung
187b7(mdo): bzang po yang rung ngan pa yang rung / ro phun sum tshogs pa yang rung ro chung ba yang rung ste/ des thams cad lus kyi myes reg pa dang / bachog par 'gyur te/ rul cing dri nga ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mya 'phrod pa yin na/
187b8(mdo): de la byis pa 'di dag ni shi nad du zhe nad cing rab tu chags so// bdag cag ni 'phags pa'i chol 'dul ba la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus la ma zhen ma
187b9(mdo): chags par bya'o// de'i phyir skyo ba'i sems kyang myi skyed do// snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi sdug pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa yang ba yin zhe na/ rigs
188a1(mdo): kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs te/ shi nad tu skyo ba'i sems kyis/ lus drang po drang po dang / lus pags kyis/
188a2(mdo): klod pas/ skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/ phyi rolang tu ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so// sems can gang dag khro ba gnod sems mang ba/ myi dge' ba'i las byed pa rnams dang / gang rnams bdag
188a3(mdo): sa rgol ba dang / dgra' bo gcugs byed par na gnyer ba rnams byung ba 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rung ste/ bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang gnod sems rab tu zhi bar bya ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la
188a4(mdo): dgod par bya'o// snyam mo// de yang dag tsam gis ma yin gi bsam pa zag pas sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brten da cing 'brelang
188a5(mdo): bar 'byung ba mang ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'do// da chags skyes pa dang / khro ba skyes pa dang / gnod sems kyi sem/ sa skyes na/ 'di snyam du sems so// chos 'di su la skye ba de yang
188a6(mdo): shes na byung ma ni ma byed byen ji the sa su na rkyen gang dag gis skye ba de dag kyang rte nad cing 'breld par 'byung ba'o// rtend cing 'breld par 'byung nga ba'i chos gsog de dag la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig
188a7(mdo): bdag la ma 'byin snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsgom pa mang ba rnams yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skyon la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag
188a8(mdo): gi rgyud la skyon yod pa de dag spang ba'i nan tan du byed/ gang gzhan gi rgyud la yod pa myi nus pa'i rang bzhin de dag la yang btang snyoms su gnas so// ma skyon de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rim 'gro myi byed pa dang / chos
188a9(mdo): dang dge la 'dun dang bslab pa dang / 'phags pa rnams dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu rnams la ri mo mya byed pa ni skyon no// bdag la ri mo myi byed pa dang / gzhan la brtas pa dang
188b1(mdo): yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / chad pa ste nga tu gardzas pa dang stong pa nyid du 'dzind pa dang / rtag par 'dzin
188b2(mdo): pa dang / myi rtag par 'dzind pa dang / 'phags pa rnams la mnyes par myi byed pa dang / byis pa'i skye bo dang stend pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su spong ba dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
188b3(mdo): sdig pa'i grogs po la stend pa dang / dge ba'i bshes nyen yongs su spong ba dang / mdo sde bab mo spang ba dang / mdo sde zab mos skrag pa dang / snyom las dang / le lo dang / bdag la brnyas pa dang / gzi brjid chung ba dang /
188b4(mdo): spobs pa myed pa dang / gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa dang / myi 'gyod pa la 'gyod pa dang / 'gyod pa la myi 'gyod pa dang / sgrib pa kun nas lnga ra bas klags pa dang / g.yo sgyus bcings pa dang / rmugs shing ga'i
188b5(mdo): kyis non pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa dang / rus la 'dod// chags pa dang / rigs la 'dod chags pa dang / lta ba la 'dod chags pa dang / yul la/ 'dod chags pa dang / 'khor ba la 'dod
188b6(mdo): chags pa dang / 'jig rten rgyang phan gi gsang tshig la sten pa dang / dam pa'i chos las 'byol ba dang yi dam 'dor ba dang / myi dge ba dang ldan pa dag la myi tshol ba dang / dge ba dang ldan pa la tshol ba dang / rab tu
188b7(mdo): byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / sde ba pa dang / bud myed dang sde pa dang / khye'u dang sde pa dang bu mo dang sde pa dang / mu stegs can dang sde ba dang / dgon pa la mngon par myi dka' ba dang / zas kyi tshod mi shes pa dang / bla ma'i drung du myi 'gro
188b8(mdo): ba dang / kha don gi dus myi shes pa dang / spyod yul ga gnas myi zhes pa dang / bslab pa phra mo dag la gus par myi byed pa dang / sdig pa chung ngu dag la 'jigs pa kyi lta ba dang / dbang po rta mug gis bsgribs pa dang ldan pa dang /
188b9(mdo): g.yeng ba la dbang po grims pa dang / rgod par myod pa dang / bcos ka ba dang / ka bro myi bde ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs dag la mtshan ma dang mngon rtags su 'dzind pa dang / khro ba rnams la sems
189a1(mdo): myi byams pa dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying kyi rtsa ba dang / na bas skyob par myi byed pa dang / shi bas myi skrag pa dang / kun tu 'bar ba las myi 'byung ba dang / lus la so sor myi rtog pa dang / tshul khri
189a2(mdo): la so sor myi rtog pa dang / ci byas ci byed ci bye zhes so sor myi rtog pa dang / myi bsam pa la sems pa dang / myi brtag pa la rtog pa dang / myi smon pa la smond pa dang / myi 'byung ba la 'byung ba 'du shes pa dang / myi dga'
189a3(mdo): ba la dka' bar 'du shes pa dang / myi dga' ba la dga' bar 'du shes pa dang / lam ma yin pa la lam du 'du shes pa dang / ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa dang / 'phral gi bya ba la chags pa dang / byed pa ngan pas
189a4(mdo): g.yengs pa dang / dge' ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnam par spong ba dang / theg pa chen po sa myi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos gi theg pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po la mngon par dad pa'i
189a5(mdo): gang zag rnams la myi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg/ pa la mngon par dad pa'i gang zag rnams la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / rtsod pa lhur byed pa dang / zab pa'i ngang tshul can dang /
189a6(mdo): badrang ba dang / rtsub pa dang / pho theg can dang / spyi rol cheb dang gtum pa dang / gtsug pa dang / ngag kyi ldand pa dang / mu smra ba dang / myi gtsigs par smra ba dang / ngan du skabs snga
189a7(mdo): ba dang / brdzun zer ba dang / spros pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / spros pa la gzhol ba ni skyon no// de de sngar skyon la mkhas pas smos pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid bsgom pa la rnal 'byor du
189a8(mdo): byed de/ de stong pa nyid la bsgom pa mang bas gnas gang dang gang dag la sems 'jug cing sems mngon par dad pa'i gnas de dang de dag la ngo bo nyid yongs su btsal na stong par rtogs so// sems de gang yin pa de ya
189a9(mdo): yongs su brtags na stong pa'o// gang gis brtags pa de yang stong par rtogs so// de de ltar rtogs pa'i sa mtshan ma myed pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de la nang gi mtshan ma la gang dang gang snang bar 'gyur ba de dang de
189b1(mdo): dag mtsham ma byed par byed de/ ci nas kyang lus kyi dmyigs pa dang / lus la dran par nye bar gyi 'jog pa dang / lus la sems nye bar gnas kyi gtong ba dang / phyi rol gi mtshan ma rnams kyi dmyigs pa dang / phyi ro sad kyi mtshan
189b2(mdo): ma rnams la dran pa nye bar myi 'jog pa dang / phyi rold kyi mtshan ma rnams la dran pa nye bar myi 'jog pa dang / sems myi gtong ba de ltar mtshan ma myed do// de phyi rol kyi mtshan ma rnams dang bral ba dang / lus kyi mtshan ma rnaMs
189b3(mdo): bral bas/ nang gi mtshan ma rnams spang ba'i phyir zhugs te/ bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar skyed do// de bsgom pa mang bas rtag tu bsgom pa la 'tshon pa yin// rgyun mi 'chad par zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong
189b4(mdo): la gnas pas gnas pas yin/ de la zhi gnas ni sems rtse gcig/ pa'o// lhag mthong ni yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du chos la so sor rtog pa 'o// de sems mnyam par bzhag pas 'gyod pa myed cing rab
189b5(mdo): tu dka' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na de ltar de tshul khrims yongs/ su dag pa'i phyir ro// tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rnal 'byor spyod pa yin te/ tshul khrim//
189b6(mdo): phun gsum 'tshogs pa rnams la ni/ rnal 'byor yang dag par 'grub po// tshul khrims phun gsum tshogs pa rnams la rnal 'byor la spyod de/ de bas na rnal 'byor du spyod pa rnams shes bya'o// rig
189b7(mdo): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'dzind pa rnams yin no// bcu ga pa zhe na 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos
189b8(mdo): kun bsrung ba'i phyir zos pa 'dzin kyi khang zid kyi phyir ma yin no// bstan pa kun bsrung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzind kyi rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin no// dkon mchog gsum gi rigs kyi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gyi bkur sti'i phyis
189b9(mdo): ma yin no// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gi grags pa dang / sma dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin no// mgo byed pa'i phyir sems can nas la phan par bya ba'i
190a1(mdo): phyir thos pa 'dzin to// bsdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la bde bar bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to// shes rab gi dmig dang bral ba'i sems can rnams shes rab kyi myig thob par bya ba'i phyir zos pa 'dzind to// nyan thos kyi theg
190a2(mdo): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i phyir thos pa 'dzin to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa chen po'i lam bstan ni phyir thos pa 'dzin te
190a3(mdo): bdag nyid kyang bla na myed pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir thos pa 'dzin gi theg pa chung ngu la ni mi smod do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'dzind pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu
190a4(mdo): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzind pa rnams yin no// bcug pa zhe na 'di lta ste 'dul ba yang rab tu shes/ 'dul ba'i tshul yang rab tu shes/ 'dul ba zab pa yang rab tu shes/ 'dul ba zhib pa yang rab tu shes
190a5(mdo): rung ba dang myi rung ba yang rab tu shes/ rang bzhin gis kha na ma tho ba/ yang rab tu shes/ bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba yang rab tu shes/ so so// tha rad pa'i slab pa'i gleng gzhi'i dang 'byung ba yang rab tu zhes so//
190a6(mdo): nyan thos kyi 'dul ba yang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba yang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpal 'dul ba 'dzind pa rnams yin
190a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang pyod yul dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa dag la shi nad tu bslabs
190a8(mdo): pa rnams yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dag la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dag la shi nad tu bslabs pa yin/ de dag shi nad tu bslabs pas na/ cho ga dang spyod yul
190a9(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// cho ga dang spyod yul pu rtse tshogs pas dge slong gyi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i spyod yul rnams yongs su spong / de dag de'i phyir gnas ma yin par mye myod/ yul ma
190b1(mdo): yin pa dang / dus ma yin par myi spyod/ de dag dge sbyong gi spyod yul la spyod pas spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ dge sbyong ngam bram zes 'di ltar ste don dang myi ldan pa de dang des mtshang brur myed la gzhan dag
190b2(mdo): bslab pa de nyid 'jog par byed do// de dag spyod pa phun sum tshogs pas spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ spyod lam rab tu zhi bar spyod lam bcos pa myed pa dang ldan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
190b3(mdo): bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' cho ga dang spyod yul dang spyod pa dang / spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phra dog dang bral ba
190b4(mdo): rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste bdag nyid kyang sbyin ba'i bdag po yin/ gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par 'jud/ na pa'i bsngags pa smra ba rnams yin/ gzhan dag gis sbyin pa la/
190b5(mdo): rjes su yi rang bar byed/ sbyin pa'i bdag po gzhan dag la yang ga/ beng stod cing rab tu dga' bar byed/ gzhan dag la byin na yang 'a/ di snyam du bdag cag byin cig gzhan la ni ma yin no// bdag cag
190b6(mdo): gyir gyur da la gzhan dag gir ma gyu dad cig ces sems myi skyed/ 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'tsho ba'i yo bad de dang de dag thob par gyur da cig ces 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde
190b7(mdo): ba dang ldan te bde bar gyur da cig/ bdag gis kyang de nyid kyi don tu 'bad par bya/ brtsal bar bya'i/ bdag cag gis ser sna dang / phra dog gi sems bskyed par myi bya'o// zhes sems skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
190b8(mdo): de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ser sna dang phra dog dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems can la sems dpa' thams cad la sems snyoms pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe
190b9(mdo): na 'di lta ste sems can thams cad la snyoms par sbyor ba rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems byed pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems myed pa rnams yin/ sems can thams//
191a1(mdo): cad kyi don kho nar sbyin pa dag sbyin/ tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa bsgom pa bsngon 'grus chom/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed/ shes rab sgom/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yang dag par bsgrub
191a2(mdo): mod kyi// gnyis la gnas pa'i sems kyis bsgrub pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la thun mong gi sems dang / sems can thams cad la dmyigs pas bsgrubs te/ ci nas kyang chos nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ba de ltar
191a3(mdo): sgrub po// de dag 'khor rab tu 'bar ba nas/ bdag nyid byung nas gzhan dag kyang 'byin te/ de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gzhag cing 'byind kyi/ sdug pa'i sems kyis ma yin khong khro bas ma yin no// rigs
191a4(mdo): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag la bu stu ga/ pa phangs pa byams pa yid du 'ong ba drug cig yod la/ bu de dag la cho nga dpon nam khyim bdag de mtshungs par byams shing mtshungs par spyod
191a5(mdo): par gyur da pa la/ de'i bu de dag byis pa yin te/ gog pa myi shes pa myi mkhas pa dag cig yod la/ de nas tshong dpon nam khyim pa/ dag de'i khyim mye tha ra da te/ de'i bu de dag kyang so so nas 'khod par
191a6(mdo): gyur da na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ tshong dpon nam khyim pa dag de 'di ni sngar je dbyung ngo // de nas phyis 'di 'byung ngo // de nas phyi sa phyis 'di 'byung ngo snyam de ltar sems sam/ byang chub sems
191a7(mdo): dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das tshong dpon nam khyim bdag de bu rnams la sems snyoms pas/ de gang dag ji ltar mdza
191a8(mdo): pa de dang de nyid de bzhin du 'byind to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin tu byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i bu dang 'dra'i 'phags pa rnams ni ma yin te/ byang chub
191a9(mdo): sems dpa' de byis pa me gsal ba/ myi mkhas pa 'gro ba drug so so na gnas pa/ de dag 'khor ba'i khyim mye tha rad pa nas gang dang gang ji ltar yongs su smyind par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid ltar 'byind to// phyung nas kyang
191b1(mdo): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings zhi bar rab tu gzhog go// rigs kyi bu chos bcu' po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sems snyoms pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
191b2(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim 'gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / snyen bkur byas pa yin gyi
191b3(mdo): bang bid kyis mchod pas ni ma yin no// nan tan gyis mchod pa dang / sems can rnams la phan zhing bdel bar bya ba dang / sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa dang / sems can gi don la zhugs pa dang / yi dam
191b4(mdo): myi gtong ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam myi gtong ba dang / da ltar smras pa bzhin du byed pa dang / yid du myi skyo ba dang / byang chub kyi sems myi gtong bas/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
191b5(mdo): la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa yin gi mchod pas ni me yaM// na no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam// sa ni chos kyi sku ste chos la mchod na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
191b6(mdo): la mchod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nan gis yang dag par bsgrub pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang / sems can gi don bya ba'i phyir skye'o//
191b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu sems can gi don de yang rigs yid dam btang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / smras pa las nyams pa dang / dam bcas pa las nyams pa dang /
191b8(mdo): yid yongs su skyo ba dang / byang chub gi sems dang bral bas yang dag par thob par myi nus so// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni
191b9(mdo): sems can gi don la rag las ste/ ka lad te sems can rnams myed na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs
192a1(mdo): pa rnams la mchod cing rim 'gro byas pa yin ki/ zang zing gi mchod pas ma yin pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
192a2(mdo): la mchod pa dang rim 'gro bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
192a3(mdo): khyim gi gnas nas mngon par byung ste/ rab tu byung nas bdag gi grogs po dang blon po dang gnyen bshes dang snag gi gnyen mtshams la shi ba dang 'dra'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis gzugs myi sdug par
192a4(mdo): khas blangs shing bdag gis kha dog myi stug pa bgos ste/ tshul ba bzhin du bsgyu rad to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ sprod pa'i rgyu spong ba'i phyir mgro bregs shing lag na lhung gzed thogs te grong nas grong du 'gro'o zhes
192a5(mdo): nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ gdol bu dang 'dra bar dma' ba dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom ba yin/ bdag ni bsod snyoms pa ste bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan
192a6(mdo): la rag lus so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin brnyas pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon len to zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis slob dpo na dang bla ma dang / sbyin gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos so//
192a7(mdo): zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par pyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste cho ga dang spyod yul dang kun spyod pa/ de dang des mgu bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa
192a8(mdo): rnams thob par bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ sems can khros pa dang gnod sems can rnams kyi nang na bzod pa mang bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
192a9(mdo): sems dpa' nga rgyal bcom pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sngon gi dge ba'i tshabs brtan pa'i rgyu phun
192b1(mdo): sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog gzhan gyis myi bkri/ ston pa gzhan myed pas yang dag par lta ba rnams yin/ g.yo dang sgyus spyod pa dang bral bas/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs
192b2(mdo): pa rnams yin/ gya glu myed pa'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin/ dbang po rno bas shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// rgyud dang bas sgrub pa dang kun nas ldang ba dang / bral ba rnams yin/ sdig pa'i grogs po dang /
192b3(mdo): bral bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa rnams yin/ legs par bshad pa tshol bas mngon pa'i nga rgyal myed pa rnams yin/ chos bstan pa la log par myi 'dzind pa rnams yin/ rgya chen po la mos pas de bzhin gshes
192b4(mdo): pa'i che ba rab tu shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dang das mang ba rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa/ bcom
192b5(mdo): ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyogs 'ag/ 'a tsam zhig nyan par gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ lasaHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe/
192b6(mdo): ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig ngas bstan gyis/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pa/ bcom
192b7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bcal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la thun mong ba'i byams pa chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin
192b8(mdo): gshegs pa ji ltar sems can gcig la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams rdzas lnga khyab ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la khyab nas/ nam mkha'i khams la khyab kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas
192b9(mdo): pa chen po'i mtha' dang mu shes pa 'ang myed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan te/ des de bzhin
193a1(mdo): gshegs pa'i ji ltar sems can gcig la snying rje ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la snying rje zhing de la phan par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos ston pa/
193a2(mdo): myi zad pa dang ldan te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa tu ma nas/ bskal pa brgya stong tshad myed grangs myed pa du ma'i bar du rnam grangs gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / tshul gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sems/
193a3(mdo): can thams cad la hUMs gcig tu chos stond kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstand pa zad par myi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dri ba la lung bstand pa sha nad tu tshad myed pa dang ldan te/
193a4(mdo): rigs kyi bu gal te sems cad ji snyed sems can gi grangs su gtogs pa pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la sa gcig tu tshig dang yi ge gzhan dag gis dri ba tha dad du dris kyang /
193a5(mdo): de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig zar cig yud tsam gcig la dris pa lung bstand pa'i stond pa bstan kyang / de bzhin// gshegs pa'i dri ba lung bstan pa'i ston pa zad par myi 'gyur ro//
193a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa myed pa'i bsam gtan gyi spyod yul ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpalas bcu la gnas par gyur da la/ de
193a7(mdo): dag thams cad dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin brgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin du snyoms par zhugs nas bskald pa brgya stong du mar ting nge 'dzin gzhan dang / gzhan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang /
193a8(mdo): de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzind tam ting nge 'dzin gi spyod yul gyi mtha' 'am su myi rnyed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad myed pa'i gzugs kyi sku mngon par sgrub pa dang ldan te/ rigs
193a9(mdo): kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar gyurd na/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig pa shi yud tsam gcig la sems can re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzug
193b1(mdo): nye bar stond to// gal te gzugs gzhan dang gzhan dag la mos par gyurd na/ de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig thar cig yud tsam gcig gis sems can re re'i mdun tu gzugs gzhan dang gzhan du nye bar ston
193b2(mdo): to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan gyi yul tshad myed de/ rigs kyi bu lha'i spyan gyis gzigs kyi/ myi'i myig gis ma yin pa'i sems can yod pa/ gal te rigs kyi bu grangs dang bas ma las 'das
193b3(mdo): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ma lus pa kun de 'dra bar gyur da kyang de gshegs pas phyag gi mthil na skyu ru'i 'bras bu ltar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du gzigs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
193b4(mdo): 'i lha'i snyan gyi yul tshad myed de/ rigs kyi bu gal te de lta bu nyid kyi sems can gyis mtha' yas mu myed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams yongs su gang bar gyur da la/ de dag thams cad kyis skad cig zar cig yud tsam gcig
193b5(mdo): la sgra dbyangs brjod pa'i sgra lan cig tu phyung ste/ brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bdag bdag gi sgra rnams kyang so so// ra gsan to// so sor rab tu mkhyend to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
193b6(mdo): gshegs pa ni ye gos tshad myed pa/ myi zad pa mu myed pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang ldan te/ rigs kyi bu gal te sems can gi khams ma lus pa so sor rnam par rtog pa rjes su rnam par rtog/
193b7(mdo): cing / bsam pa rnam pa sna tshogs rjes su sems la/ so so na las sna tshogs byed na/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig bar cig yud tsam cig la sems can 'di ni 'di la rnam par rtog go// sos/
193b8(mdo): can 'di ni 'di la sems so// sems can 'di ni las 'di byed do// de'i 'bras bu ni 'dir 'gyur ro// zhes rab tu mkhyend te/ de yang de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum car yang thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes
193b9(mdo): kyis skad cig thar cig yud tsam gcig la rab tu mkhyend to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa rgyun myi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/
194a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ngas pa myed/ dbang po bslad pa myed/ sems 'khrug pa myed do// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad
194a2(mdo): spangs pa ste/ zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang la nyon mongs pa yod pa de'i sems ni bslad par 'gyur te/ sems bslad pas mnyam par 'jog par myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
194a3(mdo): ni nyon mongs pa myed pa// rdul myed pa/ zag pa myed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa/ chos thams cad la dbang ba mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ ting nge 'dzind dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i spyod yul dzas
194a4(mdo): cad las byung ba yin te// gal te rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam re re la yang ting nge 'dzin re res spyod pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du spyod cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus kyi
194a5(mdo): tshe'i bar du spyod na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par ba// zhag pa lta ci smos// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni bskal/ pa grangs myed pa du mas yang dag par grub pa yin te/ rigs
194a6(mdo): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag pa dang bsam pa dang brtag pa ra gyi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad nam bar seld pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bskal pa
194a7(mdo): grangs sa mchis pa gsum shes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par 'grub pas lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ya la/ rigs kyi bu la yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
194a8(mdo): sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ de ni bskal pa grangs myed pa gsum gis yang dag par sgrub par myi nus kyi/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos mnyam pa
194a9(mdo): nyid du zhugs par gyurd pa do'i canas 'amam ti/ bzhal la bgrang bar bya'o// zag sa'i sems nas brtsams rten ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad nam par sesad pas gsosad pa/
194b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa rnyed pa'i sems can de dag ni skyid de ba legs par bgyi ba'i las bgyid pa/ las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dad pa dang mos/
194b2(mdo): pa mang ba zhing / byang chub tu nye ba lags na/ su dag zos nas 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher stond pa rnams lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das
194b3(mdo): sems can de dag ring por myi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di 'dra ba dag nyid kyi snod du gyurd par mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsaHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
194b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang sangs rgyas mang po la snyen sbyar byas par
194b5(mdo): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis be co/ ma dang yid gnyis dang nem nur myi skyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis nub bdun du yid la byas
194b6(mdo): pa gzhan myed cing sems ma 'khrugs par bsam pa drag po dang / dad pa drag pos zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di rjes su sems la/ zhag bdun 'das pa dang / des mchod pI
194b7(mdo): cho ga nye bar bzhag nas gtsang bas gos gtsang mas bgos te/ dad pa mngon du byas la 'dug par byas te/ des de'i nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de ste myi byed dam cho ga ma rdza bar byed/
194b8(mdo): na sems rje gcig par 'gyur zhing 'chi ba'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a
194b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad pa na sems can gang la la myi dad par 'gyur ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di bshad 'an/
195a1(mdo): sems can gang myi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba'i bsam pas gnod sems kyis sems skyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la yang dgrar 'du shes par 'gyur ba dag yod de/ de dag de'i phyir lus zhig nas
195a2(mdo): sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// yang rigs kyi bu sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe ba bshad pa 'di la dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba de la yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen tu
195a3(mdo): 'du shes pa dang / ston par 'du shes skyed na/ rigs kyi bu sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba 'di tshe rabs de dang de dag gzhan la yang rigs kyi bu de dag gis thos par nges par rig par bya'o// de nas 'khor der
195a4(mdo): 'dus pa'i sems can kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bshad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon bdag cag gis kyang thos pa lta zhig snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i /
195a5(mdo): ljags gi dbang po phyung ste/ ljags kyi dbang pos zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bkab po// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par/ bkab nas dbu mngon par bkab bo// dbu mngon par bka
195a6(mdo): nas sku mngon par bkab bo// sku mngon par bkab nas ser ge/ 'i khri mngon par bkab bo// ser ge'i khri mngon par bkab nasabyang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo// de nas
195a7(mdo): thos kyi 'khor de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sbyor ba'i 'khor/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor mngon par bkab bo// de nas stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams mngon
195a8(mdo): bar bkab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags dbang po phyir sus te// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' mas lad pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di 'dra ba'i ljags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams
195a9(mdo): brdzun gsung bar gyi 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams dad par gyis shig// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams mngon par dad par gyis shig// de ni khyed kyi yun rin po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyuraro//
195b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pani bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems brgyad khri bzhi stong gis myi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo// srog chags brgya stong du ma ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul dang bral
195b2(mdo): zhing dri ma myed par rnam par dag go// sngon sems ma skyed pa'i sems can du mas ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
195b3(mdo): pa la bka' sa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste gzugs su 'ang 'dogs la/ don dam par na gzugs su 'ang myi
195b4(mdo): dmyigs shing mngon par myi chags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na rnam par shes pa yang myi dmyigs shing mngon par myi
195b5(mdo): chags so// sa'i khams su gtogs la don dam par na sa'i kha/ mas su 'ang myi dmyigs shing mngon par myi chags so// de bzhi na du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang /
195b6(mdo): nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khas su yang 'dog/ sa la/ don dam par na rnam par shes pa'i khams su yang myi de myigs shing mngon par myi 'chags so// myig gi skye mched
195b7(mdo): du yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na myig gi skye mched du yang myi dmyigs shing / mngon par myi chags so// de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye mched dang /
195b8(mdo): yid kyi skye mched du 'ang 'dogs la/ don dam par na yid kyi skye mched du yang myi dmyigs shing mngon par myi chags so// bdag tu 'ang 'dogs la/ don dam par na bdag tu 'ang myi dmyigs shing / mngon par myi chagaso//
195b9(mdo): sems can du'ang 'dogs la don dam par na sems can du yang myi dmyigs shing / mngon par myi chags so// srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bur yang 'dod/
196a1(mdo): la don dam par na srog dang / gsol ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bur yang myi dmyigs shing mngon par myi chags so// 'jig rten du 'ang 'dogs la don//
196a2(mdo): dam par na 'jig rten du yang myi dmyigs shing / mngon par myi chags so// 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su yang 'dogs la/ don dam par na 'jig rten gyi chos rnams su myi dmyigs shing / mngon par myi chags so//
196a3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su 'ang 'dogs lang / don dam par na sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'ang myi dmyigs shing mngon par myi chags so// byang chub tu 'ang 'dogs la/ don dam par na byang chub dang / byang chub par byed pa
196a4(mdo): yang myi dmyigs shing de la'ang mngon par myi chags so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gar myi dang 'dogs pa dang / tha snyad de ni kun rdzob ces bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ni don dam myed mod kyi/ kun rdzob
196a5(mdo): kyi chos rnams myed par yang 'don dam pa bstan par myi nus// so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnas 'di dag la kun rdzob du mkhas shing don dam par ma yin pa de ni kun rdzob
196a6(mdo): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams yi na no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub seMs
196a7(mdo): dpa' don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ myi skye ba'i chos nyid dang ldan pa rnams yin/ myi 'gag pa'i chos nyid dang / myi 'jig pa'i chos nyid dang / myi lend myi 'dor ba'i chos nyid
196a8(mdo): dang / tshig gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i chos nyid dang / slar myed pa'i chos nyid dang / spros pa myed pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod du myed pa'i chos nyid dang / zhi ba'i chos nyid dang / 'phags pa'i chos nyid
196a9(mdo): dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa'i ni gyi skye'o// myi 'gag ko/ myi 'jig go// gyi lend to// myi 'dor ro// yi ge dag gis sba bar bya ba ma yin no// yi ge rnams kyis myi
196b1(mdo): brjod do// spros pas myi gtogs so// rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni brjod du myed pa ste zhi ba'o// 'phags pa'i rnams kyi so so rang gis rig pa'o// rigs kyi bu don dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung
196b2(mdo): ma skyes kyang rung myi 'jig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smyig gyon la yang dag par dad pas/ khyim nas khyim myed par rab tu 'byung ngo // rab tu byung nas
196b3(mdo): kyang chos 'di kho na thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro 'am kos la mye 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus batshams shing gnas so// rigs kyi bu gal te don dam pa myed du zin na/ tshangs par spyod pa don myed par 'gyur ro//
196b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba yang don byed par 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir don dam pa yod pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams don dam pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu
196b5(mdo): po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa la mang/ sa pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang // chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa
196b6(mdo): rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos rnams gsog/ nyid du rab tu shes/ gso ba nyid dang / snying po myed pa nyid dang / myig/ sor ltar bu nyid dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid dang / brag
196b7(mdo): lta bu nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / myi gnas pa nyid dang / g.yo ba nyid dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid du yang rab tu sheso// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag ni 'di ltar gsog/ 'di ltar gson
196b8(mdo): 'di ltar snying po myed pa dang / myig yor lta bu dang / 'di ltar gzugs brnyan lta bu/ 'di ltar brag cha lta bu/ 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu/ 'di ltar myi gnas pa/ 'di ltar g.yo ba/ 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung
196b9(mdo): pa yin yang 'di dag skye bar yang snang ngo // gnas pa dang 'jig par yang snang ngo // snyam mo// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ yang chos 'di rnams skye ba'i rkyen ni kar rnams yin/ chos 'di rnams 'gag pa'i rkyen
197a1(mdo): ni gang rnams yin snyam mo// de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis chos 'di dag skye ste/ ma rig pa'i las byung ba'o// ma rig pa sngon tu 'gro ba'o// ma rig pa la rten pa'o// ma rig
197a2(mdo): pa la rten nas 'du byed rnams 'byung ba rnams yin/ 'du byed la rten nas rnam par shes pa snang bar 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa yod na mying dang gzugs su 'dogs par 'gyur ro// mying dang gzugs su btags na
197a3(mdo): skye mched drug rnams su 'dogs par 'gyur ro// skye mched rnams yod na reg par 'gyur ro// reg pa yod na tshor ba snang bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba'i rgyus byis pa rnams sred pas nyen par 'gyur ro// sred pas nyen
197a4(mdo): na len pa 'dzind to// len pa zung na srid pa'i mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ro// srid pa yod na skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba yod na rga bar 'gyur ro/ sdes bu gang zag rga ba'i chos can ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro// shi ba'i la/
