197a5(mdo): gnas pa'i mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / yi mug pa dang // 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po/ chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na mkha
197a6(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ma rig pa spang bar nan tan bya'o// ma na ga pa gzhig pa dang / ma rig pa tsha ba nas dbyung ba dang / ma rig pa 'gag pa'i phyir nan tan bya'o// ma rig pa 'gag pas ma rig gi
197a7(mdo): rkyen las skyes pa/ ma rig pa las byung ba/ ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba/ ma rig pa la rten pa'i chos 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na/ dbang po lhag ma nas
197a8(mdo): kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma rig pa 'gags na myi shes pa la rten pa'i chos 'di dag kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// myi shes pa spangs pas nyon mongs pa rnams kyang myi 'byung ngo // 'gro nas kyang gyi 'byud /
197a9(mdo): 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams kyang 'gags par 'gyur ro// mya ngan las 'das pa dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'breld par 'byung ba la mkhas rjes
197b1(mdo): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag zhes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar ji bdag bram ze'i rigs sam//
197b2(mdo): 'on te rgyal rigs sam/ 'on te khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ ci mtho zhing phyug po 'am/ 'on te dma' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes sam/ gar du skyes snyam du yongs su gtogs te/ de gal te rigs mtho' zhing phyug
197b3(mdo): par skyes na yang de la rigs kyis dregs par gyi byed do// 'on te byung nas kyang dpa' zhing dbul ba'i rigs su skyes par gyur dan yang / bdag 'di lta bu'i rigs su skyes pa las/ bdag gis sngon las 'dren mar byas
197b4(mdo): so zhes de snyam du sems skyed cing / de rgyu des skyo ba mang ba yin te// skyo ba mang bar gyur da nas rab tu byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang ba ga ci'i phyir rab tu byung zhes yongs su rtog ste/ bdag gi rang sa
197b5(mdo): nas gzhan dag kyang sprul bar bya// rang grol nas gzhan dag kyang dgrol bar bya'o zhes rab tu byung ngo // snyam nas/ de de'i phyir le lo// la gyi rten cing / snyom las myi byed de/ de bdag rab tu byung nas/
197b6(mdo): sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos gang dang gang nub cing yongs su zad de/ kun byang bar gyur da ces yongs su rtogs ste/ de sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos shig spongs par gyur da na/ de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa
197b7(mdo): skyed do// gang ma spangs pa de dag ni spang ba'i phyir col zhing 'bad do// de bdag rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos gang dang gang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyur da ces de snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de'i dge ba'i
197b8(mdo): chos gang dag 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / rgya cher gyurd pa de la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do// gang de ltar ma gyurd pa de dag 'phel ba dang rgyas pa dang / rgya cher bya ba'i phyir rtsol zhing 'bad do// de bla ma
197b9(mdo): la rten na dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'phel bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa rnams ni 'grib par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de rgya de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des mkhan po nyung ngu bos pa 'am/ mang du thos pa'am// shes
198a1(mdo): pa 'am myi shes pa 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am// tshul khrims 'chal pa yang rung ste/ de la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed do// de ci'i ltar stond pa la dga' zhing dad pa nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du mkhan po la/
198a2(mdo): yang byed do// de slob dpon rnams la rim 'gro yod cing / rjes yod pa yin te de 'di ltar slob dpon rnams la brten na/ bdag gi byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ nyon
198a3(mdo): mongs pa ma spangs pa rnams ni spangs par 'gyur ro snyam du yongs su rtog ste/ de de dag la mkhan por 'du shes bskyed cing / dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa thob pa dang dge ba'i chos rnams la de dag dang mthun par spyod
198a4(mdo): pa yin/ myi dge ba'i chos rnams la myi mthun par spyod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bdag gi stond pa gang zhes yongs su rtog cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa ni thams cad mkhyend pa/ thams cad thugs
198a5(mdo): su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ thugs rje/ chen po dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gi ston pa'o snyam ste// de rgyu de
198a6(mdo): dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa skyed do// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'ad sa de yin pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan
198a7(mdo): 'das des bslab pa'i lam gang bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis srog gi phyir yang 'da' bar myi bya ste/ de ltar na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim 'gro dang rjes su 'brang ba bya bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de 'di snyam bdag su
198a8(mdo): 'basod snyoms la yongs su spyod ces sems shing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang yul gyi myi rnams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyis/ bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag gi
198a9(mdo): bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang / don che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / bdag gis yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su gyod pa de ltar myi snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa
198b1(mdo): dang / yul gyi myi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang ldan zhing / bad ma yod pa snyoms gtong snyam zhing de 'di ltar rjes su sems te/ bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gi myi dang / yul gyi myi 'di dag ni bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du she/
198b2(mdo): dang ldan/ dge slong gi 'du shes dang ldan/ sbyin pa'i gnas gi 'du shes dang / ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed kyis/ ci nas kyang bdag gis dge sbyong gi yon tan yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba
198b3(mdo): dang dge slong gi yon tan dang / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba de ltar spyod snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa'i skye ba'i 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur/
198b4(mdo): ta ma zhes sems shing de 'di snyam du bdag gis dge slong gi chu la yos la 'di ni rgas pa dang po 'o sna dge slong ni yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni rgal la gnyis pa'o// bdag le o myed cing chos nyid thob la'i phyir ji nas kyang log ma dang tha ma byed pa'i skye ba'i 'bod pa las nas lan 'gyur ba de ltad rtson gsus bas
198b5(mdo): rgyan ga tu bas te/ yo to kyi me zhig/ naya na// tsu chu na/ / rgya semapa dpal bdag shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten zhes pa
198b6(mdo): rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ khengs pa dag la dam lab rnams yin// nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal myed pa rnams yin/ gya gyi can dag la drang po rnams yin/ rdzun tu smra ba dag la bden par smra
198b7(mdo): ba rnams yin/ kha myi mkhas pa dag la snyan par smra ba rnams yin/ chub pa dag pa la 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ khro ba dag la bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin
198b8(mdo): sdug bsngal ba dag la snying rje ba'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ ser sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams I te rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa
198b9(mdo): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste skyon myed pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sra sre ba
199a1(mdo): myed pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas sems snyoms pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba myi chung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba
199a2(mdo): rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gos pa myed pas rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/ nem nur myed pa'i sems dang ldan pas dad pa rnams
199a3(mdo): yin/ sems le lo myed pa dang ldan pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sems myi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas mar
199a4(mdo): du zos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rno bas dbang po myi rtul ba rnams yin/ gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i ba dag nyid can rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
199a5(mdo): cad rnam par seld pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te la la ma tshang yangaskye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla pa
199a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu chos tshogs pa de dag las gang gi chos gcig cig skyon myed cing ma 'dres la sra sre myed de/ yongs su dag cing / yongs su byang bar yongs su rdzogs par gyu dad pa de la rigs kyi bu chos de dag thams cad yod
199a7(mdo): su rdzogs par 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'i// ma tshogs pas ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
199a8(mdo): pa dag pa skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal ki dri mas ma gos par skye'o// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs myed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa 'tsho
199a9(mdo): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi phyag pa dbul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya
199b1(mdo): ba dbul ba dang / pha ma dag la lus kyi rim bgro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim 'gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams lus kyi rim 'gro byed cing de yang zar zing myed pa'i
199b2(mdo): sems bgyis te/ zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin la dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye bar gyur da cig ces yongs su sngo zhing / de yang bsam pa
199b3(mdo): zag pa nas sems pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngal gi dri mas ma gos par skye'o// shA rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gi gnas nas mngon par byung
199b4(mdo): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste nye bar lend pa myed pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi myed pa spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la sred pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yul gyi nyes
199b5(mdo): pas myi gos pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims/ bcas pa la rim 'gro byed cing brtson pa dang shin tu bslabs pa na/ mas yin/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha ngan ngon dang /
199b6(mdo): na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / yo byad stsogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing
199b7(mdo): yul rnams las skyo ba rnams yin/ dben pa dga' zhing rtag tu sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yi/
199b8(mdo): no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ gzhogs slongs gi
199b9(mdo): rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ myi rigs pa btsal ba'i 'arnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed /
200a1(mdo): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnyed pa la zhen pa myed pa rnams yin/ rnyed pa la chags pa myed pa yin/ yongs su yi chad pa'i rang bzhin myed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnams yin no// rigs/
200a2(mdo): kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir/ lus kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed/ ngag gis tshul
200a3(mdo): 'chos pa myi byed sems kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed do// ji ltar na lus kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong na/ spyod lam myi 'chos so//
200a4(mdo): ji ltar na spyod lam myi 'chos zhe na/ gnya shing gar tsam du lta ba dang / skyo bar lta ba dang / sgrib pa myed par lta bas/ gom pa pags kyi des nas dal nas 'dor zhing 'deg pa ma yin te/ de ltar na lus kyis tshul 'chos
200a5(mdo): pa myi byed do// ji ltar na ngag gis tshul 'chos pa myi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir gcom sbyangs/ shing smra ba ma yin/ 'jam por smra ba ma yin/ dga' bar smra ba
200a6(mdo): ma yin/ rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin te/ de ltar de ltar ngag gis tshul 'chos pa 'chos pa myi byed do// ji ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos pa myi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa'
200a7(mdo): ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstabs nas tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar stond cing / sems kyis 'dod pa skyed pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste tshig gis 'dod pa chung la/ sems kyis
200a8(mdo): rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni nang gi gdung ba yin te// de ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos par myi byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na gzhogs slongs
200a9(mdo): kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gos gis 'phongs so// bdag lhung bzed kyis 'phongs so// bdag na ba'i gsos sman gyis 'phongs so//
200b1(mdo): zhes gzhogs slongs kyi byed cing / byin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag po la myi slong zhing rig tu phyi brjod do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhog slongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na thob kyis 'jam pa'i
200b2(mdo): rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag mthong na/ bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/ de la bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas/
200b3(mdo): des kyang bdag la 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya ste/ mang du thob pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba'o// zhes 'di dang 'di byin no// bdag gis kyang de la snying rje ba'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ blangs so zhes de skad
200b4(mdo): kyi tshig myi brjod de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi rig sa par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byar
200b5(mdo): chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byung ba dang / sems la rma byung ba/ ra rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin no// de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed/ ba'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang / kun tu rgyug pa dang / 'chal pa'i
200b6(mdo): tshul khrims la spyod pa'o// sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa la smo / na pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' myi rigs
200b7(mdo): bar btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sra la rgyu myed pa dang / gcal ba la spu myed pa
200b8(mdo): dang / yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa myed pa dang / g.yos rnyed pa myi sgrub pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed
200b9(mdo): pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa 'am/ chos kyi dang 'dres pa dang / dge 'dun dang 'dres pa 'am/ ma byin pa 'am/ ma gnang ba de dag myi len cing bdag gir myi byed chags
201a1(mdo): gza sems kyi sbed do// de ltar da byang chub sems dpa' yongs sum dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ma yin no// jisar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa zhen pa byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chu
201a2(mdo): sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang bdag gir myi byed/ nor du myi mi/ tshogs su myi byed cing / dus dus su dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / pha ma dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong

201a4(mdo): sbyin bdag rnams la ma dad par myi 'dzind pa yin te/ de chos dang mthun par rnyed pa dge 'dun gyir gtogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'as ma smad pa/ lhas bstor

201a6(mdo): chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' yid yongs su myi skyo ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems can gyi rgyu sems can gi phyir/ 'khor ba na gnas pas yongasasu myi skyo'o// sems can
201a7(mdo): kyi rgyu sems can gi phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngas kyis yongs su myi rgyan// sems can gyi don rnams la yongs su myi spro'o// sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongs su myi skyo'o// sems can gi bya ba rnams
201a8(mdo): yongs su myi spyo'o// gang zag gi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam stond pas yongs su kyi stso'o// de dag la la ma dad par yang myi byed do// byang chub tu phyogs kyi chos yongs su su bas kyang yongs su rgya spya ma/
201a9(mdo): byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongs su gyi skye'o// bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du myi lA'i/ byang chub la gzhol/ byang chub la 'bas
201b1(mdo): na stan// sa la na ba dadan dang lda na/ rgyang chum sems dpa' ma yongs su rdzo ba rnams yin no// rags kyi bu mam brgya dang 'anas byang chub sems dpa'
201b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di la ste/ bag myed pa thams cad dang bral zhing bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin no// lus kyis shi nad tu sngams shing lus kyi
201b3(mdo): ngan tu spyad pa myi spyod pa rnams yin/ rag gis shin tu sdams shing ngag gis ngan du spyad pa myi spyod pa rnams yin/ yid kyis shinang tu bsdams shing yid kyi ngan du span pa myi spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten pha rold kyis 'jigs
201b4(mdo): shing / myi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin/ rig par smra zhing myi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos su smra zhing chos ma yin pa la smod pa rnams yin/ spad pa'i lam rnams par spang
201b5(mdo): shing / dge ba'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin/ de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i bstand pa la sun gyi 'byin cing / nyon mongs pa'i dring/ pa'i yul thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs
201b6(mdo): pa'i chos nyid yongs su skyong zhing sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos rnams las srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang / ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
201b7(mdo): bka' bzhin du byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer myed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste dbang po sha nad tu dang pa rnams yin dbang po
201b8(mdo): yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang po dri ma myed pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su byang ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang bral ba rnaMs
201b9(mdo): kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ za ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bzhin 'dzum
202a1(mdo): zhing khro gnyer myed pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ji lta bu lags pa bdag gis 'tshal da te/
202a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bas na khro gnyer ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi
202a3(mdo): bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / bral bas na khro gnyer myed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na bya
202a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' mar du zos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba ni 'dod chags kyi myes rab tu 'bar ba'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gyi myes rab tu 'bar ba'o zhes
202a5(mdo): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug gi myes rab tu dkrugs pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas ni myi rtag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab
202a6(mdo): tu zhes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni stong pa'o zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni
202a7(mdo): bdag myed pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// chos thams cad rkyen las byung ba'o zhes yang
202a8(mdo): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'i zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de yang thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / skom pas shes kyi/ slar brjod pa tsam gyis ma yin/
202a9(mdo): de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje'i sems brtan pa nye bar gzhag ste/ sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la/ brtson 'grus chom mo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du
202b1(mdo): zos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga rgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam pa
202b2(mdo): 'jig cing bstan pa 'khrugs par gyur da pa dang / sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / ye shes kyi smon ma mya ngan las 'das te/ stond pa myed pa'i tshe/ mdo sde rgya chen po don che zhing mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos
202b3(mdo): thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dra ba dka 'dzind cing / klog la kha ton byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la yang brjod cing stond pa yang dag par stond cing gsal bar byed pa dang / de la zhugs pa'i gar zag rnams la dag/
202b4(mdo): ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs par byed cing de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing byed pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang bag rnams la stond par 'du shes bskyed pa dang / dam
202b5(mdo): pa'i chos la bdud cir 'du shes skyed pa dang / bcud kyis lend// du 'du shes skyed pa dang / ci'i 'du shes skyed pa dang / lus dang // srog sa myi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / btsal nas
202b6(mdo): kyang nan tan gyis bsgrub pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpal dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin da pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
202b7(mdo): dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyan kyis brgyan pa rnams yin/ lus dpe' byad bzang po'i me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
202b8(mdo): dang ldan zhing shi na tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstand pa'i gnas la rjes su bstend pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhud pa'i lam rjes su thob par byed pa rnams yin//
202b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su sbyong ba rnams yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul la shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gam
203a1(mdo): nam ma la shin tu mthar byind pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub 'os
203a2(mdo): dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten myong bas bsu pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub las
203a3(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis myi skul ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las myi g.yo ba rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin chos thams cad kyi mnyam
203a4(mdo): pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa rnams yin/ shind tu gtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthun mod/
203a5(mdo): ma yin pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par/ 'phags pa rnams yin/ gyi skye 'amatshas kyi bzod pa thob pa rnam sa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chom bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ bya
203a6(mdo): sems dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bas slu ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chusems dpa' bsam pa dang bag la nyal zhes pa rnams yin no//
203a7(mdo): bcwa gang zhe na 'di sa ste/ sems can 'dod chags kyi bsam pa can yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / kati mug gi bsam pa can dang / dam pa'i bsam pa can dang / @
203a8(mdo): ma'i bsam ga can dang / zhan pa'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i bsam pa ba can dang / brtan pa'i bsam pa can dang / yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang / sems can gtum pa'i bsam pa can kyang yang dag pa ji lta bu
203a9(mdo): bzhin du rab tu shes shing / de yang sems cad gcig la ji ltar shes pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams kun la'ang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub se

203b3(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul pa'i sems can rnams sa rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs/ pa gyi zugs kyis 'dul pa'i semapa can rnamams can lam kyi thunapa byin gi gzugs kyi

203b5(mdo): be'i gzugs kyis 'dul bI mos can nas sa phra ze'i gzugs/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgya de la rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim bdag gi gzugs kyis 'dul bI
203b6(mdo): sems can rnams la khyim bdag gi gzugs nye bar ston te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams/ 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa'
203b7(mdo): nams nye bar stonang to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga zhes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chom bcu dang ldan na byang chub seM/
203b8(mdo): dpa' des pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ drang ba rnam sa yin/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya rgyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnam ma yin/ drim
203b9(mdo): byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ myi brang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ des pa/
204a1(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang yA na/ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
204a2(mdo): 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sun tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga yongs su dag
204a3(mdo): pa rnams yin/ tshul dang mthun pa'i spyod yul du spyod pa rnams yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par 'apyod pa rnams yin/ 'od yangs pa rnams yon/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la bcad pa
204a4(mdo): rnams yin/ skal ba mnyam pa rnams yin/ lam gcig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/ stond pa gzhan myed pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'grog
204a5(mdo): na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na bya// nga chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yi// na no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems
204a6(mdo): can rnams skud do// bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / myi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan pa'i smra ba dang / don du smra ba dang / chos su smra ba dang / rigs par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / zang zing gis don mthun pa dang
204a7(mdo): 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pas sems can rnams sud do// rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i sbyin pa ni gang zad zing sbyin pa'o// myi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam ki lung sbyin pa'o// /
204a8(mdo): par par smra ba ni kang dge ba'i tsha ba bstabs pa'o// don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i snyan pa'o// chos su sba ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa dang mthun par chos stond pa'o// rigs par sba ba ni gar don yang
204a9(mdo): dag par chud kyi gzon pa'o// don bya ba ni gang myi dge ba'i gnas nas bsrang ste/ dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o// bar zing gis don mthun pa ni gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba
204b1(mdo): ba dang / bzhib pa dang / gos la gsogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis don mthun pa ni gang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi
204b2(mdo): ru dang / sa le sA ma dang / dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / gnon pa mthun mong du spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' su ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa
204b3(mdo): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul tu shes pa rnams yin no// bcu kar gzhe na 'di smra ste/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/ spyod lam rgyu myed pa rnams yin/ spyod lam yod//
204b4(mdo): su dag pa rnams yin/ blta na dga' ba rnams yin/ bsta na 'jam pa rnams yin/ lta bas chog myi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad khong khro ba myed par 'gyur ba rnams yI/
204b5(mdo): bstan sems can thams cad sems tshim khar 'gyur ba yin/ bstan/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
204b6(mdo): tshul du shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byangachub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di/ ste/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las
204b7(mdo): yongs su srung ba rnams yin no// 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'dond pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mo las sgrol ba rnams yin/ mgon byed pa rnams la mnyen du gyu rad pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa
204b8(mdo): rnams la sman par gyur pa yin/ rten myed pa dag la rten rnams yin/ gnas myed pa dag la gnas pa rnams yin/ skyabs myed pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/ gling myed pa dag la gling rnams yin/ dpung gnyen myed pa
204b9(mdo): dag la dpung rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen pos
205a1(mdo): bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe ran rtsa 'an pa chen po bstan bzang ba zhes bya ba de ni rtsabs kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho/ sdong po dang yas ka rnams dang
205a2(mdo): lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong pa dang bsdams pa dang / myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
205a3(mdo): pa nas bdud ste/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad kyis nad par gyu rad pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khris dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
205a4(mdo): rab dang / mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtsi'i
205a5(mdo): rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la// brtson pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dkon
205a6(mdo): mchog gsum la ci nus su bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la rtsi sbyor ba dang / sems can bkres pa dang / bsgom pa sa nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang
205a7(mdo): lpags pa dang / nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dka' ba sbyin pa dang / mkhan po dang thob dpon nams la gus par rim 'gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra phyag 'gas
205a8(mdo): ldang thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dka' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / skyed mos 'tshal bya ba dang / dus dus su nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba gtong ba dang / bran po dang / bran ma

205b3(mdo): pa rnams las chos ston to/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang byig yo la sangs rgyas zhing du par yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sa mchod cing brtsed makur byed do// sangs rgyab kyi zhing gcig nas kyi

205b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par ses pas gsosag bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang sa bur byang chub sems dpa'i brtul pa 'gyed na/ myi rtog rnam par gyi chog pa lags// bcom ldan
206a1(mdo): 'das kyis bka' sa a pa/ rigs kyi bu ro la phyir dge nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste dper na nyi ma dang zla ba ni blang bzhi snang bar byed cing / sems can rnams sa phan 'dogs pa yim sa / hrI
206a2(mdo): zla ba ni bdag cag gis snang bar bya'o// bdag cag ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'o// zhes myi rtog rnam par myi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gi las rnam par smin pa'i mngon par 'du byed pas zla ba dang nyi ma ga
206a3(mdo): kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang srul pa 'gyed na/ myi rtog rnam par myi rtog ste/ sgrim pa 'am/ mngon par 'du bya ba myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi las
206a4(mdo): rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par grub pa'i phyir te/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa myed par yang sprul pa/

206b8(mdo): la chos kyi dga' pa 'grus pa bye ba zhag zhig brgya stong mug tu mas kyang / nabapa' dang / brgyan gyi bye brag nus pa gatshogs kyi phung po 'i rab tsam byas par gyud to// brgya byin dang sangs pa dang / 'dzi
206b9(mdo): rten rdzo ba brgya gro du ma yang yog 'as lan shes mi byer ba byas te/ 'dud cing bcom ldan 'das la mi tog yad da ma ba dang / an dam pa chen po dag 'khor bar gyur to// sa'i bu brgya song dum/
207a1(mdo): yang nam ma'a'i dkyis na/ gnas tegs ka ma tham sa dang / ga zha brgya stong byed par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur dkyang / kye ma'ideng ni 'jig rten du
207a2(mdo): sangs rgyas gnyis pa skyes par gyur da te/ kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa sko rang to// sems can gang gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyurd pa de dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i sra
207a3(mdo): byed pa yin te/ sngon gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba shi nad tu brtsegs pa yin no// gang 'di la dad pa rnyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos shes de skad du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// lto 'phye chen

207a6(mdo): stong du ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sA klu ro'i sgra 'byind par gyu rad to// dri ba dang myi 'am ci brgya stong du ma yang snyan cing zab pa 'i dbyangs kyis klu len cing / ka ya mgo'i ri dang / stong gsum

209b8(mdo): dag chos mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na chos smra ba de gnas pa de sa yang mchod rten tu 'du shes sbed par bya ste/ ces sba ba de la yang bla mar 'du shes skyed par bya'o//
209b9(mdo): dge ba'i bzhes gnyen tu lu zhe bskyed par bya'o// lam ston par 'du shes byed par bya'o// chom smra ba de mabong ni dka' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed par bya'o// rim mo rgya ste bstan la bdang par byan/ chom
210a1(mdo): ba de'i bsngags pa brjod par bya'o// legs so zhes brjod pa mang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa bas lhag par chos smra ba de'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / chos smra ba de la chub
210a2(mdo): zad kyang phan par byas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur stir bya/ btsun par bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod pa ni byin cung zad du zad do// rigs kyi bu dag gal te chos 'dod pa'i rigs
210a3(mdo): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam rang gi khrag gi chag chag byas kyang / chos smra ba de la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
210a4(mdo): pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ba 'di ni bka' ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / stand dang / yang dag par stond pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa myed par bya'o//
210a5(mdo): ma zhum pa dang / spa ma gong ba dang / zhe ma 'gras pa'i sems dang / gos gtsang ma bgos te dad pa skyes par bya'o// bdag gi bsdu/ gas pa brjod kyang myi snyems pa dang / nga rgyal du myi bzung bar bya/
210a6(mdo): ste/ bdag myi bstod gzhan gyi smod cing / des zang zing myed pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te chos su nad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lu'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btso
210a7(mdo): ldan 'das dog pa'i phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa 'am bstan par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / chos smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag dpung dang bas
210a8(mdo): 'khor dang bcas te mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ ke'u shi ka legs so legs so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ ke'u shi ka khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid yongs su srung bar bya'o//
210a9(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad nam par seyad pas gso lad pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi nam grangs 'di kying ci zhes bgyi/ 'di kyis gzung bar 'gyi// bcom ldan 'das
210b1(mdo): kyis bka' tha sad pa// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam mangs 'di dkon mchog sprin ces bya bar zung gig/ yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ye shes smon pa zhes bya bar/
210b2(mdo): yang zung shig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' maHla nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa
210b3(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i wa'i bu las sogs pa/ lha'i bu brgya sto
210b4(mdo): du ma dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang \u0f89\u0fa4 dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / yA ma yin dang / rnam mkhal lji dang / kyai 'am ci dang / so 'phye chen po brgya song dag yi rung ba skye// / bcom ldan 'das
210b5(mdo): gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// // 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i/ rdzogs s+ho// / zhu chen gi lo tsa ba ban de be re tsa na rag shi ta da
210b6(mdo): dar ma ta les zhus te gtan la phab ba/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos lags s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rad na ka ran na ma ma ha ya na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags
210b7(mdo): dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus cig na// bcom ldan 'das yul
210b8(mdo): gnas bcas na nag po'i kun dka' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dbang dang ldan par gyu rad pa/ mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa/ dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu rad
210b9(mdo): gyurd pa las zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'argyad khri bani spo dang sams cig tu 'azhugs te/ thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa dpag tu byed pa la yang dag par zhugs /
211a1(mdo): theg pa grangs myed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa bsam kyis kyi khyab pas sadag par zhugs pa/ theg pa mtshungs pa myed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa dpag tu byed pa la yang /
211a2(mdo): par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
211a3(mdo): myed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi/
211a4(mdo): khams mtshungs pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad byed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi mas chad byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad byed pa yongs su dag pa
211a5(mdo): smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams baR+Sha da du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad myed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go// de nas
211a6(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa dang / byang chub sems dpal thams cad zild kyis gdon la phyogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol du to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
211a7(mdo): thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa bshad du gsolang / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
211a8(mdo): pa/ theg pa dpag tu ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa grangs ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ thegs pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa
211a9(mdo): la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa gzhal tu ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa 'arjod du ma mchis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma
211b1(mdo): mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi
211b2(mdo): bsam gis kyi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag/
211b3(mdo): pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams gzhal du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gi khams brjod du
211b4(mdo): ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ma mchis pa dag bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa
211b5(mdo): yongs su dag pa thos na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma \u0f7f/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad pa mchis pa yongs su dag pas/ yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
211b6(mdo): mam pa'i sangs rgyas kyin cad pa mdzas pa sangs su dag pa ma song dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi 'ams bsam gyis kyi thApa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ca ma mchis pa yong su dag pa
211b7(mdo): dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gi 'ams mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pa'i dang brjod du ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad ma mchis pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lams dag par 'jug pa'i
211b8(mdo): glang du/ brtson 'grus rgya cher rtsom zhing de dag go ma sra bar 'gyur/ ko Na stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ go Na rdo rje la bur 'gyur/ gam mya zhigs par 'gyur/ go ma kyi ldog par 'gyur/ rkom gyi thog par 'gyur/
211b9(mdo): ma / pa' la lo sa sa kyi 'og pa 'acan bdis rgyanag pa 'chung / thoza pa bzud par 'tha/ cad pa ba ba sa pas ma ma 'an 'das sa
212a1(mdo): rab tu bstod par 'gyur/ de dag mchi ba'i phyogs su mun pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla na myed pa spyod pa na/ zhum pa ma mchis/ rgod pa ma mchis/ sgyid sug pa ma mchis
212a2(mdo): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug pa la/ de dag gi byang chub thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ sems cad rnams kyi bsam pa bsgrub pa 'chal bas 'thun par chos stond par 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyi ga
212a3(mdo): du mchi ba'i dus 'tshal da pa la gnas par 'gyur/ sems can 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems can rnams 'dzud pa'i thabs la mkhas par 'gyur/ brjod pa thams cad la
212a4(mdo): ma chags par 'gyur/ mdor bsdus pa dang / rgyas pa la mkhas dpas nye ba dang / ring bar 'du shes ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
212a5(mdo): gzhon nur gyu rad pa la 'di skad ces bka' ba yang to// 'jam/ dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyi theg pa chen po la yang dag/ par zhugs pa/ beg dpag tu byed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/
212a6(mdo): theg pa grangs byed bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed 'dzod du myed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad myed pa yod/
212a7(mdo): su dag pa'i smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs myed bsam gis kyi khyab mtshungs pa myed gzhal du byed/ brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad byed pa yongs su dag pa 'i
212a8(mdo): smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang snying brtse pa/ rod 'dod pa snying rje can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar rab tu myu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pasnam byed
212a9(mdo): ste/ 'jas dpas ga de bzhin gshegs pa yizhems pa 'debs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' len pa de dag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba'i mthas babyed pam moms so// 'jam dpa'i de'i phyir logs
212b1(mdo): rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi star nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
212b2(mdo): 'jam dpal gar phyogs kyi chan sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams zil kyis myi non pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshes
212b3(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes pa/ 'jig rten ga khams dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa
212b4(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams mtshungs pa myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad mye dra pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gi khams gzhal du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa'i

212b6(mdo): par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo kang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa raH/
212b7(mdo): zan pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad myed pa yongs su dag pa thos na/ de dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten gi khams dang
212b8(mdo): tu byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing cad byed pa yongs su dag pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs byed bsam gyis kyi khyab mtshungs pa byed/ gagal du byed brjod du byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad byed pa yongs
212b9(mdo): bu dan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// langs dpas ga ga sa 'jig can gi khams yar bye ba nan/ tsha dum kyi dbum su de 'azhin gshegs pa dag brtsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar bye ma'adasam/
213a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad byed pa yongs su dag pa thob nas de'i tshe myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// gang gi tshangs kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de
213a2(mdo): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad des pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs myed pa na/ de bzhin
213a3(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gi khams grang
213a4(mdo): byed bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad
213a5(mdo): de las ngas rang gi lung bstan pa thos nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shug/ sa kyis ta la bdun srid kyi nam mkha' la 'phags te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
213a6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa 'khor brgya stong tu ma sa yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos stond pa des ngas mthong ngo // de mthong nas par snang la 'dug bzhin du de bzhin
213a7(mdo): gshegs pa de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// ye ges gzigs pa dpag myed thogs pa myed// bde gshegs ma smad 'jig rten myig tu 'gyur// khyod kyi ye shes thogs pa myed par 'ju/
213a8(mdo): bde gshegs khyod kyis 'jig rten ma gzigs myed// bde gshegs khyod kyi 'od ni zil myi non// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye bsam gyis myi khyab par 'gro// ri dang brag gi rtse mo thal phyung ste// rgyal ba'i 'od la sgrib
213a9(mdo): par byed pagyed// 'bras bu ji skar lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin// bde bar gshegs pa sangs rgyas mtha' yas ston// sangs rgyal zhing rnams sna tshogs nam mang ba// rgyal ba'i sras rnams sgrib pa rgyas
213b1(mdo): par 'gyur// 'jig ce mnanam phyags bcu 'jig rten na// phung byed byang chub rab gi shA 'gyur zhes// rgyas tham pa ma dpas byams sung ba dang / ra dang 'din deng 'dun padag nams dang /
213b2(mdo): brgya'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa' dag/ rnam pa' dzis 'dzin por sems dang pa// tsan mongs brgyas brgyal ba yab sa spyod// ba na 'di deng 'atsun bdag nis mdzang // phyogs brgya'i 'di spyon
213b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dag/ dga' lan gnas nas dpag khyed gi 'phos nas// za ba'i blo rnams pa la'i mang la 'jug pa// bar snang 'di na deng 'dug bdag gis mthong // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub mo
213b4(mdo): dpa' dag/ ma'i g.yam logs chum na gnas gyur te// !nga'i sa rab tu mchod cing 'byung ba dag/ bar snang 'di na deng 'dug pa nga dag gis mthong // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dam
213b5(mdo): dag/ ma'i g.yas logs rum na gnas 'gyur te// lha'i sa rab tu mchod cing 'byung ba dag/ bar snang 'di na deng 'dug pa/ dag gis mthong // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten byang chub sems
213b6(mdo): dpa' dag/ bdud kyi sde dang dpung rnams pham byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bla myed byang chub reg/ bar snang 'di na deng 'dug pa dag gis mthong // 'jig rten 'gon po phyogs bcu'i 'jig/
213b7(mdo): rten na// mye la chus btab zhi bar 'gyur ba bzhin// yang byung rab zhi mya ngan yod 'da' ba// bar snang 'di na der 'dug bdag gis mthong // stobs bcu myi dbang khyod kyi gzi brjid kyis// 'jig rten
213b8(mdo): na ni sgrib pa gang yang myed// rgyal ba tshad myed zhing yang de bzhin te// thogs pa myed par nam mkha' 'di nas mthong // ji ltar myi dag rmyi lam 'dod spyod dang // sos ka'i ji ltar smyig rgyu 'byung ba dang // la la/
213b9(mdo): chu nang zla ba mthong ba bzhin// zhing dang sangs rgyas de dag bdag gis mthong // kang tshe bdag gis sangs rgyas zhing yongs dag/ de tshe sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes thob// sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i tshe/
214a1(mdo): de na myi dpang byang chub bdag lung bstand// 'gro ba thams cad brag cha 'dra ba ste// skye bo mkhas pa dag la myi smras so// de ring mgon po khyod kyi gsung thos nas// chos kyi mying yang yang dag nyid kyang
214a2(mdo): rtogs// nga ni sgrib myed rnam grol spyod pa na// mtshungs myed bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing yang dag/ rgyal ba tshad myed de bzhin nyi rnams na// myi dbang gzigs shing bzhugs pa ngas mthong ngo // 'jam dpal de lta las
214a3(mdo): na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la bslab par bya'o// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub seme das seMs dang chen po ni rnam par tha dad pa yang myi
214a4(mdo): 'dzind// 'di na rnam par tha dad pa myed par yang myi 'dzin/ sgrib par yang gyi 'dzin// 'di na sgri ba myed ces kyang myi 'dzind / byang chub sems dpa' myed par yang myi 'dzin da/ byang chub sems
214a5(mdo): dpal 'di na myed par yang myi 'dzi nad/ spyod pa myed par yang myi 'dzin // spyod pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ sangs// rgyas kyi zhing myed par yang myi 'dzin / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
214a6(mdo): na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin/ dpag tu myed pa myed par yang myi 'ja nang / dpag tu byed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin// grangs byed/ ba myed par yang myi 'dzin/ grangs myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi/
214a7(mdo): 'dzin/ gis kyi thub pa myeng bar gyi 'dzind/ blam sa kris kyi ltu ba 'dina'i zhes klung kyi 'dzid/ bzungs paskyed pa na par mang kyi 'dzid/ mtshungs pa byed pa 'dum zhes kyang kyi 'dzin/

214a9(mdo): kyi na byam yin kyi dra/ 'dapa yo a mas sus tu byed pa/ rgyas cig kyi ya byis pa'i rang badzin canam ying/ thud pa'i rang bzhin ca ma yin ma ma'am partsams pa
214b1(mdo): shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can te/ nyal ba'i sad nas 'dod pa'i yon tan myed par yang gyi 'dzin / 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / 'dod pa'i dka' ba myed par gyi 'dzin / 'dod pa'i dga' ba myed
214b2(mdo): pa 'di na'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpa' sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par thar pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par tha rad pa myed par yang myi 'dzin / rnam par thar
214b3(mdo): pa 'di na'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzin to// de bzhin du sbyar te brjod du myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzidang / brjod du byed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind pa'i bar du/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyum
214b4(mdo): mkhan gi slob ya mkhas pas/ rtse bo mal po che'i mdun du rgya da sna tshogs 'dis ste/ grang za ba'i tshogs sam/ rta tshogs sam ga rta'i tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs sanA da ya/ des kyi
214b5(mdo): byis pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa/ thun pa'i rang bzhin can mayin pa mkhas pa rtogs pa/ bye brag phyed pa shes rab dang ldan/ bu'i rang bzhin can de dag kyis de mthong na/ glang po che'i tshogs skye
214b6(mdo): ba yang gyi 'dzidang/ grang ba che'i chog pa 'dzin no zhes kyang kyi 'dzid // 'tshog sa byed par yang gyi 'dzind/ ta'i tshogs 'di na'o zhes kyang gyini re/ shing ta'i tshogs myed par yang gyi 'dzin / shing rgya 'chog sa'o
214b7(mdo): zhes kyang rdzu 'dzin/ phung bu chung kyi tshogs byed pa gyi 'dzinapa/ dbu nu chung gi tshogs 'don mo zhes kyang kyi 'dzid/ sku ma byed par yang gyi 'dzind/ m+b+ha la 'din mo zhes kyarang gyi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ 2
214b8(mdo): dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par ba ra pas spyon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par ba dad pa yang gyi 'dzin/ rnam par ba dad pa 'din no zhes kyang gyi 'dzinan to// de bzhin du gyur te/ mdzod na
214b9(mdo): dzid na kya kyi sa sa // 'a / da ba sha blad byed pa # tshun sa tu dang pa
