215a5(mdo): 'dis ste dper na/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma'i tshen ma zang zhing smin/ myed pa'i nam mkha' la smrig rgyu zhing g.yo ba de la ka dag byis ba'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa/ blun pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pa
215a6(mdo): mkhas pa rtogs pa bye brag phyed pa/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin can de dag gis de mthong na/ smyig rgyu ba myed par yang myi 'dzind/ smyig rgyu ba 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ g.yo ba byed par yang myi 'dzind/ g.yo/
215a7(mdo): ba 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la pyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang spyod pa myed par yang myi 'dzind/ spyod pa 'di na'o//
215a8(mdo): zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing myed par yang myi 'dzinang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / dpag tu myed par myed par yang myi 'dzin da/ dpag tu myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzind/ grang
215a9(mdo): myed pa byed par myi 'dzinang / grangs myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzid / bsam gyis myi khyab pa myed par yang myi 'dzin / bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'di na'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzidang / mtshungs pa myed pa myed par yang
215b1(mdo): kyi 'dzin du/ mazungs pa byed pa 'dun pa shes kyad kyi 'di nang / klas sa tu byed par ya b+hI 'dzin du/ gzhal du byed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang gyi 'dzin du/ bdod du myed par ma kyi 'dzin/ brjod du byed pa 'di na'o zhes
215b2(mdo): xxx
215b3(mdo): byed par yang kyi 'dzin / sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na'o zhes kyi 'dzind/ kun khebs pa byed par yang gyi 'dzind/ kun khebs pa 'di na'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzin pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed
215b4(mdo): pa'i rnam par ba dad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po yang rnam par ba rad pa myed par yang myi 'dzidad/ rnam par ba rang pa 'di na'o zhes kyang gyi 'dzin / sgrib pa myed pa
215b5(mdo): byed par yang phyi 'dzin / sgrib pa myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' myed par yang myi 'dzind/ byang ba sems dpa' 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / spyod pa myed par
215b6(mdo): yang myi 'dzin/ spyod pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / sangs rgyas kyi zhing myed par yang kyi 'dzin / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzinang / dpag tu myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzin / dpag tu myed pa 'di
215b7(mdo): na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin / grangs myed pa myed par yang myi 'dzin/ grangs myed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang myi 'dzin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa myed par yang myi 'dzin / bsam gyis myi khyab 'di na'o zhes kyang gyi 'dzin /
215b8(mdo): spya dus pa skyed par yang gyi 'dzin / mtshungs pa byed pa 'di na'o zhes kyang kyi 'dzid/ gnas na myed pa byed par yang 'dzin/ gnas du byed pa 'di na 'o zhes kyang kyi 'di nang / mdzod du byed pa myed pa ma yang
215b9(mdo): 'a / brjod du myed pa 'dzin ma zhes kyang kyi 'dzid / yongasu dag pa gyid pa sa kyi 'dzid/ yongs su ngag la 'dzin ma zhes kyang gyi 'dzin/ dag par 'thu la byed la yang kyi mag da / mdzu pa 'dzin po kyi
216a1(mdo): 'dzin to// 'jas dpal sgrim pa skyed pa'i rnam par ba rad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems rnama' sem sa dpa' rkyen mam mi mdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu byed pa sangs su dag par 'gyur /
216a2(mdo): zhes sems la gyi bya ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par ba rad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu byed pa rmis myi dgos par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
216a3(mdo): ba byed pa'i rnam par thard pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ram// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tsaM sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i/
216a4(mdo): yongs su dag par 'gyur ram snyam tu sems la gyi bya ste/ 'on kyasgrib pa byed pa'i rnam par thadad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa sgrim myi dgos
216a5(mdo): par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam nangs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ ci nyi ma char ram snyam du sems la myi bya'o// 'on kyang nam nangs pa'i nus kyi tshe/ bsgrin
216a6(mdo): myi dgos par nyi ma 'char ba de bzhin tu 'jam dpal sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu
216a7(mdo): byed pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam du sems la gyi bya ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa byed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la spyod pa'i byang du thos sa dpa chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhi dpag tu myed pa nas brjod du byed pa
216a8(mdo): bar du/ bsgrim myi dgos par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal sgri ba khye rnam par thard pa la spyod pas/ de bzhin gsheg don thams cad grub pa'i de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa/
216a9(mdo): pa yongs su dgo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs byed pa dang / bsam kyis kyi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa byed pa dang / gzhal du byed pa dang / brjod du byed pa yongs su dag go// de skad ces bka' #
216b1(mdo): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'angs dpal gzhon nur gyu da pas 'di skad ces gso lan to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas don thams cad chum
216b2(mdo): pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci tsam cu rgya chen yongs su dag lags/ de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpas gnon nur gyu rad pa la 'di skad ces bka' ya to// 'jam dpal
216b3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji tsam tu rgya cher yongs su dag pan tshig gis go zer smra ba ma yin no//
216b4(mdo): gso la pa/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyir rlung lags las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' maHladA la/ 'jam dpal 'dung ngo / 2dpas 'di lta ste dpe mad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed
216b5(mdo): pa bcu'i rdul 'phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grong // khyer gcig tu gyur da la 'di lta ste/ khre 'am phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan kIs gang ba bzhin tu yungs kar gyis gang bar gyur da te/ myi
216b6(mdo): la la zhig gis yungs kar de rdul phra rab tu btags nas yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rtul phra rab gi rdul tu byas la/ des rdul phra rab de dag phrag pa la thogs
216b7(mdo): nas shar phyogs su song ste/ gom pa gcig bor bas/ 'jig rten gi khams kang ka'i bye ma snyed 'das la/ gom pa 'dor ba 'di 'dra ba dang ldan zhing 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mtshom
216b8(mdo): pa dang ldan te/ gom pa 'dor ba de lta bu dang mgyogs pa de lta bu dang ldan pas bskas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du song zhing / rdul zla rab gi rdul gcig bor la/ de lta bu'i tshul kyis shar phyogs su rtul phra ma
216b9(mdo): gyi tshul de thams cad bor te/ de bzhin du lo dang / nub dang / byang dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshul zor zhing de bzhin du steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su yang rdul phra rab kyi chu lani
217a1(mdo): de snyeng bor na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ yungs kar gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gang tu bor ba dang / ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kang ma/ gsolaldan 'das rtul phra rab kyi rtul
217a2(mdo): bor ba'i 'jig rten gi khams de ni nyung lags kyi ma bor ba de ni ches mang lags so// bka' yas la pa/ 'jas dpal 'jig rten gi khams gang rtul phra rab kyi rtul bor ba dang / gang sa bor ba'i 'jig rten gi kham
217a3(mdo): de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur da la/ 'di lta ste phye 'am/ phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gyis gang ba bzhin tu/ yungs kar gyis gang ba de la/ myi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru de dag btags te/ yungs 'bru re re
217a4(mdo): yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rtul tu byas te/ des rtul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad phrag pa la thogs nas/ shar phyogs su song ste/ gom pa gcig bor bas 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klur
217a5(mdo): kyi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pa de lta bu'i gom pa 'dor zhing / de lta bu'i mgyogs pas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal
217a6(mdo): par song ste/ rdul 'phra rab kyi rdul gcig bor zhing de lta bu'i tshul gyis/ shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad bor la/ de bzhi na du lho phyogs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de snyed 'dor zhing / nub dang /
217a7(mdo): byang dang / shar dang / lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / steng dang 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rdul phra rab de snyed bor na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ gang rdul phra rab de dag bor ba dang
217a8(mdo): gang du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gi khams kar mar / gsold pa bcom ldan 'das gsu phra rab de dag bor ba ni nyung lags kyi/ ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gi khams de ni ches mang lags so// bka' sa/
217a9(mdo): pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gi khams gang du rdul phra rab bor pa dang / gang du ma bor ba de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyurd la 'di lta ste/ phye 'am phye ma'i rnam pa gzhan gis gang ba bzhin du yungs kar
217b1(mdo): kas kar la/ myi la la zhig gis yungs 'bru de dag btags nas/ yungs 'bru re re yang yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi tshul du byas te/ des rdul phra rab de thams cad 'phrag pa la sogs nas
217b2(mdo): shar phyogs su sor ste/ gom pa gcig bor bar 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan te/ gom pa de lta bur 'dor
217b3(mdo): ba dang / de lta bu'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pas/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi skal par song ste/ rdul phra rab gcig bor la/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de thams cad bor la de bzhin du lho phyogs
217b4(mdo): su rdul phra rab de snyed bor zhing / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub ki mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams re re yang rdul phra rab de snyed bor
217b5(mdo): na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ gar rdul phra rab de bor ba dang / kar du ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag gang mar/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das gar du rdul phra rab bor ba ni nyung
217b6(mdo): lags kyi/ ma bor ba ni ches mang lags so// bka' sa lad pe 'jam dpal 'jig rten gi khams gang du rdul phra rab ma bor ba dang / gang du bor ba de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur da nas/
217b7(mdo): yungs kar gyis gang ba na ji ltar sngar dpe' bstan pa de bzhin du/ rgyas par byas te stong phrag sum bcur bskur pa/ 'jam dpal thams cad kyi pha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi phung po gzhag pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams
217b8(mdo): 'byab kyi rgya ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub kyi shing kyi rgya yang de tsam mo// byang chub kyi shing de ni rin po che sna bdun te/ 'bras bu ni
217b9(mdo): yid bzhin gi nor bu'o// byang chub gi shing de'i yal ka ni the ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed yod do// yal ka gcig cing yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rtul snyed kyi yal ga phre'u yod de/ yal ka phre'u gcig cing yang tha ma'i
218a1(mdo): rtul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'bras bu yod do// 'bras pu re re la yang chags ni dpag tu myed do// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de ni de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub ni lephra ba'i 'bras bu grub pa de ni myig yongs
218a2(mdo): su ma sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi myig lam tu snang bar myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ bar snang gi gnod sbyin rnams kyi gzhal myed khang dag myi rnams kyi myig lam du snang bar myi 'gyur ba de bzhin du
218a3(mdo): byang chub kyi shing de yang myig yongs su ma sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi myig lam tu snang bar myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams myi thogs par 'gro ste/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper
218a4(mdo): na/ par snang gi gnod sbyin dag gis gzhal myed khang rnams la myi thogs par 'gro ba de bzhin tu/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de la sems can rnams myi thogs par 'gro ste/ byang chub kyi shing de yang yongs su dag
218a5(mdo): pa'i las dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnam par sbyin pas yo// ngas su grub pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal yang de bzhin gshegs/ pa don thams cad grub pa'i de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni shar phyogs
218a6(mdo): su yang tha ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed yongs su dag go// lhor yang de snyed/ nub tu yang de snyed/ byang du yang de snyed/ shar lhor yang de snyed/ lho nub du yang de snyed/ nub byang du yang de snyed/ byang
218a7(mdo): shar du yang de sbed/ steng dang 'og gi phyogs su yang de snyed gi 'jig rten gi khams su dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de tsam du rgya cher yongs su dag go// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par ba dad pa la rten na de brgyar bsgrags
218a8(mdo): pa snyed du rang gi sangs chu zhing yongs su dag go// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / rgyal ba dang / 'gas pa dang / rgyun myi 'chad cing bar skabs myed/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dpe
218a9(mdo): na/ byis pa lnga brgya tsam ce na kha cig 'greng / kha cig 'dug pa'i rgyun gyi 'chad cing bar skabs myed pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi zhing de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / sbyin pa dang / 'gas pa yang
218b1(mdo): rgyun myi 'chad cing ba skabs myed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ char gyi 'bru rags pa 'bab pa'i tshe/ chu la chu'i chu bur kha cig 'byung / kha cig 'jig pa rgyun myi 'chad cing bar skabs myed par de bzhin du 'bras bu de dag 'byung ba
218b2(mdo): dang / skye ba dang / rgyal ba dang / 'gas pa yang rgyun myi chad cing bar skabs myed do// 'bras bu gas pa de'i cha shas gcig las kyang gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ste/ mtshan sum bcu rtsa
218b3(mdo): gnyis dang ldan/ lus dpe' byad bzang po brgya cus brgyan pa/ sred myed kyi bu ltar lus mkhregs pa/ srid pa la par gyurd pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed par yongs
218b4(mdo): su dag pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i bar du ste/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi yongs su dag par sbyang ba ste/ de dag de nas byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
218b5(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa/ de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la de
218b6(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pas rang gi sangs rgyasakyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'chad de/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang stond to// de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
218b7(mdo): nyan cing kun 'dzind te/ thos ma thag tu mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa/ mngon par shes pa thob ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs
218b8(mdo): pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dod ngo // de dag rdzu 'phrul kyi stobs kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
218b9(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te/ rab tu gom par byas/ lam du byas// rten du rna
219a1(mdo): chu shing bzhin du byas/ rab tu rtogs par byas shing legs par brtsams so// ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dashugs ldan zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i/
219a2(mdo): ting nge 'dzind zhig gnas zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu myed grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi
219a3(mdo): khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa'i pha rol kyi yang ches pha rol na me tog gi tshogs shes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ me tog gi tshogs kyi bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
219a4(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo skur ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi rnams kyi stond pa sangs rgyas btso//
219a5(mdo): ldan 'das/ dkon mchog dam pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten tu byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de la// nyan thos thog mar 'dus
219a6(mdo): ba ni/ nyan thos khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu yod de// dgra bcom ba zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa myed pa dbang dang ldan par gyur da/ sems shind tu rnam par grol/ shes rab shin tu rnam par gro/
219a7(mdo): bcang shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ sems kyi dbang pos cang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pas
219a8(mdo): stag go// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni/ de'i gnyis 'gyur yod de/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su da ni smon lam la yang dag par zhugs pa 'dzi//
219a9(mdo): rten gi khams grangs myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprin myed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lam la yang da bzhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang / mtshungs pa myed pa dang / gzhal du myed pa dang /
219b1(mdo): brjod du byed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad byed pa yongs su dag pa'i smon lams yang dag par zhugs pag sug go// yang nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa lani nyan thos khrag zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa/
219b2(mdo): ni/ de'i gnyis gyur da yod do// nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa la ni/ nyan thos thag khrig phrag brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa byed/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang
219b3(mdo): cad kyi dam pa'i pha rolang tu sond pa'i bar du'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni/ de'i gnyis 'gyur yod de/ nyin re zhing chos stond pa thams cad la/ nyan 'phos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'a
219b4(mdo): pa rnams kyis sa mnyam du de bzhin gshegs pa chos stan pa kun shes so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mtsho ga dam pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ rtsis mkhan nam cis man
219b5(mdo): kyi slob pa mkhas pas bskal da pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya'/ ma/ bskal da pa stong dam/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya'am/ bskal pa bye ba 'am/ bskal pa khrag khrig gam/ bskal/
219b6(mdo): pa gtams sam/ bskal pa dkrigs sam/ bskald pa 'gyur yas kyi bar du yang nyan thos 'dus pa 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa brgya phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ 'anyan thos 'dus pa stong
219b7(mdo): phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan pos 'dus pa brgya stong phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan pos 'dus pa bye ba phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa khrag khrig phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa gtams pa//
219b8(mdo): 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa dkrigs phrag 'di snyed ce'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa khyad phyin phrag 'di snyed ce 'am/ nyan thos 'dus pa 'gyur yas phrag 'di snyed yod ces rtsi bar myi nus so// 'jam
219b9(mdo): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams skar ma'i gzugs rnams la skar ma'i gzugs 'di snyed ce'am/ skar ma'i gzugs brgya phrag 'di snyed me'am/ skar ma'i
220a1(mdo): xxx
220a2(mdo): zas ni 'di snyed ce'am/ 'gyung las phrag 'di byed pa 'am/ kyis sa 'dun sa/ kyim la khad gyi grob ma mkhas pas kyang bzung bar gyi dum ste/ 'on kyang skur pa'i gzugs dpas tu myed pa'i grangs su 'gro ba /
220a3(mdo): !/ 'jam dpal can pas 'dus pa de rnams kyi mthal yang chog par gyi nus sa// 'das dpal de'i nus na rgyal po 'di gnas/ blo grom shes bya ba rnam dang ldan chol kyi nus pa zhes yod pa de/ sangs rgyas
220a4(mdo): kyi shing de thams cad la dbang zhing bdag po byed do// lasa? kyi rnam par smyid pa las 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
220a5(mdo): sangs rgyas dkon mchog dam pa de nyan thos dang / byang chub se mas dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa ya/ lo bye ba khrag khrig drugacu'i bar du/ ro sde brgya'i zhal zas spya rad te/ rim 'gro byas//
220a6(mdo): yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol cing / yo byad thams cad kyang sbyarar te/ 'di ltar chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyi rim gro byas so// des de bzhin gshegs
220a7(mdo): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la ro sna brgya pa'i zas kyis rim gro byas pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus byas so// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon
220a8(mdo): mngon par 'dus pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa bskyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs myed pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs myed pa bskyed
220a9(mdo): par gyurd to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pa'i mngon par 'dus byas nas/ sbyin
220b1(mdo): xxx
220b2(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa pa dpag tu byed pa// rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ rtswa khrims kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa dang sman pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs kyi med pa mye che pa mngon par 'dus byas nas/ tshul rlom sa kyi pha ro me
220b3(mdo): byin pa dang ngan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thags rabs tu myed pa chen pa bskyed do// de bzhin / dus khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa zu sa byed/ thabs kyis kyi thas
220b4(mdo): pa byed/ kas du byed/ marjod du byed cing / rgya cher mngon par 'dus byas so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dung ldan pa'i dge ba'i sa ba grangs byed pa nas brjod du myed pa/ rgyar ba'i zur du mdzod 'du
220b5(mdo): byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge bu'i shugs rgya che zhing grangs byed/ bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa byed/ gzhal tu myed brjod du byed pa bskyed do// bzod pa'i
220b6(mdo): pha rold tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing grangs myed/ dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ ji ltar sbyin pa/ 'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
220b7(mdo): mngon par 'dus byas pa de bzhin du/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rgyas par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
220b8(mdo): ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus byas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa mngon par 'dus nas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin/
220b9(mdo): pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs rgya che zhing dpag tu myed pa bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyard te// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ldan pa rgya che ba grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal
221a1(mdo): du byed/ brjod du byed pa mngon par 'dus byas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod du myed pa'i bar du mngon par 'dus byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan
221a2(mdo): paba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal tu myed/ brjod du myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rgyal po pa de gnas blo gros kyis de lta bur pha rold tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i
221a3(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mang bas/ ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkon mchog dam pa de la pha rol
221a4(mdo): tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon pa ra stod do// stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas pa// chu bo bzhi rgal myi'i seng ge// khyod la phul dpag myed 'gyur// sbyin pa de
221a5(mdo): yang zil myi non// ba tsha myed pa'i zhing dag la// rdo dang bor pa gyo mo myed// kun sbyangs rab tu rmongs pa na// myi mnyam myed// phyogs tra myed par// ji ltar sa bon btab nas su// rmed pI
221a6(mdo): myi de bde nyal yang // dus su rtsa ba brtan par zug// myur du sngon por byung bar byed// klu yis sa la chus btab pas// lo ma sdong bu rnams kyang 'byung // dus tshigs dus kyi rims bzhin du//
221a7(mdo): nges par 'bras bu sbyin par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang bcom// gti mug bras nges pa'i blos// ma spad yon tan zhing khyod la// shes rab bzhol gyis rmos pa'i ni// sa bon nyung ngu btab na yang
221a8(mdo): de bzhin sbyin bdag mya tshon kyang // pha rol phyind pa yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhyend pa'i myu gu skye// mgon po khyod la sbyin phul na// byams pa snying rje nyon mongs myed// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo gsum
221a9(mdo): dang // tha mar 'bras bu mya ngan 'da'// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// sa la dong ka myen rgyas bzhin// bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa bstsags pas// ji ltar bde gshegs de bzhin shog// ji ltar bsod
221b1(mdo): nams mtshan mnga' ba// legs spad bsugs pa thub pa'i thog/ ji ltar gyi mchog dam pa bzhin// bdag kyang bde gshegs de bzhin 'gyur// ji ltar dpe' phyed blo can khyod// shes rab gnas la khyod gnas nas//
221b2(mdo): lnga bar rab tu phyin pa'i skye 'o// sa log bkod par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub reg nas ni// de bzhin bden la rab gnas te// log pa'i lam song rtse bo rnams// bden pa bzhi'i lam tu dgod// ji ltar chod/
221b3(mdo): ni phung po myed// bla phyed phung po zad par zhugs// byis pa phung pos bcings pa rnams// thams cad phung po 'dor du bcud// bdag kyang phung po myed pa dang // phud myed byang chub mchog thob na// phung pos bcing
221b4(mdo): pa'i skye bo rnams// phung po 'dor bar rab tu dkod// ji ltar khyod kyis nyon mongs spangs// chu yis mye rnams zhi ba bzhin// nyon mongs mye yis 'bar ba yi// skye bo sdug bsngal thar
221b5(mdo): par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub rab reg ste// khro glen 'do// dbye ma zhi zhes// nye bar zhi ba'i lam sto da pa'i// bye bo/ rab tu zhi bar 'god// ser sna'i zhags pas bcings pa dang
221b6(mdo): phrag dog kun sbyor mun pas sgribs// srid par chags pa mgo na myed rnams// yan lag brgyad kyi lam la dgod// ji ltar rang 'byung khyod nyid ni// stobs bcu ye shes rab gnas te/
221b7(mdo): srid sgom sems can khrag khrig la// stobs bcu ye shes ngoms par mdzad// bdag kyang byang chub rab reg cing // bla myed byang chub thob nas su// srid bsgom sems can khrag khri ga la// bstobs bcu ye she
221b8(mdo): ngoms par bgyi// 'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po bde gnas blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dam pa de la// lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug bcu'i bar du zas ro brgya pa sbya rad cing //
221b9(mdo): yul ka shi pa'i na bza' gsol de/ bar snang la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs tshad myed grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal tu/
222a1(mdo): myed parjod du byed pa bskyed nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs des bska la pa brjod du myed par rnams kyang sems can dmyal bar ma skyes/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lA/
222a2(mdo): gi ris su yang ma skyes/ myi khom pa rnams su ma skyes/ ris dma' bar ma skyes dbul po'i ris su ma skyes so// bskal pa brjod du myed par nam yang lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am/ mkhris pa las gyurd pa
222a3(mdo): 'am/ bad kan las kyu rad pa'i nad ma byung ngo // nams kyang dbang po ma tshang bar ma gyur du/ nams kyang myig ser ba 'jigs pa'i myig dang / myigaso ba dang / bzhin yo bar ma gyurd to// nams kyang skyes bu chen
222a4(mdo): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/ lus ma brgyan par ma gyur // nams kyang dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu dang bral bar ma gyurapa/ lha'i nang du lhur gyur da tam/ myi'i nad myir gyur du na/ nams kyang
222a5(mdo): dbang po dang bdag po ma byas par ma gyurd/ nams kyang smon// lam phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar ma gyur da/ nams kyang / sangs rgyas myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma skyes/ nams kya
222a6(mdo): nad byed pa dang / gzugs dang / lo spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / phyug pas sngon dregs par ma gyur da/ nams kyang bud myed kyi dreg sa pa dang gos kyi dregs pa ma skyes/ nams kyang sbyin bdag ma
222a7(mdo): byas par ma gyu dang / de rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi dregs pa ma skyes nams kyang ldan pa ma yin par ma gyur / de rnams kyang thos pas dregs pa ma skyes/ nams kyang mang du zos pa ma yin par ma gyu rad nams
222a8(mdo): kyang 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes/ nams kyang btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ma bskor da par ma gyur da/ nams kyang tshangs par myi spyod par ma gyur da te/ bsams ma thag tu du rnyed par gyur da to// nams kyang gnod sos
222a9(mdo): kyi 'du shes pa skyes/ nams kyang rnam par 'che ba'i 'du shes pa skyes ste/ de ltar rgyal po des shugs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di rnams dang / gzhan

222b4(mdo): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa dachen po'i sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par ba dad pa spyod pa des/ rgyal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
222b5(mdo): rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol / tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i sa pa'i shugs rgya chen bskyed par bya'o// rim po gnyis pa/
222b6(mdo): 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs myed pa dpag tu myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa na rgyal po'i drang srong tshangs pa'i lha
222b7(mdo): zhes bya ba dang / myes byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis nags shig na 'khod de de dag dgon pa nas dgon pa/ nags tshal nas nags tshal du/ gshor nas gshor du/ nags thibs po nas thibs po/
222b8(mdo): 'gro zhing / bdag cag bud myed dang lhan cig gnas par gyur da na/ bdag cag 'dod chag gi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa dang / lhan cig tu 'grogs
222b9(mdo): na yang bdag gnod sems kyi rgyu las byung ba'i bslab par 'gal bar 'gyur yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa 'am/ yongs su bzung ba la nyes par myi lta ba dang / lhan cig 'grogs par gyur da na yang /
223a1(mdo): bdag cag gti mug gi rgya las byung ba'i bsrab pa las 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i nyes pa rnams mthong nas/ dgon pa nas dgon par/ nags tshal nas nags tshal// gshor nas/
223a2(mdo): gshor/ nags thibs po nas thibs bor rgyu'o// 'jam dpal de'i dus na rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe/ khyim gi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams
223a3(mdo): snga dang / shing dang chu la ci bde spyod du gnang ste/ rjes su yi 'ang rang ngo zhes tshig 'di skad ces smras pas/ drang srong de gnyis kyang rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa'i khams na gnas so// de'i tshe rgyal po sde myi 'pham pas
223a4(mdo): chom rkun nor 'phrogs pas gnod pa'i las byas te bros pa dang / drang srong de dag gis chom rkun bros pa mthong ngo // chom rkun de dag gis kyang drang srong nags kyi nang na gnas par mthor nas/ chom rkun de dag gis
223a5(mdo): thal mo s+ya rad te 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong khyed la ba dag cag mthong ngam zhes la la zhig gis dris na/ khyed kyis ma bstand cing / de nas drang srong tshangs pa'i lhas drang srong
223a6(mdo): mes sbyin la sbas pa/ kye ma'o mya sbyin byung ba 'di ni shi nad tu dka' na ji ltar bya/ gal te 'di ma mthong ngo zhes sman ni gzha na slus par 'gyur/ ji ste ma bslus na ni gnod pa byas par
223a7(mdo): yang 'gyur/ gnod par byas par 'gyur na/ 'di ji ltar bya khyed spros shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong myes sbyin gyis drang srong tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// kye tshangs pa'i lha
223a8(mdo): 'di la gnod par 'gyur bar ma 'dzin cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa'i lha gang la la dag lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba rnams kyis/ sems zin
223a9(mdo): pa dang 'dug go/ tshangs pa'i lha 'di lta ste dper na/ gos snum can la rtul reg na chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas par gnas pa de dag
223b1(mdo): ni/ yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis/ sems kun zin nas 'dug go// tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang srog la gyi sa pa de dag la ni yongs su zag pa byung ba byung ba rnams kyis sems
223b2(mdo): kun zin cing 'dug par myi 'gyur ro// tshas pa'i lha 'di lta ste dper na/ gos yongs su dang ba la rdul gis reg kyang sprugs ma thag tu myed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i lha gang dag kha cig lus dang
223b3(mdo): grog la gyi lba ba de dag ni yongs su bag pa byung ba byung rnams kyis sems kun tu zin cing gnas par gyi 'gyur ro// de bas na tshangs pa'i lnga bdag cag kyang lus dang srog la gyi lta bar bya'o// rangs pa'i sku
223b4(mdo): gal te bdag cag lus dang srog la sa bltas na/ bdag cag yongs su bag pa byung ba des semamakhan nas gnas par myi 'gyur ro// rtse tshangs pa'i lha lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa'i rtul zhu
223b5(mdo): 'grub bo// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' ma sa yad to// de nas tshangs pa'i lha la drang srong myes byin gyis/ myi lta ba bstan pas lus dang srog la myi lte ba rjod na
223b6(mdo): de nas rgyal po sde myi 'gram bcom rkun de dag tshol zhing nags su/ kapo der gyi na te/ rgyal po sde myi 'bam pas nags sug po napan drang srong de dag gnas pa mthong ngo // mthong nas drang srong na
223b7(mdo): dag ka la ba der song ste/ myi kha cika nags stug po der chom rkun tshol tu 'akye'o// de nas rgyal po sde myi 'pham khas drang srong de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyon
223b8(mdo): gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po sde myi 'pham pas drang srong de gnyis la 'di skad ces sbas so// drang srong khyed gnyis kyis chom kun nags stug po 'di'i nang du 'ongs pa 'am/ phyir byung ba lta mthong ngam/
223b9(mdo): de skad ces spras pa dang / drang srong de gnyis kyis rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po bdag gis bdag nyid kyang myi mthong na// chom rkun lta ga la mthong / rgyal po sde myi 'pham
224a1(mdo): ba dang / drang srong de dag gtam 'di byas pa dang / rgyal po'i myi de dag gis chom rkun de dag zin te/ de dag gis de dag zin nas/ rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa ga la ba der 'ongs te phyi nad
224a2(mdo): nas 'di skad ces smras so// chom rkun de dag bzung ste mchis pa 'di lags shes byas so// de nas rgyal po sde myi 'pham pas drang srong de gnyis gis smras pa'i don khong du ma chud nas/ drang srong de gnyis
224a3(mdo): la smras pa/ khyed ni rdzun smra ba yin te/ drang srong ma yin no zhes de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa gcod du bcug go// 'on kyang drang sro ded/ gis gzhan la gnod pa ma byas so// de nas yang drang srong myis byin
224a4(mdo): rka lag bcad pa dang / rgyal po ste myi 'pham pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal po khyod nyid la bdag kun tu btsal na/ rgyal po sde myi 'gram pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po gang yin/ ci myig rgyal po sde myi
224a5(mdo): 'pham pa 'am/ 'on te rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa myika lasagazhan nam/ ci rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa de rna ba 'am/ sna'o// lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ 'on te rgyal po sde myi
224a6(mdo): 'pham pa de rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan nam zhes drang srong des bdag myi mya gas par bstand pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtog
224a7(mdo): go// de nas rgyal po sde myi 'pham pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtags na/ bdag nyid myi dmyigs so// don dam par bdag nyid ma dmyigs pas/ 'gyod pa chen po dang ldan par gyur da te
224a8(mdo): nyes pa byed pa'i drang srong gis bshad pa'i don ma shes pas 'phral du/ sdig pa'i las byas pa des chos nyid de yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes nas/ sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde
224a9(mdo): ste/ 'gyod nas sa'i phyogs de na 'gro zhing ldog go// de nas drang srong mes byin de/ rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa 'gyod par rig nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod ji ltar bdag nyid
224b1(mdo): gyi dbyigs pa de bzhin du/ su'i rka lag bcad pa de yang gyi dbyigs so// de nas rgyal po sde myi 'bam pa la drang srong myes byin gyis stong pa nyid bstand pas// kun nas dkris pa myur tu bsal te/ chos
224b2(mdo): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid myur du rtogs nas des de gnyis la stond pa'i 'du shes bskyed do// drang srong de dag gis de la tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems la
224b3(mdo): smon pa bslab ste/ rgyal po chen po tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i mthu la gzigs/ rgyal po chen po bden bI dang den pa'i yig kA kri bskal pa brjod du myed par yang sems ma rung bar byas par myi dran pa lnga
224b4(mdo): na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du gyu rad cig ces byas ma thag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yas pa
224b5(mdo): snga ma bzhin du gyur to// rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden ba'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du myed par lus kyi las/ ma rungs par byas par myi dran pa lta na/ bden pa dang bde
224b6(mdo): ba'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhi na du gyur da cig ces byas ma thag tu/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de gnyis kyi lag pa g.yon pa snga ma bzhin du gyur da to//
224b7(mdo): rgyal po chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bskal pa brjod du myed par/ 'tsho ba ma rung bar byas pa myi dran pa lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag gnyis kyi rkang pa snga ma bzhin//
224b8(mdo): du gyur da cig ces byas pa dang / 'di ltar drang srong myes byin de'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ drang srong de gnyis kyi rkang pa dang lag pa snga ma bzhin tu gyurd to// de nas rgyal po sde myi 'pham pas de go
224b9(mdo): kyi bdon pa'i byin gi rlabs kyis rdzu 'phrul mthong nas/ spu zing zhes byed par gyurd to// des drang srong myes byin gyi bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs thob pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi
225a1(mdo): las yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir batshon par gyur to// de de na 'dug bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas par gyurd to// des de nyid nas phyogs bcu'i
225a2(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mthong ste/ la la bla myed pa yang dag par dgas pa'i byang chub mngon ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la la ni pra/
225a3(mdo): na myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ la la ni rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can rnams la 'doms la la ni che'i 'du byed 'dor/ la la ni phung po'i lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying
225a4(mdo): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spya na/ drang srong myes byin rim 'gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i mthong ngo // drang srong myes byin de rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul
225a5(mdo): rnam pa du mas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsta/ nad pa sems can rnams la ston cing / bla na myed pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo //
225a6(mdo): de nas rgyal po sde myi 'pham pas// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams sems can bye ba khrag khrig du ma mthong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i shugs rnaMs
225a7(mdo): kyi ta la bdun srid nam mkha' la 'phags te/ bar snang la 'dug nas/ drang srong myes byin de dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
225a8(mdo): rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i tshogs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do// ji ltar dri myed me long dkyil 'khor lus la mchis pa'i nyes pa yon tan gda' de bzhin tshul khrims yongs dag
225a9(mdo): dge ba la/ sems la mchi ba'i nyes dang yon tan gda'/ 'dod bzhin 'bras bu 'byung ba'i zhing 'di ltar/ bsams pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sbyin/ de bzhin tshul khrims phung po gtsang dag pa
225b1(mdo): bsam pa bzhin du 'bras bu kun kyang sprin/ ji ltar sa la rab tu las byas te/ bsams pa bzhin du sdod kyi rnam par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul khrims phung po yongs sbyangs pas/ bsams pa bzhin du
225b2(mdo): yon tan thams cad sbyin// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu byi dor gyis/ bsams pa bzhin du longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin// de bzhin tshul khrims phung po byi dor bgyis// bsams pa bzhin du yon tan thams
225b3(mdo): cad sbyin// rgyal sras rnams kyis thog mar spyad gsungs pa// tshul khrims yongs dag 'og pa'i rkang pa ste/ rgyal ba rnams ni dri myed rkang pa des// byang chub zhi ba mchog rnams yang dag grub / ji snya
225b4(mdo): shing rgyal n+ya gro gzhon nu 'dir/ sa gzhi mnyam par btsugs shing rab bskyed na// yal ka byung zhing mngon par rab tu skye/ trog 'bras bur ldan zhing khyad par 'dzin // de bzhin tshul/
225b5(mdo): khrims phung por su gnas pa/ rgyal po'i sras de yon tanarnams kyis skye// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dir reg nas// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar dbyed 'gyur/
225b6(mdo): tshul khrims ldan pas dpal dang gzi brjid rnyed// tshul khrimasaldan dang gzugs rab mdzes par 'gyur// tshul khrims dag la rgyal sras rtag dga' ba// rnyed par dka' ba'i chos kyang rab tu
225b7(mdo): skyed// spyod pa yongs dag tshul khrims kun spyod pa ga dri myed khrims ldan drang srong myes byin 'di// sangs rgyas yon tan mnga' ba brgya dag gis// kun tu bstod pa mdzad par bdag gis mthong // tshul
225b8(mdo): khrims yongs dag kun tu spyod pa la// sangs rgyas brgyas ni mngon par bstod gyur rad dang // ji ltar bdag gi slob dpon myes byin la// sangs rgyas brgya yis mngon par bstod pa ltar// de bzhin tshul khris
225b9(mdo): gzi brjid ldan pa bdag ga legs par spyad pa brgya yis mngon par bstod// skyes nas bdag gi khrims stobs gdung myed de/ rim nad btab pa gsol ba byas pa bzhin// dri myed tshul khrims gnas pa
226a1(mdo): bdag gis kyang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs// bye ba khrag khrig mang po rgyu ba dang // tshul khrims bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa mthong // dri myed tshul khrims gnas
226a2(mdo): pas bdag gyis kyang // bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// bla myed byang chub rim par sangs rgyas te// bdud rnams bye ba khrag khrig btul ba mthong // dri myed tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang //
226a3(mdo): bde gshegs bye ba zhag thig mang po rnams/ dgra bcom stod cing mtshungs myed 'khor lo mchog/ 'gro la par phyir rgyal bas bskor ba mthong // dri myed tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang // bde gshegs/
226a4(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ skye bo mun pas bsgribs shing myi ma khas pa// bde gshegs sdug bsngal brgya las dgra lta mthong // dri myed tshul khrims gnas pas bdag gis kyang // bde gshes
226a5(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// sems can khrag khrig btu/ la te mdzad pa mdzad// bde gshegs dad pas bsgral phyir/ bzhugs pa mthong // dri myed tshul khrims gnas pas bdag
226a6(mdo): gis kyang // bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad pa mdzad nas su// yang 'byung myed par mya ngan 'da' bar mthong // dri myed tshul khrims gnas pas
226a7(mdo): bdag gis kyang // bde gshegs bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnams// mya ngan 'das nas ring sel rab rgyas zhing // skye bo bde bas mngon tu tshim mdzad mthong // de ring slob dpon khyod kyi gsung thos nas// bad/
226a8(mdo): gi myig kyang bsam myi khyab par dag/ phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba rnams// sgrib pa myed pa'i myig gis stobs kyis mthong // bdag gi mtshungs myed yongs dag pas// bdag gi slob myed myig 'di
226a9(mdo): skyes// tshul khrims phung po yongs su sbyangs pa la// sgrib myed pa'i myig ni bdag gis thob// 'di ltar thal sbyar slob dpon mchog khyod la// gang gi mthu che ba 'di de 'dra ba// de la thal mo mngon sbyar
226b1(mdo): phyag 'amal zhing // mtshungs byed nul bral byang chub reg par 'gro// de nas rgyal po sde gyi 'bam pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thugs de rnyed pas// de bzhin gshegs pa de/
226b2(mdo): thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i phra ba'i shugs rnyed pas/ phyogs su mun pa myed par gyur da to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ba
226b3(mdo): cad mthong ste// kang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstanang pa de dag thams cad kyang lend cing 'dzind to// de tshun chad rnams kyang dran pa nyams par ma gyurd te// bskald pa brjod du byed
226b4(mdo): pa'i bar chug dus thams cad du'ang bos pa 'dzind par gyur to// de la chos kyi sgo bye ba zhag khrig brgya stong dpag tu byed pa mngon tu gyur to// 'di ltar sgrib pa myed pa'i chos la bzod pa 'or
226b5(mdo): du chud cing / sems la kun nas dkris pa byed pas// gang dang gang du skye ba la/ de dang der skyes pa bag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig te/ na chad byed pa'i 'jig rten gi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
226b6(mdo): 'das rnams mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang lhan cig tu smra zhing gtam zer te// 'di ltar mun pa myed pa'i lus dang ldan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
226b7(mdo): bod cing / yang dag par mgu bar bya ba yin no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong myes byin zhes bya bar gyurd pa gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzind na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis
226b8(mdo): de ltar myi lta'o// de'i ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma myed pa'i spyad de de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong myes byin zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong
226b9(mdo): tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya bar gyur da pa gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'dzind na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar myi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mchog de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong tshangs pa'i lha zhes
227a1(mdo): bya bar gyurd to// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam tu sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa thos ma thag tu/ kun nas dkris pa bsal bar gyur
227a2(mdo): ba de gzhag zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzind na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar myi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po sde myi 'pham pa zhes bya bar
227a3(mdo): gyur to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims ma nyams par bya'o// tshul khrims spyod myed pa dang / tshul khrims shi nad tu bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims
227a4(mdo): ma 'dres pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / tshul khrims rdzogs par bya ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la chag par myi bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
227a5(mdo): tu phyind pa la mchog tu 'dzin par myi bya'o// de ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa la sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa/ mngon tu gyu rad to// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha dad pa
227a6(mdo): mngon tu gyurd pa/ ji ltar bdag kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang ga tu myed pa yongs su dag par 'gyur snyam sems la myi bya'o ste/ 'on kyang sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha dad pa mngon tu gyur
227a7(mdo): na/ sgrim myi dgos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa yongs su
227a8(mdo): dag par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su dag na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te tshul khrims la mchog tu
227a9(mdo): 'dzind pa myed na/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de ltar mchog tu 'dzin pa gang gis kyang / tshul khrims la mchog tu 'dzi nad pa myed do// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba
227b1(mdo): 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa dpag tu myed pa nas/ brjod du myed pa'i bar du/ de'i pha rol kyi yang rgya ches pha rol na myi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i skal pa byung ste/ 'jam dpal myi 'chi ba kun
227b2(mdo): tu 'phags pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur
227b3(mdo): pa/ bla na myed pa lha dang gyi rnams kyi ston pa/ bsangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sngar mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong myi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros bya/
227b4(mdo): pa zhig yod de/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir drang srong de myi 'khrugs pa'i the gros zhes bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal sngon byung ba bskal pa myi 'chi ba kun tu 'phags pa'i de'i pha rol gi ches pha rol/ bskal pa grang
227b5(mdo): myed brjod du byed pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe'i tshad dpag tu byed/ de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed cing chad myed pa yongs
227b6(mdo): su dag pa dang ldan no// yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba dang lnga na pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ blo gros 'bar ba zhes bya ba
227b7(mdo): bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa rnams la dge ba'i za ba skyed pa zhig yod de// blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu de la/ myi phyen
227b8(mdo): pa'i g.yog sangs rgyas khrag thig dpag tu myed pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i 'bram ze zhag khrig brgya bcu yod do// yang 'jam dpal blo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu
227b9(mdo): des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa de la/ lo bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcur myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhus te// bcom ldan 'das kyis myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings shes
228a1(mdo): gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings de kar lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi/ de skad ces gamo lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ka shes/
228a2(mdo): pa rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pas/ zo gros 'bar ba bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa sad to// blo gros 'bar ba myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings shes bya ba
228a3(mdo): de ni 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so// blo gros 'bar ba ci'i phyir dbyings de myi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings shes bya zhe na/ blo gros 'bar ba 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni sogs pa yang myed/ 'bri
228a4(mdo): pa yang myed/ len pa yang myed/ 'god pa yang myed/ zad pa yang myed/ 'gog pa yang myed/ 'grib pa yang myed/ 'phel ba yang myed rigs kyang ma yin/ rigs myed pa yang ma yin/ 'gyur
228a5(mdo): ba yang ma yin/ 'dzind pa yang ma yin/ 'dor ba yang ma yi/ na/ gzung ba yang ma yin/ gtong ba yang ma yin/ phra ba ya/ nga ma yin/ zab pa yang ma yin/ mun pa yang ma yin/
228a6(mdo): snang ba yang ma yin/ nyin par yang ma yin/ mtshan mo yang ma yin/ ring po yang ma yin/ thung du yang ma yin/ nye ba yang ma yaM na/ ring ba yang ma yin/ yangs pa yang ma yin/ dog pa
228a7(mdo): yang ma yin/ gcig pu yang ma yin// thun mong yang ma yin/ gzugs kyang ma yin/ snga ma yang ma yin/ 'phyi ba yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ 'dra ba yang ma yan// 'pho//
228a8(mdo): pa yang ma yin/ myi 'pho ba yang ma yin/ 'chi 'pho yang ma yin/ skye bo yang ma yin te/ de ltar 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings de ni myi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o// de'i phyir de'i phyir gyi 'khrugs pa'i zla rma
228a9(mdo): shes bya bar gyur da to// drang srong kyi 'khrugs blo gros des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de la yang kyi 'khrugs pa'i dbyings kun dris so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
228b1(mdo): sngon lha rnams rab tu 'dul// mtshal na gnas pa gyi yis mngon pa rdo mthong // bdag kyis rgyal sras sum gi lhums nas su// lha rnams kyis kyang mngon par mcho 'byung // sems dge bsan gyi gtsang rdul gyi cha/
228b2(mdo): rin cen nyes pas myi gos bzhin du mthong // bdag gis rgyal bsras rgyal srid rin cen bdun// brgya phrag bcu po bu'i tshogs rnams dang // rta dang glang pos gang ba'i sa spangs te/ bdud kyi zhags bcad mngon par 'byung
228b3(mdo): pa mthong // bdag gis rgyal srid 'gro la sran srad du// zag khrig bdud rnams zil mnan byang chub reg/ nyon mongs ring sngags rnams mang dpa' bos spangs// bde gshegs nyi ma bzhin du snyan pa mthong // bdag/
228b4(mdo): gis rgyal zas rang gis nyon mongs 'dul mtshungs khyed dam bachos da kyi 'khor los bskor// sa phyi sems can zhag khrig rnams btul zhing / bad ma bar 'gro ba lan gsum skor ba mthong // bdag/
228b5(mdo): gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rgyu zhing sems can 'dul// 'gro la sman slad 'gro ba stong par/ ston// pad ma gnyis bzhin sems can sad mdzad mthong //
228b6(mdo): bdag gis rgyal ba stong phrag mtha' yas pa// sems can btul nas sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad// lce steng 'byung ba'i mchil ma myis bor bzhin// de bzhi sa gshegs tshogs gnas 'do
228b7(mdo): ba mthor// bdag gis sangs rgyas stong phrag mtha' yas pa// zhi bar 'gro ba mye la chus btab bzhin// 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'ur skyo mya ngan bzlas// stobs bcu nyon mongs kun spangs 'das pa mthong //
228b8(mdo): bdag kyis rgyal ba stong phrag ma pa la yas pa 'grol sman don yang da'i sku gdung bral// mya ngan 'das kyang rtse bo mya ngan mo// mya ngan 'das kyang bsnur pa brjod par mthong // de sbyar 'gro la snyan skad skyabs su
228b9(mdo): dge ba bstsags pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyurang// bdag nyid krol nas sems can khrag khrig dgrol// mgon myed bcud zhags bcings pa zhi bar bgyi// de nas drang srong kyi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros kyis bcom
230a1(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snar mdzad de lag bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon
230a2(mdo): bar stod nas/ dge ba'i cha pa des byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bskal ba brjod tu myed par nams kyang gti mug par ma gyur da/ nams kyang 'dod pa'i ma spyad/ nams kyang bud myed gi dbang du ma gyur da/ nams
230a3(mdo): kyang bdud kyi spyod yul la ma spyad/ nams kyang mngal gyi gnas su ma zhugs / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par rdzus te skyes nams kyang bdud kyi las kyis ma sgribs/ nams kyang bdud kyi las kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur da
230a4(mdo): nams kyang byang chub kyi sems dang bral bar ma gyur // nams kyang 'khor bas skyo ba'i sems ma skyed/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa' ma yin pa/ nams kyang dran pa myed pa'i sems ma skyed do//
230a5(mdo): bskal pa brjod du myed par nams kyang sangs rgyas dang bral ba'i yi/ da la byed pa ma bskyed/ nams kyang chags pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma skyed/ bskal pa brjod du myed par nams kyang skye ba dang /
230a6(mdo): ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed/ nams kyang yang 'byung ba ma 'tshal// nams kyang thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems dang bral bar ma gyur da nams kyang dman pa'i sems dang ldan par ma gyur dag nams
230a7(mdo): kyang thams cad mkhyend pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur/ nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar ma gyur da/ nams kyang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du dmyigs par ma gyur de/ nams kyang dge ba'i
230a8(mdo): bshes gnyen dang myi ldan par ma gyur da/ nams kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dngos por ma dmyigs/ des nams kyang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams tha dad par ma bsams/ des nams
230a9(mdo): kyang dus gsum mnyam pa las lam log pa ma sten/ des nams kyang dus gsum la dmyigs par ma gyurd to// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang srong myi 'khrugs pa'i blo gros zhes
230b1(mdo): bya bar gyu da pa de gzhan shig yin pa rlab tu 'dzin na/ 'jam dpas khyod kyipa de kar gyi la'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ drang sror gyi 'khrugs pa'i thazas
230b2(mdo): zhes bya bar gyur da to// de sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par ba rang ba la spyod pas/ ji skar ngas 'arjod pa'i bzhin du de tsam du rgya cher sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas so// 'jas dpal de lta bas na// byang chub sems
230b3(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su myor bar 'dod pas sgrib pa byed pa'i rnam par thar dag kyi bcom pa myi 'dor ro// sgrib pa byed pa'i rnam par ba dad pa la mos par bya'o// yang 'jas
230b4(mdo): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu myed pa rgya chen po mngon par/
230b5(mdo): 'dus byas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang ldan pa/ pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dpag tu byed cing rgya chen po bskyed de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi dad pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
230b6(mdo): ba grangs myed cing bsam gyis myi khyab pa nas brjod du myed pa'i bar du rgya chen po mngon par 'dus byas so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs bsam gyis myi
230b7(mdo): khyab mtshungs pa myed gzhal du byed/ brjod du myed pa rgya chen po bskyed do// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dpag tu myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed
230b8(mdo): pan rin chen byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa lnga dang myi rnams kyi ston
230b9(mdo): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzang po'i lha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzang po'i lha de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskald pa khrag khrig brgya bcur gyur da to// 'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i
231a1(mdo): tus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang pa'i lha de'i gsung rab la dge slong des pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ shin tu rtogs pa dang ldan pa/ shi nad tu blo gros dang ldan pa// shin du dran pa dang /
231a2(mdo): ldan pa shind tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stobs bskyed pa rnyed pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ rgyal po'i rigs las rab tu byung ste/ gzugs bzang
231a3(mdo): pa mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de ma rtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mos pa'i blo gros ci tsam du mdzes pa/ de tsam gyis mdzes pa'i sems can su yang myed de lta bas chog myi
231a4(mdo): shes pa/ sangs rgyas khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa la snyen bkur byas pa yongs su spyad pa byas pa/ tshad myed pa'i chos nyid las nges par byung pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzind bzhi rnyed de/ 'dod pa bzhin rnyed
231a5(mdo): cing nyon mongs pa myed par rnyed/ tshogs myed par rnyed nas 'dri// sa par byas te/ re shig ni de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sems myi
231a6(mdo): 'jug go// phyogs bcu'i pha rol tu son pas 'dod na/ sa sa rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa rnams su 'gro'o// de nas dge slong mo sa pa'i glo gros de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
231a7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i lha ga la ba der song ste/ phyi nad nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs
231a8(mdo): gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das gzings chen po bca' bar 'tshal dang / zam pa chen po gdags
231a9(mdo): par 'tshal pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'tshal pa dang / sems can thams cad bsgral par 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa yongs su sbyang bar 'tshal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
231b1(mdo): grangs mang mchis bsam kyis kyi thal/ mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas cu ma mchis pa'i/ brjod tu ma mchis pa yongs su spang bar 'amal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa yongs su dag pa bsgrub par
231b2(mdo): 'chal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kar la brtson par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lhas/ dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la 'di skad
231b3(mdo): ces bka' sa lang ngo to// dge slong dag yon tan chad byed pa gzhan yang bsgrub par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyi
231b4(mdo): brtson 'grus par ma mo// mtsham mo ma 'du shes yid la gyi byed/ ba dang / nyin pa su 'du shes dang / grang bar 'du shes dang / dro bar 'drashes dang / bkres par 'du shes dang / zas su 'du shes dang /
231b5(mdo): 'du shes dang / btung bar 'du shes dang / gos su 'du shes yidal gyi byed pa dang / stobs bcu 'du shes pa yid la myi byed cing / 'du shes thams cad yid la myi byed par sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par
231b6(mdo): pa dad pa la mngon tu byas te brtson 'grus 'tsham mo// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par ba rad pa de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams te/ des brtson 'grus pa tshams na sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa mngon tu/
231b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha dad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
231b8(mdo): nu byed pa'i bar du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des de bzhin du bstand cing gtams nas/ des 'du shes thams cad yid la ma byas te/ sgrib pa rkyed
231b9(mdo): pa'i rnam par tha rad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad kyi bar tu brtson 'grus brtsams nas spyod do// de nas bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad 'das pa dang / de sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la rab tu gnas
232a1(mdo): par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcus nges par byung ste/ des sprul pa khrag khrig tshad myed pa mngon par sprul nas/ lha la dad pa rnams la lhar mngon par srul da/ klu la dad pa rnams la klur/ gnod
232a2(mdo): sbyin la dad pa rnams la gnod sbyin du/ dri za la dad pa rnams la dri zar/ grul bum la dad pa rnams la grul bum du/ lha ma yin la dad pa rnams la lha ma yin du/ nam mkha' lding la dad pa rnams la nam mkha' lding du/
232a3(mdo): myi 'am ci la dad pa rnams la myi 'am cing / lto 'phye chen po la dad pa rnams la lto 'phye chen por mngon par sprul to// de ltar dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can sprul pa ji lta bu la
232a4(mdo): dad pa bzhin du rgyun myi 'chad par mngon par sprul te/ des sems can chad byed pa rnams su yongs su smyin par byed pa'i sbyor bas/ myur du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa rdzogs par gyur to//
232a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ rgyas bzang po'i lha des/ dge slong mos pa'i blo gros de batshoma' glus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par mkhyend nas/
232a6(mdo): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol/
232a7(mdo): tu phyind pa shi nad tu bsngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha des/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis de yang dag par dga' bar byas/ yang dag par 'dzinang du bcug/ yang dag par gan
232a8(mdo): bstod/ yang dag par rab tu mgu bar byas nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs 'di lta bu rnyed de de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs kyis nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags
232a9(mdo): te 'dug go// 'jam dpal de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros par snang la 'dug nas 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes rnyed de/ gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed pa rnams su sangs rgyas
232b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dam na ni bzheshes/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa shes so// des ye shes/
232b2(mdo): de brnyed nas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang gyod pa la the tsom myed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyi sngon spyod pa la'ang the tsom byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la brtson 'grus kyi pha ro/
232b3(mdo): tu phyi nad pa dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis mngon par bstod do// stobs bcu stobs 'chang stobs rab stobs 'chang ba// nor mang bgyid cing sras rnams nor ldan mdzad// bde gshegs khyod kyis
232b4(mdo): sras rnams nor yang rnyed/ 'gro 'di shi nad tu sug bsngal nor ldan mdzadu// bde gshegs khyod kyi nor rnams gtor cing gos// rgyal ba khyo da kyi sras mchog nor rnyed nas// dga' zhing 'gro la sman pa'i spyod/
232b5(mdo): mchog spong // rgyal mchog rgyal ba dag dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ khub mchog khyod sras yon tan rgyas ldan pa// srung ba dam pa'i mchog 'dir rnam spyod pa// skye bar nub cing rga shis gces pa dang
232b6(mdo): 'gro ba sug bsngal brgya ldan gzigs pa rnams// sug bsngal bdag myed stong par rtog pas na// shi 'phom 'gror mchis 'khor ba'i 'gror chags pa// mthong nas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bder dgod ce
232b7(mdo): de dag ming rje rlabs chen rnyed par 'gyur// 'gro la sman sems snying rje bskyed nas su// 'khor ba'i sred pa bcom yang skye ba 'dzin// dge 'chad myed rnams kyang dran sgrogs shing // 'gro ba rnams la sman pa de zhi ma
232b8(mdo): bgyid// log pa'i lam mchis sems can stong rnams ni// stobs bcus bstan pa'i lam mchog rnams su ste// zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi ba de dge bar// gang nas sngon gi rang 'byung gshegs par 'god// de dag gtong
232b9(mdo): ba chad myed gtong ba ni// 'go lag myig bzang bu sug de bzhin te/ tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus ting nge 'dzin// bos dran mkhas shing mos dang stobs la gnas// shing dbang drung du bdud ste bcas pa btul/
233a1(mdo): dpe byed ye shes ko 'phang mchog der ched// rang byung sems can po phan pa kyid nas su// gyi 'chi 'byung zhing bde ba zhi bar gshegs// nam mkha' 'di la de ring bdag mtshos nas/
233a2(mdo): phyogs bcu stobs bcu ma nor de bzhin gsung // rgyal sras rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod spyad la// shi nad tu sung bston pa ni du ma mthong // de dag rang gi spyod thos dga' mgu ste// rab tu mdzum mul yid
233a3(mdo): gnyis the tsom bral// thal mo sbyar te mngon par lus btud nas/ stobs bcu yon tan mnga' ba mkha' las stod// di ri ri nam mkha' 'dir mchis bdag gis mthong // 'khor ba brgyar ni rgyal sras dge
233a4(mdo): spyad nas// dga' ldan lha'i gnA nas 'chi 'phos te// dri bra la drape myed glang chen mchog gyur da nas// lha'i gnas nas rab tu 'das nas su// yum bde nyal ba'i lhums su zhugs pa la/
233a5(mdo): lha rnams stong gis shin tu rab mchod cing // wa gyil mo// rnams kyis gcod bgyis bstod// de dag yus gi yum/ sa su zhugs pa na// kwa'i gnas 'dra rab tu mdzes pa
233a6(mdo): gyu rad// maral gyis kyi gos chu las pad ma ltar// yu ma las bde zhing yang bar gnas nas su/ lha rnams brgya la rab tu chos bshad de// lha mchog 'khor rnams
233a7(mdo): dge ba'i lam du bcud// de dag chos tshig rgya chen pom nas su// skom pas tshu la sa bzhin btud che 'jung // nam mkha'i ros 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni// rgyal sras dri myed blo gros
233a8(mdo): dran mkhas pa// sus kyi phyag kyis zhing kyi yal ga bzung // mtshan khung nas ni byung ba rab tu mthong // lha dang mye'i dbang pos rab mchod cing // sa'i steng na 'jigs myer gom par 'dor/
233a9(mdo): de yis thams cad phyogs su bltas nas su// 'dzum mul tshig sbas pa 'dra 'ams gsum myed// nam mkha'o ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni// rgyal sras mang po 'gro la sman dka' ba/
233b1(mdo): grong dang grong khyer rin cen bltam pa'i// rab tu 'byor da cing ldan pa'i sa bon te// ba lang rmig pas bcings pa bcad pa ltar// blo gros mchog kyis khyim chags brtsal bcom ste// 'gro la sman/
233b2(mdo): srad dpa' bo mngon par byung // sdug bsngal zhi zhing srid zad bdud rtsi tshol// nam mkha'i ros 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni// rgyal sras brtul zhugs dka' bub dran spyad de// skyil mo krung bcas
233b3(mdo): byang chub shing dbang drung // g.yo can bdud 'dul byang chub dam pa reg/ rgyal ba thams cad dang ni mnyam rnyed nas// zhi dga' bde gnas shing mchog lha bzhin du// smon lam rgya chen bdag gyis
233b4(mdo): 'dir rdzogs te// 'khor brgyar legs spyad brtul zhugs 'di 'grub bo// nam mkha'i ngos 'dir bdag mchis mthong ba ni// phyogs bcu'i stobs bcu shin tu mang po dag/ 'khor lo rgya chen ra
233b5(mdo): tu bskor ba ni// pha rol da rgol 'dul 'khor ba'i sdug bsnga/ la zhi// bsal yod 'gro ba rnams kyi nyon mongs bcom// mun pa bdul bsngal 'gro rnams bde ba sbyin// 'jig
233b6(mdo): rten gtso bo rnams kyis de bos nas// 'khor ba'i rgyun pa sal ma song phyogs su song // de ring nam mkha' 'di la bdag mchis nas// rgyal ba brgya dag lha'i 'khor 'dul
233b7(mdo): shing // lA myi gnas na 'gro la snying rje yid// 'jig rten dag na rab tu zhugs par mthong // rgyal ba brgya phrag du ma gzhan dag kyang // 'khor 'ang song zhi bar rdul myed gnas// lA myi brgya rnams
233b8(mdo): yid dkar gyur nas su// ring srel dam pa de la mchod par mthong // 'jig rten gtso bo rkang gnyis mchog khyod la// lha dang myi dang khyim bdag khyod drung mchis// zhal nas zhi bar chos kyi rang bzhin thos
233b9(mdo): khyod kyi spyod ldan myur du skyabs su 'gro// myi dbang khyod kyi yon tan yang dag bstod// khrud mchog pan byed stobs bcu yon tan 'chang // zhi bar ldan zhing dul ba zhi ba rnyed// 'khor ba'i rgyud bral 'jin
234a1(mdo): myed phyogs su song // bde gshegs myi'i seng ge khyod kyi mthus/ blo mchog khyod kyang steng gi mkhar gnas pa// mngon shes lnga las nyams pa myed rnyed nas// phyogs bcur 'khor
234a2(mdo): brgyad rab 'byam nam mang ba// mtshungs myed du ma de ring mthong ba ni// rgyal ba'i yon tan sna tshogs dri myed spyod// yang dag yon tan gis ni de dag bstod// rgyal ba'i khyod kyi yon tan mtha' myi rnyed/
234a3(mdo): de nas dge slong mos pa'i blo gros des/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i lha de la/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyin cad bskalang pa brjod du myed
234a4(mdo): par nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang bral bar ma gyur te// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyurd pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na/ sems cad dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
234a5(mdo): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten spongs par byas/ lha ma yin ni/ ris thams cad yongs su chad cing myi khom pa thams cad rgyunachar par gyur to// de smon lam gi dbang kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
234a6(mdo): der yang dang yang skyes pa na/ sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas thog mar byung ba bzhin du shi nad tu shes te/ gang dang gar du skyes par gyu rad pa de dang der gang de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba de na
234a7(mdo): lhas byung ba de dag de skyes pa'i ltas su byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni ltas gang byung ba de dag kyang mngon par shes pa lnga thob nas byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo
234a8(mdo): bskor ba na/ ltas gang byung ba de dang des mngon par shes pa lnga bshad pa'i tshe'ang ltas de dag byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i 'du byed 'dor pa'i tshe yang bltas de dag byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
234a9(mdo): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe/ ltas gang byung ba de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ yang ltas de dag byung ngo // des tshe rabs re re la yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu myed pa theg pa chen po la btul
234b1(mdo): sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la btul lo// re shig ni byang chub sems dpa' des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
234b2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi bya ba de lta bu dag sems can rnams la bstan to// 'jam dpal de'i ma do'i dus na dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyu rang pa de gzhan zhig yin pa sam su dang be com ldan/
234b3(mdo): dpal khyod kyis de ltar gyi lha'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de'i tshe de'i nus ma/ dge slong mos pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to// 'jam dpal de la
234b4(mdo): na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag pa bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen pos / dge slong mos pa'i blo gros bcom grus kyi stobs gang dang ldan pas
234b5(mdo): bya rad pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan par bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po ni tshigs chung ngus sems mnyam par
234b6(mdo): gzhog par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus gi stobs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po la don las sems slar bsdud de/ dbang po'i don la'ang dbang
234b7(mdo): don gyi dmyigs shing / dbang po'i don ni dbang po'i don gi ngo bo nyid kyis spong bar mthong ngo // dbang po'i don dang dbang po'i mtshan ma yang myi dmyigs/ gang gis dbang po'i mtshan mar dmyigs pa na yang
234b8(mdo): dmyigs so// bam po gsum pa// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'dras pa'i dus na/ bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed/ bsam gyis rgya
234b9(mdo): khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed brjod du myed pa'i pha rold kyi yang ches pha rol na/ bdud rtsi'i snying po zhes bya ba'i skal pa byung ste/ 'jam dpal ga snying po'i skal pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
235a1(mdo): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na myed pa lnga dang myi rnams kyi stond pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
235a2(mdo): mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de byung ba'i tshe/ thams cad kyi thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bral bI
235a3(mdo): sma byung ro// gar sems can thams cad kyi sgra de yang stug bsngal dang / kun 'byung pa dang / 'gog pa dang / lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stond to// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon
235a4(mdo): pa de'i rim 'gro byed pa/ dge slong bstan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya pa zhig yod de/ don shes chos shes dus shes/ tshod shes bdag shes 'khor shes/ gang zag rab dang / za ma shes te/ de bzhin
235a5(mdo): gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnon pa de la/ bskal pa bye/ ba phrag dgu bcu'i yid du 'ong bas bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid/ tu myi 'ong bas ma yin no// des bshad pa rnams kyang bzung ste/
235a6(mdo): bdag gi don kyang myi gtong ngo // des bskal pa dgu bcu po de dag gi bar du 'dod pa'i 'du shes ma skyed/ gnod sems kyi 'du shes ma skyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed/ srog dang ldan pa
235a7(mdo): dang / gang zag dang ldan pa'i rtog pa ma skyed/ dngos po dang ldan pa'i yang ma yin/ chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang myi skyed/ gnod sems
235a8(mdo): kyi rnam par rtog pa yang ma yin/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa yang ma yin/ nye du la rtog pa yang ma yin/ nye du ma yin pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/ shes pa la rtog pa yang ma yin/ myi shes pa la rtog pa
235a9(mdo): yang ma yin/ ljongs la rtog pa yang ma yin/ myi dga' bar rtog pa yang ma skyed/ sems can dang ldan pa'i rtog pa yang ma skyed/ srog dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ gang zag dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ dngos po dang
235b1(mdo): ldan pa yang ma yin/ chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma myed pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ smon lam dang ldan pa yang ma yin/
235b2(mdo): sngon lam ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ 'khor ba dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ye shes dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ ye shes ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma
235b3(mdo): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo dang ldan pa yang ma yin//
235b4(mdo): so so'i skye bo ma yin pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa'ang ma bskyed de/ 'du shes thams cad dang bral bI
235b5(mdo): ting nge 'dzin bsgoms/ rtog pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ bsgoms nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 'das rnams la rnams kyang bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur
235b6(mdo): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du byed pa la bskyen bkur byas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de thams cad la des g.yog dang bsnyen bkur byas pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/
235b7(mdo): kyi ting nge 'dzin la bsnyen cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pa de'i phyin chad bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i bar du/ sangs rgyas myed pa'i zhing du nam yang ma skyes/ nams kyang zhing tu 'du shes dang / sangs rgyas su 'dra
235b8(mdo): shes kyang ma skyes/ nams kyang byang chub kyi sems rgyun tu myi 'byung bar ma gyur pa/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur dang g.yog byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
235b9(mdo): du sprul pas/ sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byas/ gang dang kang du sprul pa sprul pa de dang de na sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung ba snyam du shes te/ rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas sems can
236a1(mdo): de dag la stond to// gang dang gang du sprul pa spruld pa de dang der sems can ji lta bu la mos pa de lta bur sprul pa sprul te 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rgyu dang sbyar te/ rnam par 'dul gI/
236a2(mdo): phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sprul pa rnam pa du mar sprul to// sprul pa de dag kyis kyang gzhan yang sprul te bstand to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprulang pa mngon par sprul te/
236a3(mdo): sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa de dag kyis kyang sprul pa gzhan mngon par spruld pa de bzhin tu 'jam dpal dge slong bstan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis kyang sprul pa mngon par sprul te/ spruld pa de dag gis kyang
236a4(mdo): gzhan mngon par sprul to// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du se mas/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam
236a5(mdo): dpal khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad grub pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs zhes bya bar
236a6(mdo): gyurar to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na sgrib pa myed pa'i rnam par tha rad pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sten
236a7(mdo): par bya/ bsgom par bya mang du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'byung ngo // 'ja
236a8(mdo): dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa tshad myed grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab mtshungs pa myed/ gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa'i de'i pha rol gi yang ches pha rol na/ bskal pa'i snying
236a9(mdo): po zhes bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ bskal pa'i snying po'i bskal pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
236b1(mdo): 'jig rtend mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa lnga dang myi rnams kyi stond pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshungs pa myed pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
236b2(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa myed pa'i gzil brjid 'od de'i 'od kyis shar phyogs su gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sdang bar gyur du/ lho phyogs su gang ka'i klung
236b3(mdo): gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams snang bar gyurang / nub phyogs su 'gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snod kyi 'jig can gyi khams snang bar gyud/ byang phyogs su gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams
236b4(mdo): sdang bar gyur/ de bzhin du shar lo dang / lo nub dang / nub kyang dang / byang shar dang / steng dang / 'og dang phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang / gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gi kham/
236b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa myed pa'i gzi' brjid 'o/ de'i 'od kyis sdang bar gyur to// sems can gang de'i 'od// kyis reg pa de dag thams cad/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
236b6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyurd to// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshungs pa myed pa'i gzi' brjid 'od do 'od 'jig rten gi khams na/ byang chub sems dpa' gar ga/
236b7(mdo): klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis phyir myi ldog pa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag phal cher bla na/
236b8(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can brjod du myed pa rnams theg pa gsum gyis rab tu 'god do// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
236b9(mdo): de na dge slong sprin gi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ 'jig rten gi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi mchog byed de/ des byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
237a1(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de dag gis dam pa'i chos dus dang po dang / bar ma dang / ba ma gsum du gzung ngo zhes de ltar smon la
237a2(mdo): btab po// 'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du so so'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
237a3(mdo): rgyas te/ sems can dpag tu myed cing brjod du myed pa rnams kyi don byas nas/ phung po'i lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
237a4(mdo): thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos dge slong sprin gi rgyal po des dus / ka ma dang tha ma gsum du bzung ngo // de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten du snyigs ma lnga byung ste/ sems can
237a5(mdo): bskal pa myed par gyur de nas/ dam pa'i chos nub pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i phyi rol kyi drang srong mngon par she/ sa pa lnga dang ldan par gyur da te/ de bstan chos kag 'jig
237a6(mdo): rten gi don du 'gyur ba chos dang ldan pa de khong tu chud mas rab tu ston pa 'di lta ste/ snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / nges brjod gi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin gi rig byed dang / srid srung gi
237a7(mdo): rig byed dang / swa'i bstan chos rnams dang / gtan tshigs gi bstan bcos rnams dang / gso' ba'i bstan chos rnams dang / nor sbyar dang dug dang / sngags dang sman gri rgyud dang / dus 'khor ba dang /
