280a3(mdo): brjod pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/ brjod pa tsam las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brjod pa tsam ste/
280a4(mdo): brjod pa tsam las rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyim das byin 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar bklas pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa kan/
280a5(mdo): ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs kyang 'di ltar btags pa tsam ste/ btags pa cas las gzugs gzhan ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang 'di ltar btag
280a6(mdo): pa tsam ste/ btags pa tsam las tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye da dang / rnam par shes pa gzhan ma yin no// nya mes byin 'di lta ste de per na/ nam mkha' la bris pa ni 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du
280a7(mdo): shes tsam las nam mkhal la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar 'du shes tsam ste/ 'du shes las gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas/
280a8(mdo): byi 'di ste ste dper na/ nam mkha' sa bris pa'i brda tsam ste/ brda tsam las nam mkha' la bris pa gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du/ gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang 'di ltar brda tsam ste/ brda tsam las gzugs nas/
280a9(mdo): rnam par shes pa'i bar du gzhan ma yin no// nyi mas byin 'di lta ste dper na/ che ga gag gis nam mkha' la bris pa brjod pa'i tshig ni don dam par myi dmyigs pa de bzhin du 'di ste ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
280b1(mdo): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i chos de dag kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang ma dmyigs/ ma byon pa dang da ltar gi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang ma dmyigs/ nyi mas byin ye shes de rtogs par bya ba'i/
280b2(mdo): phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sngon byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa spyod pa na/ sdug cing 'phangs pa dngos po thams cad yongs su btang yang zhum par myi 'gyur te/ gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten rtogs
280b3(mdo): par myi blta'o// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'jig rten gi grangs su myi 'gro'o// kang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni gdakas par bya ba ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs
280b4(mdo): par sangs ma rgyas te// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba las bskyod pa ma yin no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i chos can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yang ma /
280b5(mdo): no// gang ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cho sa can ma yin no// rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no// ka ye shes 'di la gnas pa de dag ni zhi bar spyod pa yang ma yin
280b6(mdo): ma zhi bar pyod pa yang ma yin no// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyims byed skyes bu dam pa grags byin kis bshad pa la/ legs so shin tu bstod de rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas yang
280b7(mdo): skyes bu dam pa bcu gnyis po de dag gis bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi ma byin de rab tu dka' bar bya ba'i phyir bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu nyi mas byin de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos
280b8(mdo): zab mo 'di zos kyang ma skraka skrag par ma gyurd/ shin tu smag par ma gyur da/ ma myos myos par ma gyur pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kang brlab par bya ba'i sa ni 'di yin no// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi
280b9(mdo): mas byin zab mo gos pa myed pa'i chos bstand pa 'di thos nA/ tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas rab tu dka' ste/ dka' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo mthar phyind par gyur da to// bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o//
281a1(mdo): de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin dang skyes bu dam pa bcu gcig po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka' mchog ces bya ba de ka la ba der dong ste phyin nas/
281a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas skyes bu dam pa grags byin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsold to// zhi
281a3(mdo): ba'i dbyings la rab tu zhugs tshul rnams la mkhas pa 'dren pa rnams ni legs so legs so// gang gis myi mchog shin tu mthong 'gyur ba// de ni myi rnams dam pa bstan du gsol // 'jig rten mkhas pas bstan pa thos nas su//
281a4(mdo): byang chub mchog la myi rnams rab tu 'jug/ gang thob drang srong chen por 'gyur ba dag/ tshul de srog chags rnams la sman srad gsungs// bde gshegs bdag gi rigs la gnas nas su// thub pa sangs rgyas ye shes mngon
281a5(mdo): bar stong // rgyal bas de yid rab tu dka' bar mdzad// de dag zos na/ sa shin tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba bdag gis ci tsam 'tshal pa nas// 'dren pa bdag gis chos rnams bshad lags te// ston pas ji/
281a6(mdo): ltar chos rnams kun mkhyend pa// 'dren pas legs par ma lus bas+t+ra na du gsol da// de la dga' mchog 'jig rten 'dren pa'is// rgyal sras spyod pa gang la spyod pas na// myi'i gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur ba
281a7(mdo): li// sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus nges par bstan// thams cad chos shes bya ba mtshan nyid gcig// mtshan nyid bral zhing mtshan nyid myed pa ste// zhi bar myed myi g.yo yon tan myed// spros pa myed cing zhi ba 'tsho ba myed//
281a8(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba stong // dngos po nyid myed ci yang myed pa ste// 'di ni bstan pas ma yin ston pa myed// bshad pa myed cing 'chad par byed pa myed// tshor ba ma yin tshor ba po yang myed// shes pa ma yin shes
281a9(mdo): par byed pa 'ang myed// su la'ang ma yin kang gis kyang myin te// 'ang dag ma byas byed du bcug pa'ang myed// sus kyang blang ba myed cing btang la'ang myed// sus kyang bsgrags pa myed la thos pa'ang myed// sus kyang mya shes
281b1(mdo): rnam par shes pa 'ang myed// 'di dag dngos por sus kyang mthong ba myed// 'di ni zhi ba ma yin rgod para'ang myin// zhi bar myi byed zhi bar byas pa'ang myed// byed pa ma yin byed pa myed ma yin// sems pa myed cing tshor bar byed pa 'ang
281b2(mdo): myed// 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas pa'ang ma yin// 'pho ba ma yin myi 'pho ba'ang ma yin// 'ongs pa myed cing 'gro ba yod pa ma yin// 'di na kun tu myi 'chi skye ba myed// skye ba myed cing skyed pa'ang ma yin te// 'di ni
281b3(mdo): 'gags pa myed la 'gags pa'ang myin// 'di ni bstan pa myed cing bshig pa 'ang myed// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams shig pa'ang myed// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams shes par gis// 'dren pa bde gshegs gang 'das pa
281b4(mdo): de dag gis kyang tshul 'di rab tu bstan// 'dren pa sangs rgyas ma byo na 'byung ba rnams// de dag kyang ni tshul 'di 'chad par 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa da ltar gang byung ba// rgyal ba de dag kun kyang tshul
281b5(mdo): 'di ston// chos nyid 'di dag rab tu shes pa'i// byang chub sems dpal 'jigs pa 'gyur// zhi ba'i sa yang rab tu shes 'gyur te/ mkhas par shes par dka' ba rab tu bstan// rgyal ba'i thugs
281b6(mdo): sras ji tsam shes pa dag/ 'gro ba gces pa 'dis mya ngan myed/ de las snying rje bla na myed pa skye// 'gro ba kun la byams par shin tu kan sa// stong pa nyid la gnas par gyur da pas na// rgyal ba'i bstan
281b7(mdo): pa dag la the tsom myed// mtshan ma myed par gnas par gyu rad pas na// de la smon lam 'debs pa'ang yod myed de// rlung rnams nam ka dka la myi thogs bzhin// dpa' bo de yang 'gro bar mya chags so// bskal/
281b8(mdo): pa mang por bye bar kun 'khor zhing // sems can bye ba mang la ston par byed// kun tu kun nas nyon mongs myi 'gyur te// de ni byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya nus// gal te bdud kyis sangs rgyas bye bstan te// de dag
281b9(mdo): nyan thos kyis shes sman yang // ngas ni chos nyid yang dag rab rtogs te// khyod ni 'dren pa myin zhes de smra'o// dri ma myed pa'i ye shes myig sbyangs te// bdag ni the tsom ma lus rnam par bya // stong par bdag ni gzhan /
282a1(mdo): dring myi 'jog/ khyod ni gang zag mchog myin par dengs shing // de ltar rgyal bas chos nyid bstand pas na// kang la 'dren pa'i sras po rnams gnas la// bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis thub dka' ste/
282a2(mdo): ji ltar ri bo bskyod par myi nus bzhin// de nas bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dka' mchog de las stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshi kris su bcad pa de dag
282a3(mdo): thos nas pa 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bo'i shugs thob ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu thob pas ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams dpag tu myed pa dag na/ byang chub
282a4(mdo): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag dpag tu myed pa rnams thabs mkhas pa rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub yang dag par sgrub pa mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrag dpag tu myed pa rnams dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos
282a5(mdo): te/ yum gi sdums su zhugs pa yang mthong // byang chub sems dang / 'bye ba dpag tu myed pa rnams lnga 'bum gyis mchod cing yum ki rum du 'gro ba yang mthong // byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
282a6(mdo): dpag tu myed pa rnams btsas nas/ gom par bdun por bar yang ma thob/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa rnams mngon par 'byung ba yang mthong / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
282a7(mdo): rnams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang mthong / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrag dpag tu myed pa rnams la/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
282a8(mdo): 'das dpag tu myed pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu myed pa rnams pyod lam dpag tu myed pas sems can rnams 'dul ba yang mthong / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
282a9(mdo): dpag tu myed pa rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na phung po lhag ma myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 'das pa yang mthong ngo // de nas bram ze'i re zhes shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin par snang la
282b1(mdo): 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dka' mchog de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ segs so legs so rkang gnyis kun gyi mchog/ 'dren pa khyod kyis 'di dag chos bstan pa// bar snang gnas/
282b2(mdo): kyi bya'i rjes bzhin du// dngos bral mtshungs myed ci yang ma lags pa// mtshan ma ma mchis nam mkhar bris pa bzhin// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas chos bstan to// sprul pa dag gis ji ltar gzhan yul bzhin// yang dag tu na rgya/
282b3(mdo): bas bstan ma mchis// sos ka'i dus kyi smyig rgyu ji bzhin du// sdang yang yang dag par ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin 'de bar gshegs pas chos bstan to// ston bkang lags de yang de dang 'dra// sngan chad the tsom nem nur kAng
282b4(mdo): byung ba// de yang 'dren pa drung du bral gyur te// bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang rig/ 'gro ba krol mdzad rnam par 'dren par dka/ stobs bcu dag gis bsgrubs pa ci 'dra bar// rgyal ba'i zhing
282b5(mdo): mchog bzang por sbyang bar gyis// sangs rgyas rgyas pa rkang gnyis ka/ nor gyur da te// skye bo ma rtogs rab tu rtogs par bgyi// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba'i 'gro ba rnams// gnas dang skyabs dang rten kyang
282b6(mdo): ma gyur to// thams cad zis kyis gnon pa 'ang ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i myig ces bya bar gyur da pa gzhan zhig yin snyam du 'dzin na de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
282b7(mdo): sems dpa' ded dpon bzang po de'i tshe de'i dus ma/ rigs kyi bu tshangs pa'i myig ces bya bar gyur to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang rigs kyi bu nges pa zhes bya bar gyu ra pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' myes byan no// gang de'i tshe re/
282b8(mdo): dus na// rigs kyi bu blo gros 'tshang zhes bya bar gyurd pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang rigs kyi bu kun tu mdzes par gyu da pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin no// de'i tshe
282b9(mdo): de'i dus ma/ rigs kyi bu spobs pa mtha' yas su gyur pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chu'i lA yan no// thams cad zil kyis gnon pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs shings la chen po lta bu'i bu
283a1(mdo): nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur da pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs
283a2(mdo): shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu nyi mas byin zhes bya bar gyur da to// thams cad zil kyis gnon pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gi dring la myi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis myi bkri bar 'dod
283a3(mdo): pa dang / gzhan ka ngor myi lta bar 'dod na chos kyi dbyings la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya/ 'grogs par bya/ bsnyen bkur bar bya'o// chos zab mo nyan pa'i phyir yongasu
283a4(mdo): 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can du bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stobs bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings la
283a5(mdo): zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zil kyis gnon pa 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la da/ ge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed
283a6(mdo): cig sa yongs su zhu ba zhus lags de skad ces gsolang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ce sa bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
283a7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams kyis dang / rtsa dang shing dang / yas ka dang / som rnams nus ma rab tu byas kyang bgrang ba nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zild kyis gnon pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
283a8(mdo): de dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi dbyings su yongs su zhugs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / thabs mkhas pas 'jug pa yongs su
283a9(mdo): dris pa ni bgrang bar myi nus so// 'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs myed dpag tu myed/ bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed gzhal du myed/ brjod du myed pa la pha rol gi ya
283b1(mdo): ches pha rol na// zhi ba'i phung po'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad myed par yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par/ de bzhin gshegs/
283b2(mdo): pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa lha dang myi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig
283b3(mdo): rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang dge slong dpa' sras zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa yang zhungs pa/ bye ba phrag phyed pa/ rtogs pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin can zhig byung ste/
283b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyas mtshan des rim gror byed par gyur to// des de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan de la lo bye ba khrag khrog
283b5(mdo): bcu'i bar du shin tu gus par byas ste/ bshad pa'i rnams kyang gzung sa su 'dzin cing rang gi don kyang myi gtong ste/ des de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa la lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya bcu'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa
283b6(mdo): nyid kyi sems kyis rim gro byas ste/ de'i dge ba'i rdza bas sngas rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa rnams mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rim gror byed par gyur te/ de bzhin
283b7(mdo): gshegs pa de dag la 'ang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis log ma dang / bar dang 'a mar dus gsum du bstan pa'i yongs su gzung bar gyur to/
283b8(mdo): de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i bas yang pa de la sangs rgyas phras dgu bcu byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' des yang mnyes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
283b9(mdo): thams cad kyi rim gro byed pa de dag thams cad la yang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi seMs kyis rim grong byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thog ma dang / bar dang tha ma dus gsum du bstan pa'i rdzas
284a1(mdo): yongs su bzung ngo // de'i 'og tu zla 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
284a2(mdo): byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya bcur gyu rad to// de la yang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sa des bskayad pa bye ba brgya bcu 'a bar du yid du 'ong bas
284a3(mdo): bsnyen bkur byas te/ yid du myi 'ong bas ma yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des bskal pa brgyad cu'i bar du ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha'
284a4(mdo): la bris pa lta bur chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa bstan to// bskal pa bye ba brgya bcu'i bar du chos thams cad ni mkha' la bris pa lta bur bstan te/ dpa' sra 'byung ba chen po gzhan du gyur kyang srid kyi/ ni mkha' la bris pa lta bu'i
284a5(mdo): chos thams cad ni cung zad kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba myed do// de nas byad chub sems dpa' dpa' sras chos kyi dbyings pa 'jug pa 'di thos de nas/ 'di lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs thob pas nam mkha' ya
284a6(mdo): ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
284a7(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar mthong kha cig ni bla na myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor/ kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul kye cho 'phrul zhi pa du mas sems can rnams 'dul/ kha cig ni tshe 'di'i 'du byed 'dor/ kha cig ni phung po'i sgeg ma myed pa'i mya ngan las
284a8(mdo): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po de la zab mo'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// zhi ba byang chub
284a9(mdo): mtshungs myed btsal slad du// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'das pa bye ba stong la// shin tu gus pa chen po bskyed nas su// sngon gi 'dren pa dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis// sems ni nams kyang gzhan du ma bsams te//
284b1(mdo): rtag par yid ni stong pa nyid la bzhag/ chos rnams stong par bde bar gshegs pas bstan// de dag chos kyang yid kyis na par bsams// bdag tu sba ba myi gang myi mkhas pa// mu stegs can kun bdag gis zil gyis mnan/
284b2(mdo): chos rnams thams cad chu'i zla ba bzhin// de la bdag ni the tsom cang ma mchis// myig 'di dam pa'i don tu sbyong bar ni// bde bar gshegs pa bshad pa thos nas rtogs// myig 'di myig mchis pa yang ma lags te/ 2
284b3(mdo): pa ma lags myi rnams 'dis bslang // nges par sna lcerna ba de bzhin te// lus kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mchis ma lags// de bzhin so sa dang sems dpal 'ang stong pa nyid// se sa ni bden zhing rab tu stong pa lags// gzug kyang gzum
284b4(mdo): kyis rna par bden zhing stong // sgra dang dri dang mo dang reg kyang stong // chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid stong ste// skye mched de dag ngo bo nyid kyis stong de bzhin mkhas kyang mkhas rnams nyid kyis stong // dbang po 'dri yid
284b5(mdo): ngo bo nyid kyis stong // bden pa 'dra bden pas de bzhin stong pa ste// 'di sa 'jungs pa ma lags 'gro ba rnams kyang bslang // gang na' nga stong par rig par ma mchis par// na mkhal bar snang bya ba'i rjes dang
284b6(mdo): mtshungs / ga na'ang ngo bo nyid na ma mchis pa// de ni nams kyang ke/ zhan gi rgyur myi 'gyur// gang gi ngo bo nyid ni myi rnyed pa// rang bzhin de myed ji ltar gzhan gi rkyen// rang bzhin myed pa gzhan kas ci zhig skyed//
284b7(mdo): s+yA des bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa'o// thams cad chos kyang myi g.yol brtan par gnas// myi 'gyur gtse ba ma mchis zhi ba ste// ji ltar na mkha' rig pa ma mchis sbyar// des myi 'dzangs 'gro ba myos par 'gyur// ji ltar/
284b8(mdo): dri 'i ngas ni kyi sprul pa// de bzhin chos rnams teg tu bskyod kyi nus// 'chi 'pho ma mchis skye bam mangs pa'o// chos rnams de sar rgyas pas rabatu bstan// gang gis yang dag chos rnams nges rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba rdo 'dren bsnyen pa
284b9(mdo): blabyas// gang la 'di 'dra'i nan tan ma mchis pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyid mchod ma bgyis// gang gis tshul bzhin rab tu chos rtogs pa// des ni rgyal ba'i bde gshegs bkur bsti bgyis// de dag rgyal ba chos kyis mchod bgyis te// byang chub
285a1(mdo): dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgya yang // gang gis tshul bzhin chos rnams rab rtogs pa// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyang 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa nges bzung ste// byang chub dam pa mchog tu 'tshang yang rgya
285a2(mdo): rgyal ba brgya yis stong pa nyid bshad de// byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrag rnams kyis bzung // bde bar gshegs pa'i yul 'dir byang chub phyir// de la mkhas pa the tsom gzhar myi 'byung // bde bar gshegs pas chos rnams gang bstan pa/
285a3(mdo): chos nyid de ni de ring bdag gis 'tshal da// 'dren pa myi rnams kyi yang mchog tu 'gyur// shin tu sdug bsngal skye bo rnam par dgros// 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni rig pas na// bdag gis de ring chos kyi yab la mchod// kang skad mya'i gi tso
285a4(mdo): bo khyod 'phags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su mchi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pa dkon mchog mkhas pa'i rgyal po la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/
285a5(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang gzugs dang zhe gnas dang / shes rab kyis sems can thams cad zild kyis mnan to// 'jam dpal
285a6(mdo): de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras gyur da pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad zi lad kyis mnon pa de'i tshe de'i dus
285a7(mdo): na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sras zhes bya ba gyur to// de lta bas na 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pas/ stong pa nyid rnam par thard
285a8(mdo): pa'i sgo la bslab par bya'o// de la slob pa'i tshe'ang sems gang la'ang mya chags myi thogs te/ de'i sems ma chags shing / thogs pa myed pas bya ba gang dang gang la dmyigs pa de dang de yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// 'jam
285a9(mdo): dpal nga stong pa 'di la slob pa na ye shes ji lta bu rab tu thob pas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du 'gyur zhing gar 'dod pa der 'gyur ba'i ye shes de lta bu rab tu thob bo// 'jam dpal shar kya phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
285b1(mdo): bcu 'das pa na// rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhugs 'chang zhes bya bar shes so// 'ja
285b2(mdo): dpal sha rad kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing bco brgyad 'das pa na/ rin chen yod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ den pas sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag pa'i spyan zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam
285b3(mdo): dpal gar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug bcu 'dras pa na/ bge ba bsngags shes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sod de/ den pas sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pan
285b4(mdo): sangs rgyas don thams cad sems dpa' zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya 'das pa na/ bye ru rtsa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis
285b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa gser ka phung po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kye phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa a phrag kanyis 'das pa na/ gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams yod de/
285b6(mdo): de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal kyi snying po zhes bya b.rashes so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'odadi nis shar phyogs
285b7(mdo): ge phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi 'di stong brgyad brgya 'das pa na/ zhib spyod ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs
285b8(mdo): rgyas dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpalags kyi phyogs char spangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum 'das pa na/ sprin gyi 'dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de
285b9(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar da kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhab su brgya la
286a1(mdo): pa na/ yid du 'ong ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ga khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so//
286a2(mdo): 'jam dpal shar da kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing su khri brgya stong 'das pa na/ me long kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bon
286a3(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgyad cu 'das pa na zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jug
286a4(mdo): rten gyi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rga shi 'jom pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
286a5(mdo): bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'das pa na/ dus las 'das shes bya ba'i 'jig rte/ na gyi khams yod de/ de na pal sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin ka/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge sbyong
286a6(mdo): rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kya phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa ni tshe mnyam zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ den pa la sems
286a7(mdo): can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char 'jig rten gi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa phrag
286a8(mdo): sum bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ zhi ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros zhig pa zhes
286a9(mdo): bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sha rad kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten khams 'das pa na/ ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems
286b1(mdo): can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs rin cen bkod pa zhes bya ba zhes so// 'jam dpal gar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham/
286b2(mdo): 'das pa na/ rin po che kun tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par thogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi'i brjid 'phags
286b3(mdo): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du byed pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten ki khams 'das pa na/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i 'jig
286b4(mdo): ten ki zhams yod de/ de na ngas sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtul zhugs yud ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs/
286b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bco brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ yid grub ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin ka sheH/
286b6(mdo): pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug phud rgyapo zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kye zhing brjod du myed pa nyi shu ma lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
286b7(mdo): kyi 'das pa nA/ nges par song zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten 'ams yod de/ de na phal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcol yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsug pud 'byung zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam
286b8(mdo): dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa nyi shum lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ grong rdal zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ga khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin
286b9(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa su bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig
287a1(mdo): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ bde ba'i dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ki khams yod de/ de na ngal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnas myed
287a2(mdo): par pyod ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa/ sum bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten
287a3(mdo): khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs kyi char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed
287a4(mdo): pa su bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'das pa na/ tsam pa'i kha dog ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
287a5(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags pa lta zhes/ bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi/ zhing brjod du myed pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
287a6(mdo): gyi khams 'das pa na/ lhas sprul pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khe mas yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya gnas pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs
287a7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas zhing brjod du myed pa bzhi bcu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshes/
287a8(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bdun cu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
287a9(mdo): 'das pa na ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa
287b1(mdo): bdun cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'das pa na/ gser du snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ki khams yod de/ de na pal sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa myi rtag gzi' brjid rgyal po
287b2(mdo): zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char gser gyis rab tu brgyan ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gso ba byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'dza
287b3(mdo): dpal shard kyi phyogs char gser gyi gtsug ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams sod de/ den nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs dri ma sbyangs shes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char
287b4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyi
287b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba mashes so// 'jam dpal zhar gyi phyogs char snang ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi las yod de/ de nang la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
287b6(mdo): dpal rtsegs zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar da kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa su nu rtsa gcig gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dras pa na/ grags can zhes bya
287b7(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na du la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'dzad pal shar gyi phyogs cham sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa/ su rba rtsa
287b8(mdo): rdus phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ gzi brjid can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin ga shegs pa b+h+yo kro 'dzin ces bya ba shes so// 'jam dpa
287b9(mdo): sharang kyi phyogs cham sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du sred pa su Tam drug bcu'i drus phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tshangs pa 'byung zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can nas
288a1(mdo): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa sum bcu rtsa bdun gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
288a2(mdo): 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgyal po zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
288a3(mdo): gar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa su bcu rtsa brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhi ba 'das pa na/ rin cen sgo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis
288a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten slob dpon zhes bya bar shes so// 'dzad pa/ la shar gyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa su bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na
288a5(mdo): rin po che'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de nang / la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal sha rad kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas
288a6(mdo): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa/ sum bcu'i rdzu ya phra rab kyi rdus snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ rin cen rtog shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ki khams yod de/ de dang
288a7(mdo): la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sa dang mnyam pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'dza dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa/ su bcu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
288a8(mdo): 'das pa na/ shin tu mdzes shes bya ba'i 'jig rten ga khams yod de/ de na da la yang sems can rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa don thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'dza dpal shar kyi phyogs
288a9(mdo): char sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa su bcu rtsa sde'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ tsan dan gi dri zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gi khams yod de/ de na nga la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
288b1(mdo): pa mtha' yas snang ba zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam dpal shar kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa bzhi bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ zi lad
288b2(mdo): kyis mya non pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten ka khams yod de/ de na pa la sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar shes so// 'jam
288b3(mdo): dpal de lta bu'i rnam grangs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ nga la sems can gyis mying tha dad par shes pa'i brjod du myed pa'i bskal pa smras kyang shar kyi phyogs cha'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
288b4(mdo): gi mtha' rtogs par myi nus so// de bzhin du phyogs cha thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing pang la sems can rnams kyis mying tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par shes pa yang brjod du myed pa'i skal bar smras kyang / sangs
288b5(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i mtha' bde bar mya rig go// 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba rnams kyis nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa thos na myos par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub
288b6(mdo): sems dpa' gag theg pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / theg/ pa 'di la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu ma ku bar byas pa de dag kyang 'jam dpal nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
288b7(mdo): tshad myed pa thos na/ the tsom skye bar 'gyur na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / de ma yin pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/ 'adz+ra dpal ngas mngon par shes pa 'das//
288b8(mdo): pISh+Ta na skal pa dpag tu myed grangs myed/ bas kyis mya khyab pa'i de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ yon tan rab tu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten khams na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
288b9(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ nga ni bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas shes bya bar gyur da to// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas
289a1(mdo): de yang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig brgyad bcus yongs su bskor par gyur da/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa dpag tu myed pa la yang
289a2(mdo): dag par zhugs pa nas/ theg pa brjod du myed pa'i bar la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de'i rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs
289a3(mdo): su dag pa 'chad de/ pa yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas de la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas ngas de'i
289a4(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su dag pa zos nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bas kyang shin tu rgya che ba de 'dra bar gyur cig/ ces de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba
289a5(mdo): thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher yongs su dag par bya ba'i// phyir sngos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus// mtha' yas des bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang
289a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongasasu dag par lung bstan mod kyi/ 'o na kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed pa yong su dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma
289a7(mdo): btang bar gyur da nas/ de ltar ngas de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad myed pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de'i dge ba'i brtsa ba bstsags pas nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing / rgya cher yongasu dag par bla na myed pa
289a8(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brjod kyis myi lang 'khor ba na bsam gyis myi khyab 'das
289a9(mdo): pa'i dus// sangs rgyas zhing ki brgya bskyed phyir// de na pa'i sa brtson 'grus brtsams// brtson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba// gang zag mtshungs pa myed pa byung // sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul// lhar bcas
289b1(mdo): 'jig rten rnams la ston/ sangs rgyas chos la dbang byed cing // stobs rnams kyi sang la ro srid kyis myi 'jigs pa sa shin tu gnas// so so yang dag rig sa mkhas// gnas dang gnas sbyin dbang yang thob// las
289b2(mdo): dang ye shes rtogs par rig// las rnams yang dag 'dzin pa dang // na par sprin la the tsom myed// khams rnams du ma shes pa dang // na par 'dren pa shin tu ldan// sems can rnams kyi dad pa rnams// ma lus
289b3(mdo): yang dgra rab tu mkhyen// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yisi// rim pa bzhin du yang dag mkhyen// dbang po mchog dang tha ma rnams// ma lus par yang rab tu mkhyend// bsam gtan ye zhes rnam thar da dang // ting
289b4(mdo): 'dzin gi pha rol dpyid// snyoms par 'jug dang tshad myed la/ rkang gnyis dam pa shin tu bsrabs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting 'dzind// des ni mi mkhyen gang yang myed// thams cad mkhyen/
289b5(mdo): cing thams cad gzigs// gzigs pa la yang sgrib pa myed// de bzhin gshegs pa de la ngas sangs rgyas zhing na rgyu dris te/ sangs rgyas zhing kyi rgya che ba// bskal pa chen po bdag la gsungs
289b6(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs rnam par bya ba// ma lus yang dag rab tu mkhyen// gang rnams khyod kyis myi mkhyen pa// de 'dra'i chos ni yod ma mchis// sangs rgyas zhing ka skyon rnams dang // yon tan thams cad rab tu
289b7(mdo): mkhyen// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya che ba// rkang gnyis gtso bo bshad du gsol// sems can rnams kyi sbyin pa dang // ji ltar myi rnams 'tshang rgya ba// nyon mongs gang gis ston mongs pas// mya mkhas 'khor ba
289b8(mdo): rab tu 'khor// myi rnams kang gis ston spongs pa// nyon mongs de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// de'i lam dang bas ba rnams// 'dren pa khyod kyis rnam par mkhyend// ji ltar ting 'dzin 'byung ba dang // zung nas ji ltar
289b9(mdo): gnas pa dang // ji ltar de las snang ba rnams// ston pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// bas gtan rnams dang tshad myed pa// ji snyed ting nge 'dzin rnams dang // zhi gnas dang ni smig mthong rnams// na pa thams cad shin tu
290a1(mdo): mabye dang // jis chos ma drogs pa dang // klung gi rkyen gyis bshad pa yang // de yang ston pas rab mkhyen te// de la the tsom myi mang 'khyod// khyod kyis bskal pa byed spyod pas// ye shes 'di las
290a2(mdo): nges par byung // stod pas stobs kyi mgus bye rnyes// drang srong chen po stobs dang ldan// bskas pa stong phrag bye ba yi// bdag dang pha rol rnams kyi yang // myod pa dpag tu ma mchis shing // bsam gyis myi khyab
290a3(mdo): cad mkhyend// gang du byang chub ci 'dra ba// skye ba thams cad du yang 'jug/ de dag ma lus 'dren pa yis// ji lta bu yang rab tu mkhyen// kang du ji 'drar skye ba dang // gang du rigs kyang mi 'dra ba// ji ltar kun tu
290a4(mdo): spyad pa rnams// de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// tha ma'i chos rnas ci 'dra ba// 'dren pas 'khor ba de rnams kyang // 'gro ba ga/ dang du skye ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pas rab mkhyen pa// ci 'dra
290a5(mdo): ba'i ye shes kyis// sngan chad rna par lung bstand pa// mkhas pa// khyod kyis de mkhyend pa// de la the tsom myi mnga' khyod// tshul khrims gag dang cho ga gag/ ji 'dra'i spyod pa spyad pa dang /
290a6(mdo): ye shes kag la zhugs pa yang // de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen// kag dang gag gi las kyis su// skye ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam sbyin ci 'dra 'thob pa yang // de dag mgon pos rab tu mkhyen/
290a7(mdo): gdu gnas pa de dag gi rgyun tu mami ba blangs pa yang // de yang khyod kyis ma lus mkhyend// de skad yod gnyis kyi mapa khyod// gang gi lus kyis sems gag skyes// de yang khyod kyis rnam par mkhyen// se
290a8(mdo): rgyun keng lags pa// de yang 'dzin pas shin tum khyend// sngon chad gnas pa mnyend pa ni// khyod dang 'dra bar song ma mchis// sangs rgyas bye ba stod rnams dang // 'dren pa khyod ni de dang 'dra// srog chags po po yi dge ba rams
290a9(mdo): rjes sa dran pas rab tu ma khyen// desad pangs rgyam chos rnams la// 'dren pa'i rishes myigs kyi mngal/ gang dang gang gi lus kyis sa// 'i lta bu'i rgyan tum mi// de yang thams cad mkhyen pas mthe nang// de skad rgyas pas
290b1(mdo): // med pa marnamasarnams das/ da dmatsas pa gyis / bamapa das kyi spyod sus yang/ sangs rgyas can gyis rabadu gzigs/ skye bden 'tsha' pho mkhyenang/ khyod 'dra ba ni song gyis
290b2(mdo): spar bcas 'jig rten thams cad na/ thub pa khyod las lhag ma mchis/ zag pa zad pa'ang rab tu mkhyend/ ma lus pa yang rtogs par 'gyur/ nyon yongs thams cad yongs su spangs/ khyod kyis bag chags kun
290b3(mdo): kyang bcom sems can kun gyi nyon mongs dang / spyod pa rnams kyang 'dren pas mkhyen/ klang la nyon mongs spyod yul dang / nyon mongs 'di dag kar 'byung mkhyen da/ nyon mongs dag la khyad pas na/ bka chags
290b4(mdo): rjes su 'jug pa'i rnams// de dag kun kyang khyod mkhyen te/ de las khyod ni pha rol phyin da/ bdag dang gzhan pha rol rnams kyi yang nyon mongs gang gis spong ba'i/ lam de rnams ni rab tu mkhyen
290b5(mdo): de skad khyod ni lam la mkhas/ 'jig rten kun mgon rnam 'dren pa// mtha' yas brtson 'grus de stod nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khri// ga mtha' yas par 'gro gnyis su de skyes so// 'di nas lho ris
290b6(mdo): nga skyes te/ rtag par lha'i dbang por gyur da/ bye ba mtha' yas lnga rnam sa la/ rgyal ba'i ye shes thob par bstan/ lha'i gnas nas zha 'phos te/ myi'i dbang po rgyal por gyur da/ sems can khrag khrig
290b7(mdo): mtha' yas pa/ rgyal ba'i ye shes 'thob par bstan/ de dag pa sa chos thos nas/ sti steng mtshungs myed bskyed nas su// sems kyi thams cad nyer bzhag ste/ dri myed sems kyis de dag nyan/ sems can
290b8(mdo): bamatha' las pa/ byang chub mchog la nges par gyur na/ pa'i cig thos rtogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas byang chub nges par gyurd/ sangs rgyas bye ba mthal mas pa/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgya bshad kyang / bskal pa zhag zhin/
290b9(mdo): mtha' las su / rgyas bshad pa kyi 'ang do// sangs rgyas yon tan gang brjod pa/ drang srong chen pos shing bsngags pa// thams cad rang bzhin ston par bshad/ de dag ma skyes kyi 'gags bstan/ gang 'dings pas
291a1(mdo): rgyas bsngags pa dang / sangs rgyas yon tan gang bstan dang / bde bar gshegs pas zhing brjod pa/ kang gis bshad pa 'ang de dang 'dra// chos rnams zhi bar bde gshegs bshad/ zhi ba'i rang
291a2(mdo): bzhin de mya rnyed/ gang la bshad pa de yang stong / 'o la mgon myed 'gro ba myos/ de nas bram ze'i shings la chen po lta bu'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus
291a3(mdo): yas kyis tshegs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bud myed kyi dbang po las kyur da te/ de phyin chad bud myed kyi lus su mya skye bar gyurard to// 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
291a4(mdo): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed pa yongs su sbyang / bar 'dod cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rna
291a5(mdo): par tha rad pa'i stong pa nyid sgrib pa myed pa la bslab par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di tham/ sa cad rna pa drug du g.yos te/ 'akul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu
291a6(mdo): 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu lAM ga kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'uma'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem
291a7(mdo): rab tu chem tshem/ kun tu rab tu chemachem/ shar phyogs dma' na/ nub phyogs mtho'/ nub phyogs dma' na/ shar phyogs mtho'/ lho phyogs dma' na/ byang phyogs mtho'// byang phyogs dma' na/ lho phyogs
291a8(mdo): mtho'/ dbus dma' na/ mtha' mtho'// mtha' dma' nu/ dbus mtho' bar gyurd to// srog tshugs bye ba khrag khrug phrag sum bcu rtsa drug lend pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems na par grol lo// dge slong
291a9(mdo): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad myed pa phrag brgya ni chos rnams la/ chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma bral ba rnaM par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu myed pa ni/ myi skye ba'i chos
291b1(mdo): la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag dpag tu myed pa rnams dang / lha dang myir bcas pa'i skye dgu sngon sems ma skyed pa rnams ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan 'dra
291b2(mdo): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang myi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
291b3(mdo): la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung kanas shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar gi mkhar po 'dzin myi tra dang / su ren tra bo de dang
291b4(mdo): su chen gi lo tsha ba bad de ye shes sdes skad gas cad kyis kyang bcos nas skad kyis gtan sa phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya rang na ka ran da kA na ma na
291b5(mdo): na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gi za ma tog ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ thams cad mkhyend pa sa phyag 'a/ tshal lo// 'di skad bdag kas zos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom
291b6(mdo): ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin kyi kun dka' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong ki dge slong 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal khri dang thabs gcig
291b7(mdo): tu bzhugs te/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi 'khyams na/ 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ byang chub sems
291b8(mdo): dpal lnga stong dang ldan gcig tu brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong
291b9(mdo): ste/ lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin dang /
292a1(mdo): dngas pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / sa gcig tu phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas 'di med/
292a2(mdo): nyes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar ci'i bka' mchi cag mdzad bcom ldan 'das bka' mched de nyid kyi rjes rgyun myi 'chad par mdzad du gsolang // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang
292a3(mdo): ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal da ltar ni nyan thos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad na/ 'jam dpal bdag gis khyod la bskul gyis
292a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa yi bka' mchid brtsam par spobs par gyis shig// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo/ rang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'

292a6(mdo): 'byung ba de dag khyod kyis zhod cig 'jam dpal gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da 'din snod du gyur da pa ni gang dag yin/ snod du ma gyur pa ni gang dag yin/ shes sam/ @
292a7(mdo): 'byod kyis smras / 'jam dpal bdag ni gzhadag sgo'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ snod dang snod ma yin pa gcigs yod kyi/ 'od kyang 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i gtam
292a8(mdo): brtsam 'am thoms par gyis shi/ 'jam dpas kyis smras pa/ tsun parab 'byong dgras su dag spyor myed pa la zhugs pa de dag thams cad 'o/ ngas rgyas kyisas rnams kyi snong du ma gyur dba'o// brgyan pa
292a9(mdo): 'byor dag dngabyor byed pa la sa rtog cang semapa' rnams la yang nye sa spyod byed par yang kyi sung sa smon dang yang san se kyi gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas rgya chos rnams kyi song su 'gyur dpa'o// btsun pa
292b1(mdo): 'byor dganasus gang dag mtshams la gnas pazur dab tho ba dang / sti slob pa'i chos sa zhugs pa/ sems can thams 'das btung snyoms pa/ mid pa la me 'bar ba sa bung blta ba yid
292b2(mdo): yongs su spyor/ 'ams gsum thams ca dkyis smras cig tsam smad dam na pa gab par byed par myi dka' ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod dum gyung nga pa'o// btsuran pa sa
292b3(mdo): 'byor dkang ngag phyi ma'i mtha' bskal pa bye bar go ma bgos pa/ srid pa thams cad kyis mya 'jigs kyi snang ba khams gsum spyod yul ba/ dri ma gsum dang bral ba/ 'khor ba la bskyed
292b4(mdo): mos tshal dang / gzhal myed khang du 'du shes pa/ srid pa 'dod cing / srid pa thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba de dag nA/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyurard pa'o// btsun
292b5(mdo): ba rab 'byor de gzhan yang gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang / dang / kati muka dang / bka la nyal ba dang / kun tu bkris te 'dug pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa

292b7(mdo): spang sa ya ma yin pa de ldang pyod par yang ston pa/ gti mug gis mongs pa yang ma yin / gti mug myong pa sa ston pa/ nyon mongs pa dang yang thas sa/ khams gsum du yang snang ba/ sems can thams cad

292b9(mdo): du gyur da pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'o// rab 'byor da kyis spras pa/ 'jam dpal ka la te chos kyi dbyings kyang gcig/ de bzhin nyid kyang gcig/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gcig na
293a1(mdo): 'ad sa nam 'du da da/ 'jam dpas rgyas smras pa/ ldan pa ba 'byod dus / dngas mA dkyis 'jim pa'i gong zugacig las skor rnam pa mchogs byas

293a4(mdo): snod kyi khyad par du 'gyur ro// de la skang rtsi dang li kha ra'i snod ji ster ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la blta'o// 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod ji lta ba bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang

293a6(mdo): gang dag sdod du gyu ra pa de dag slong ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag snod ma yin pa de dag sdod du 'gyur ba nas grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor da yod do// rab 'byor dgis

293b1(mdo): co tsas ma dzin/ de bo'i phyi shin / klu gci zung chub sems dpa' gzhug bskyed pa dang / 'byung ba skyed pa la spyod pa de'iyi snod kyi snying por rig par bya'o// gang gi ci gzhug pa dang phung ba la khyod pa de'i ma

294a2(mdo): ki Sha dog du kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin du shes rab dang / ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi kha dog gcig
